This phenomenal production effortlessly solicited a copious amount of mirthful laughter from yours truly, commencing from the initial moments and perpetuating until the very conclusion. It is imperative for prospective spectators to acknowledge and appreciate the fact that this presentation is of a relatively diminutive scale and therefore, should not be anticipated to resemble or compare to the grandiose nature of Ka. Instead, it exudes an alluring charm and warmth, which is accentuated by its intimate setting. In order to fully relish in the experience, it is crucial for viewers to adopt a positive mindset prior to attendance.

The Twigglers, a group of talented performers who cleverly feigned short stature while crooning tunes reminiscent of the Village People, left an indelible mark on my memory due to their hilarious facial expressions and captivating dance routines. Their artistic interpretation and execution of various tricks and illusions were nothing short of remarkable, eliciting a profuse amount of merriment from myself and presumably, the rest of the audience.

The host, a skilled and adept individual, executed a plethora of impressive feats, including an unforgettable instance involving the juggling of a bowling ball, which culminated in my sudden excitement and concern for the safety of the spectators seated nearby. Additionally, a thrilling rope stunt that traversed above the heads of the audience, eliciting a collective gasp from those in attendance. Kudos are extended to the performers for their diligent efforts in ensuring a thoroughly enjoyable and engaging experience for all present.

In conclusion, this production wholeheartedly deserves a rating of excellence, without a trace of doubt. Avail yourself of the opportunity to partake in this delightful escapade, replete with amusement and merriment, at a reasonable cost, appropriate for both adults and children alike, although it must be noted that the content is significantly less risquÃ© than that of Absinthe.

After an extensive duration of four years on the premises of the University of Illinois, I have been unable to discover a location that executes an exceptional task in eyebrow waxing, until the present day. Mary Kay, a skilled professional, actively listened to my specifications and apprehensions regarding my eyebrows and subsequently delivered an eyebrow wax tailored to the contours of my visage. I am exceedingly content with the outcome and will persist in visiting Mary Kay's establishment for future treatments. Her tariffs are remarkably reasonable considering the exceptional quality of services she provides. In all seriousness, it is highly recommended to explore this venue.

Now, I am very hesitant to give a dentist 5 stars.  I mean if I was rating dentists as a whole, I would give them negative stars.  I have gone to a *lot* of dentists in my day and would never have considered giving one above 3 stars.  Then, I met Dr. Wyatt.  

First, his helpers are super helpful and friendly.  They are nice and sometimes when they ask a question, they actually take the tools out of your mouth for you to answer!

Second, Dr. Wyatt himself follows suit and is nice.  Even when you have issues he's nice about it.  He doesn't lecture or raise his voice or even seem angry that you don't do something, like oh floss all the time...  He truly seems like he wants you to have a happy, healthy smile, not like he is frustrated with your behavior.

Lastly, his office is called "Reel Dental" and they have a movie theme.  Though somewhat cheesy, it's nice to have movies on in the waiting room and such.  Rumor has it that when you go in for long dental work, which I never have, you can watch a movie while it's done!  Anything to take your mind of the fact you're in a dentist chair is great.

Oh, and for the ladies, he's quite easy on the eyes to look at while being worked on!

I totally understand this is a hate it or love it place. Well I love it! It's really small so no matter where you stand you have a good view. And the sound system is pretty good. Drinks are reasonably priced, and made really strong which is nice. Get some pre-show pizza it's really yummy for 3 bucks a slice!

"This gastronomical establishment constitutes my optimal dining location within Montreal's culinary landscape, and indeed, it offers the most delectable Thai cuisine I have had the pleasure of consuming. Whenever I opt for a vegetarian Pad Thai at an alternative restaurant, I find myself engaging in a mental comparison with Bangkok's rendition, concurrently lamenting the fact that I am not physically present within the confines of that unremarkable food court."

"These exceptional individuals proffer remarkable clientele assistance, evincing a profound comprehension of their craft. I would unhesitatingly confer upon them a perfect score of ten stellar denominations, were it feasible. Their meritorious endeavors warrant unequivocal commendation."

Hella cute lil place! My sister and I shared a couple desserts: strawberry snow fluff & peanut butter honey toast - both were DELICIOUS! The staff was friendly and flexible with our snow fluff order (strawberry snow fluff with mango & lychee - oh my! lol). The dining room is cute and there's board games too. If you check in on Yelp, you'll get 15% off. Win win win =D

We are in from Texas and happened upon WhereUBean and were pleasantly surprised. Great little coffee shop! Clean, comfy, and nice staff!!! The coffee is very good, according to my very picky friend and their new chai tea is delicious!!! If we're ever in Phoenix again, we will definitely visit again!!!

"In light of our recent culinary escapades, I have opted to incorporate the lingua taco onto the list of tried items, and I must say, it was an unmitigated success. The flavors were nothing short of extraordinary, and I would highly recommend it to anyone who seeks to indulge in a truly delectable dining experience. Furthermore, I must address the notion that the establishment in question serves fried fish, as this is simply not the case. While they do offer fish-based dishes, these are limited to cocktails or oysters on the half shell, and there is no mention of fried fish anywhere on the menu. It is worth noting, however, that the cashier does indeed speak English, as it is a necessary component of her job, given that she also manages the drive-thru window. Moving on, I must address the demographic makeup of the restaurant's patrons, which, while predominantly Hispanic, does not detract from the overall quality of the food. In fact, I recently had the pleasure of dining there with my 72-year-old mother, who thoroughly enjoyed both the tongue and pastor tacos, as well as a shared shrimp cocktail accompanied by watermelon juice. Suffice it to say that we were both incredibly impressed with the caliber of the cuisine, and I continue to search in vain for any imperfections."

I have been ardently pursuing Pinkberry's developments for an extended period of time, and my fervent anticipation for their geographical expansion has finally been satiated with their recent opening of a novel storefront on the Eastern seaboard, specifically in Charlotte, situated adjacent to the prominent Southpark (Phillips Place) shopping center. Upon becoming cognizant of this news, I felt an unwavering compulsion to partake in a personal exploration of their offerings. My maiden visit proved to be an utterly delightful encounter, as the young women manning the counter exhibited an unbridled enthusiasm, warmth, and effervescent hospitality that was utterly captivating. Following a series of judicious samplings, I opted for a delectable combination of coconut yogurt, raspberry, pineapple, chocolate crisps, and yogurt chips, which collectively yielded an unparalleled gustatory experience that left me in a state of utmost satisfaction and eagerly anticipating the prospect of repeating this indulgence at a future date.

In the city of Las Vegas, each and every eatery boasts an exceptional culinary experience... however, N9NE Steakhouse distinguishes itself by focusing on minute details that collectively contribute to an unparalleled dining encounter, featuring an incomparable ambiance, a concise menu emphasizing the refinement of select dishes, delectable s'mores, and, arguably, the most impressive and freshest seafood platter available, among numerous other exceptional attributes.

"Chef Xavier serves as an exemplary emissary to the realm of raw cuisine, boasting a culinary prowess that transcends conventional gastronomic norms. His creations are not only delectable, but also fresh and bursting with flavor, making them ideal for health-conscious individuals seeking a nutritious alternative to traditional cooked fare. To optimize the dining experience, Chef Xavier advises perusing the menu on the establishment's website prior to visiting, and even encourages patrons to preorder their selections to ensure prompt availability upon arrival. For those who prefer a more impromptu dining experience, a diverse array of fresh options awaits in the deli case, catering to discerning palates and uncompromising dietary requirements. Moreover, Chef Xavier offers a comprehensive smoothie program, featuring a signature blend dubbed 'The Works,' which artfully incorporates an assortment of nutrient-dense vegetables while maintaining an unparalleled level of taste and refreshment."

"When operating from my central business district workspace, I consider visiting Simpatico an imperative on a daily basis due to their competitive pricing strategy and exceptional customer service. Despite being situated within the historic Alcoa edifice, which may potentially limit their pedestrian traffic compared to the likes of Starbucks or Crazy Mocha, Simpatico's commitment to delivering premium beverages and hospitable encounters renders them a hidden treasure among coffee establishments in the city's core. Additionally, it is worth mentioning that complimentary internet access is offered in the lobby for patrons' convenience."

"A comprehensive evaluation of the gastronomical experience offered by Verandah Vegas, focusing on the exceptional quality of the breakfast menu, specifically the huevos rancheros, which has established a new paradigm for culinary excellence in the realm of outdoor dining. The ambiance, characterized by a serene and refreshing atmosphere, serves as an ideal backdrop for savoring the delectable delights presented by the skilled chefs. The coffee, a vital component of any breakfast, has been crafted to perfection, with each sip satisfying even the most discerning palate. The service, unobtrusive yet attentive, strikes a harmonious balance between solicitude and respect for privacy. However, the piece de resistance remains the huevos rancheros, a dish that has transcended the boundaries of traditional breakfast fare, boasting an innovative fusion of flavors, textures, and presentation, thereby securing its place among the pantheon of gastronomic masterpieces, alongside the likes of The Modern's duck, Ryutenmon Tokyo's cashew chicken, and Kaygetsu's sushi in Menlo Park. Kudos to the culinary wizards at Verandah Vegas for conjuring up a memorable epicurean adventure."

"The lodging establishment in question boasted an exceptional quality of service and ambiance, despite not being classified as a luxury hotel. The atmosphere was remarkably tranquil, and the maintenance of the facilities was meticulous, which contributed to a thoroughly enjoyable experience for guests. The personnel were courteous, accommodating, and willing to assist with any queries or concerns that arose, making them an integral factor in the overall satisfaction of the hotel's patrons. Additionally, the location of the hotel offered a unique advantage, positioned as it was near the renowned Las Vegas Strip and merely a mile away from the spacious Las Vegas Convention Center. Furthermore, the cost of staying at this hotel was surprisingly reasonable, making it an unbeatable value for travelers seeking a comfortable and convenient stay."

Went here for happy hour and sat in the cantina, chips and salsa were delivered immediately and were delicious. Our server was kind and on top of it. The meal I got seemed a little over cooked but besides that everything was delicious and their happy hour prices were great.

"This establishment has entirely rehabilitated its reputation in my eyes, given my prior experience at the Boca Park location. The pizza, to put it succinctly, was utterly sublime, and the beer selection, while not exhaustive, was still quite commendable. The wine list, however, was nothing short of exceptional, boasting an array of vintages that would undoubtedly impress even the most discerning oenophile. Chinedu (My apologies for any inconsistencies in the spelling of your name), was incredibly accommodating in his efforts to assist me in selecting an appropriate wine, despite our time constraints due to a pending social engagement. A brief encounter with Joe, the regional manager, afforded me the opportunity to become acquainted with the mastermind behind this gastronomic empire's expansion. Needless to say, I was thoroughly impressed. This eatery has unequivocally earned its place as my go-to pizza destination, particularly given its proximity to my workplace. Kudos to management for their commitment to excellence, and here's to the impending launch of additional locations!"

When it comes to culinary offerings at airports, there tend to be limited options that are often unremarkable and lackluster, with a prevalence of chain restaurants or similar establishments offering comparable quality fare. However, an exception to this rule exists in the form of Beaudevin, a dining establishment that seemingly materialized out of thin air, leaving one to wonder if its presence is a blessing bestowed upon weary travelers by an Airport Deity. Indeed, this eatery stands out as the most superior and sophisticated venue I have had the pleasure of patronizing within the confines of any airport terminal. Upon perusing the menu, I opted for a plain bagel accompanied by a medley of ingredients essential for creating a bagel adorned with smoked salmon, herbed cream cheese, capers, red onions, and tomatoes. To my delight, each component tasted remarkably fresh, with the smoked salmon being particularly noteworthy. If you happen to be arriving in Charlotte with some time to kill before your flight, I highly recommend paying Beaudevin a visit. It is worth noting that additional locations can be found in Chicago's O'Hare International Airport and Miami International Airport, thereby spreading joy and culinary satisfaction among travelers far and wide.

"I have had the privilege of partaking in the delectable delights of this esteemed establishment for five consecutive weekends, with the exception of the previous weekend, during which I was unfortunately absent due to unforeseen circumstances that necessitated my temporary departure from the local vicinity; however, I eagerly anticipate resuming my unwavering allegiance to the mouthwatering tonkotsu-shoyu ramen, replete with succulent char shu, nitamago, and nori, which has captivated my taste buds and left me in a state of unadulterated euphoria each and every time I have had the pleasure of savoring it. Until we meet again, dear Monta, may the forthcoming weekend bring us together once more in the spirit of culinary indulgence and gastronomical bliss."

I am perpetually disenchanted with my pedicure massages, however, that paradigm has been irrevocably shifted owing to Mai's exceptional proficiency in providing an unparalleled pedicure and massage experience, transcending my expectations by delivering a heavenly, nonpareil, and thoroughly relaxing massage that appeared to be never-ending, all the while maintaining a firm yet non-discomforting pressure, thereby culminating in an unforgettable and sublime experience that has rendered me a loyal patron of this esteemed establishment, situated a mere 25 minutes from my domicile, and despite the abundance of alternative options within close proximity, I shall unwaveringly opt for the superior quality and expertise offered here, rendering the distance utterly inconsequential.

"The culinary experience offered at this establishment is truly remarkable, with each dish showcasing an unparalleled level of gastronomic expertise. Specifically, their pizza is utterly sublime, with the kale variety being a particularly noteworthy example; although it is no longer featured on the menu, it remains available upon request and is well worth the effort. Additionally, their turkey lasagna is a staple dish that consistently impresses, while their flavored margheritas provide a refreshing complement to the meal. Notably, these beverages are so well-crafted that they manage to win over even those who do not typically enjoy margheritas, such as myself."

"It has come to my attention, courtesy of a patron who has expressed fondness for this culinary establishment on multiple occasions, that a dining experience at this venue is not to be missed. Subsequently, I opted to partake in a meal here personally, and I must say that the service provided by our server, Noah, was truly exceptional. His recommendations were insightful, and his patience was commendable, especially when catering to our diverse preferences. We initiated our culinary journey with Blood Orange margaritas, which were nothing short of sublime. These were promptly followed by an order of tableside guacamole, which proved to be just as impressive as its predecessor. For my main course, I opted for the fish tacos, which not only surpassed my expectations but also boasted an aesthetically pleasing presentation. To bring the evening to a satisfying close, we sampled both the pumpkin bread pudding and the chocolate dessert du jour. Suffice it to say that neither disappointed; in fact, the bread pudding, in particular, left such a profound impression that I now harbor a deep-seated desire to indulge in it dailyâwere I not concerned about the potential consequences to my waistline, that is. All things considered, this restaurant excels in all aspects, be it the quality of its cuisine, the ambiance it fosters, or the level of service it provides. It is an ideal setting for socializing with acquaintances or enjoying a romantic evening out. Furthermore, Noah brought to my attention the establishment's renowned brunch offerings, which I am eager to experience in the near future. In conclusion, I wholeheartedly endorse this dining establishment."

This establishment serves as an optimal location for an early morning repast, offering copious portions of delectable comestibles that can easily satiate the vigorous appetite of even the most voracious patron. My spouse and I, both possessing formidable alimentary capacities, found the portion size of the chicken and waffles sufficient for sharing, while the biscuits and gravy proved to be an equally satisfying option. Despite the presence of a numerous gathering, the hospitality we received was exceptional, a testament to the proficiency of the staff in accommodating large groups. Scott, a youthful, red-haired gentleman, demonstrated remarkable attentiveness, ensuring our needs were met and extending his courtesies even beyond the bounds of his designated section. A visit to this venue is imperative for any individual seeking a delectable breakfast experience while in Las Vegas.

"This culinary establishment is utterly delectable! The clientele service is exceptional, and the comestibles are scrumptious. Uncomplicated yet flavorful. 

I have had the pleasure of sampling a significant portion of the menu, and I must say, it's utterly delightful. The pork tenderloins, in particular, are my favorite. The quality is consistently high, with a rating of 5 being the norm, and it's far from unpalatable. 

They also offer unique and supplementary fare scattered throughout the eatery. Be sure to inspect them and partake in their consumption!"

Looking for a Sex On The Beach experience? Avoid squandering your time at subpar establishments, my dear Nancy Boy! This esteemed watering hole is undoubtedly among the premier cocktail joints in town, boasting an unwavering commitment to providing an exceptional drinking experience. The fastidious attention to detail in their carefully curated beverage selection, complemented by the meticulous design elements and staff attire, exemplifies their dedication to creating a unique and memorable environment for patrons.

These mixology aficionados have garnered widespread recognition within the industry for their unwavering dedication to their craft. Although tea cups have recently gained popularity, rest assured that this establishment has consistently delivered high-quality concoctions long before they became trendy. While they can expertly prepare a classic mojito or old fashioned upon request, I implore you to explore their extensive menu, featuring creative and complex concoctions designed to tantalize your taste buds and leave you in a state of utter amazement.

As a seasoned imbiber, allow me to share a valuable tip: always accompany your order with a beer chaser, ensuring a harmonious balance between flavors and preventing an overwhelming alcoholic assault on your senses. Savor each creation unhurriedly, as true masterpieces require time to unfurl their full splendor. Moreover, be mindful of the intimate setting; opting for a strategic ledge to stand at is recommended, lest the plush couches consume your svelte derriÃ¨re.

"I had the pleasure of indulging in a delectable burger at this esteemed establishment, which I must say, was truly sublime. The ambiance was refined and sophisticated, with wait staff who were not only attentive but also exhibited a warm and welcoming demeanor. Furthermore, the pricing was quite reasonable, making it an overall exceptional dining experience."

I loved this place.  Our son, Andrew, and girlfriend, Sara, took us here to enjoy a wonderful breakfast on our recent trip to Wisconsin.... Everything they had here was delicious and I hope to get a chance to go back some day.  It was definitely worth the wait to get in.  I had the strawberry pancakes with marscapone cheese and I will dream about it now.

"The medical practitioner successfully rectified the ocular anomaly I was experiencing, and I must say that the entire team of professionals who assisted me during my visit exemplified exceptional customer service; it's truly commendable how they managed to address my concerns without any pecuniary repercussions, particularly given the constrained nature of their work environment, which, by the way, happens to be a correctional facility under the jurisdiction of Maricopa County."

Fabulous.  Fantastic.  A group of six. 4 of the six had the trio of Elk, Beef, Bison and loved it.  I had the flat iron special.  Fantastic.  Only complaint - the beet salad was very LIGHT on beets - but they were fantastic.  I could have done without the cabbage piece of it - very nondescript - but the beets were fantastic.  Also, we were celebrating a birthday and brought a bottle of wine as a gift - not to share at the meal, but as a gift.  We weren't allowed to bring it in - I'm hoping it was liquor laws that forbade it.  If we had it in a bag or wrapped - it wouldn't have been a problem.  interesting.  But overall - a great meal!  Highly recommended.

Every time I go to Vegas I have to come to the Gun Store. It's so fun to be able to shoot guns you can't shoot legally. My husband was able to try out an AK-47. He shot other ones but I forget the names. (girl sorry) They have awesome packages at really reasonable prices. Each package come with a free t-shirt too! A taxi ride to get here from the strip is pretty expensive. The first time we came here the taxi was around $30 each way from the strip. The last time we came we just drove here in our car. There's plenty of parking. All the employees are very helpful and they help you every step of the way. Highly recommend the Gun Store.

"An extensive array of products and a diverse assortment of merchandise at reasonable price points have rendered this my premier Asian/international market in Madison, surpassing my expectations with its meticulous presentation and freshness of goods. The store's proximity to the city center and convenient accessibility via the nearby beltline make it an ideal destination for both local patrons and visitors from afar. Notably, the shopping plaza housing Yue-Wah and its adjacent library have undergone recent renovations, contributing to an enhanced visual appeal."

"The advent of Southern BBQ in Verdun has triggered an unprecedented culinary excitement, as Black Strap has taken over the premises previously occupied by the dearly missed Casa Manolo. Despite its physical proximity to its predecessor, Black Strap boasts a starkly contrasting ambiance, characterized by an informal, relaxed atmosphere reminiscent of traditional BBQ settings. Patrons can expect friendly, casual service, complemented by the presence of brown towel paper rolls on each table. The spacious interior features two expansive picnic tables situated at the front of the establishment, lending an air of communal conviviality to the dining experience. The gastronomical offerings at Black Strap are nothing short of exceptional, with a meticulous attention to detail and authenticity that sets them apart from other Montreal establishments attempting to replicate the quintessential Southern BBQ experience. Avoid the saccharine, factory-produced sauces and questionable interpretations found elsewhere; instead, indulge in genuine, slow-smoked delights that respect the rich traditions of American Southern cuisine. Prices are remarkably reasonable, given the quality of the fare, and the venue has rapidly become a local sensation, attracting a devoted clientele that includes a steadfast stream of patrons eager to partake in the culinary delights offered. Although the menu currently lacks dessert options, we fervently hope that future additions will include classic Southern staples such as Shoofly Pie, Sweet Potato Pie, Red Velvet Cake, Hummingbird Cake, Peach Cobbler, sun-brewed iced tea, and Mint Juleps, thereby completing the authentic Southern BBQ experience."
Every time I leave Vegas to go home, this is where I eat.\n\nFriendly restaurant for crepe lovers.  I try to find a crepe eatery every city I visit; this is my favorite for Vegas.
Line to get a ticket is long, but moves surprisingly fast. I like the method of different tickets for different needs. It expedites the process. Friday is really busy. They have a tv.

I go here at least 1 a week with my wife.  I get the meatball Pho along with the BBQ pork Bahn Mi.  The food is great, cheap, and quick.  The staff is friendly, not in your typically way, but they do a good job.  Da Vang has become of my favorite places period in Phoenix.

After having gained ingress at 5:00 a.m., I descended to the eatery to acquire a hasty repast. Upon being seated, Omarâmy attendant for the duration of my visitârecommended the Lobster Eggs Benedict. I am utterly grateful that I opted to accept his proposal, as my meal proved to be the most delectable morning repast I have had the pleasure of consuming. It was truly remarkable, surpassing my expectations by a considerable margin.

"Remarkable, sample the sliders, ham and cheese croquettes, stuffed dates, and any other menu items that pique your curiosity; you won't be disappointed. The mojitos are equally delectable and are available in pitchers for those who desire a larger quantity. This establishment offers an exceptional dining experience at unbeatable prices, making it an ideal destination for a convivial gathering or special occasion. My numerous acquaintances who have visited this restaurant have all shared my enthusiasm for its culinary offerings and welcoming ambiance."

After playing eenie meenie minne mhhhoo, I weeded Butters over 5 other breakfast restaurant. It was a little whiles away, but I am sooo happy we chose it! Our server was Rafael. Cool, calm, collected, took our order, gave me some good highlights of the menu.

Food came, literally within 10 minutes, and we were diggin' in. I ordered the chorizo omelette, chedder grits,  and it also came with pancakes. I never had chorizo omelette, so I wasn't sure what I was getting into, it is a tad oily, but that is from the chorizo, however the veggies and egg balanced it out. CHEDDER GRITS delicious! My boyfriend stealth the rest. I cried. Pancakes, fluffy, buttery, melts in your mouth- probably the best set of pancakes ever. I ate it all. Then I cried. 

We don't quite live in the area, so I am quite bummed that we'd will probably never have Butters again. It was a great choice for us, we enjoyed the service and food. Thanks Butters!

I indulged my spouse with an extravagant weekend getaway at a luxurious resort, where we were pampered with exceptional service and amenities. Upon arrival, we were greeted by a friendly golf cart driver who transported us to the opulent lobby, where the attentive front desk staff ensured a swift and effortless check-in process. The resourceful concierge team provided valuable insights on various transportation alternatives to navigate the historic district without concern for imbibing alcoholic beverages and operating a vehicle. Notably, the resort offers towncar services that deliver guests to any destination within Old Town for a nominal fee of $21. The tastefully appointed accommodations boasted a minimalist yet sophisticated ambiance, which we thoroughly enjoyed. Unfortunately, inclement weather precluded us from participating in the complimentary Release Pool Party, exclusively available to registered guests; however, the breathtaking vistas of the surrounding desert terrain from our lodgings compensated for this minor setback.

This establishment undoubtedly possesses an exceptional quality that renders it remarkably enjoyable, and such a characteristic is exemplified by the genuine and sincere amiability of its staff members, who unwaveringly display a willingness to extend assistance beyond what is customarily expected from them, as evidenced by the instance of one employee who, without hesitation or prompting, presented me with an offering of baked treats while I was engaged in work-related activities within the lobby area, thereby creating a welcoming atmosphere that greatly enhances my overall experience at this venue. Furthermore, the premises themselves are meticulously maintained, ensuring a pristine environment for guests, and the culinary options available are not only satisfying but also offer a diverse array of choices catering to various dietary preferences and requirements. Additionally, amenities such as a well-equipped business center, providing access to essential printing and faxing services, and a state-of-the-art fitness facility, complemented by discounted daily passes to a nearby health club, contribute significantly to the convenience and comfort afforded to patrons, making this lodging establishment an optimal choice for those seeking refuge during periods of displacement due to unforeseen circumstances, such as household flooding and subsequent repair work, thus alleviating the stress and hardship associated with such situations. Even our feline companion appears to approve of this location, further solidifying its reputation as an exceptional temporary abode.

"My inaugural visit to Garde Manger was nothing short of a gastronomical odyssey, as I was determined to indulge in their renowned Lobster Poutine and sample their other culinary offerings. Upon arriving at the establishment, we promptly secured a reservation (a judicious decision indeed), which enabled us to be seated at the bar without any significant delay. As a small group of two to three individuals, this vantage point offered an optimal setting for us to relish the delectable fare presented before us. Must-try items at Garde Manger include, but are not limited to, the aforementioned Lobster Poutine, whose sublime flavors and textures effectively refuted any misconceptions regarding its supposed overratedness; rather, it was a veritable epicurean delight. Additionally, the Albacore Tuna and Crackling Pork showcased the chef's remarkable proficiency in creating dishes that strike an impeccable balance between flavors, while the Pierogies & Pork Belly proved to be yet another scrumptious option. Throughout our dining experience, the service we received was exceptional, and the ambiance of the restaurant perfectly complemented the exquisite cuisine. It is with great anticipation that I look forward to my next visit, when I shall endeavor to sample further items from their menu and, perhaps, even indulge in some of their other delectable offerings."

"Culinary excellence. Economical tariffs. Convivial ambiance. Seeking a rapid yet satisfying repast, we chanced upon this eatery and found it to be an ideal venue that fulfilled our expectations with flying colors. We would unhesitatingly return."

"Consistently exceptional service is provided on each and every occasion. It is remarkable how this establishment perpetually possesses the requisite items that are necessary for our diverse needs. On my most recent visit, I entrusted them with five timepieces, which, under normal circumstances, would have necessitated a trip to an alternative venue, potentially offering more economical options for watch battery replacements. However, the convenience of their extended operating hours, specifically 8 pm on weeknights and 7 pm on Saturdays, and remarkably, 10 am to 5 pm on Sundays, renders this location an optimal choice."

My husband and I have a slip here and are members. We love this marina and its laid back atmosphere. The only downfall to this marina is the long walkway if the shuttle service is busy but you are more than welcome to wait. They do have call boxes for the golf cart shuttles at each end of the walkway. Being a member you have access to private showers and bathrooms, a bbq area thats shaded with tables and chairs, washers and dryers, power and water hookups, 2 free bags of ice daily etc.. Love the staff. All of them are friendly and helpful. The whole marina and docks have the feel of one big happy family. Never have had any issues with theft etc. Definetly laid back with the exception of the party weekends lol.. I reccomend this marina over Scorpion Bay Marina based solely on how laid back and personable Pleasant Harbor is. I have been to Scorpion Bay Marina a few times and things just seem a bit more uptight over there. Not to mention the cops that seem to consistently be driving around. Just an uneasy feeling all around for me. If you plan to get a slip here make sure to talk to Shannon. She knows her stuff. :)

Body Heat has ignited my passion for fitness in a manner that no other workout facility has accomplished prior to this. Not only have I begun to run and cross-train, but I have also developed an ardent fondness for fitness overall. My enthusiasm for the classes offered by Body Heat knows no bounds, and I must confess that the piÃ¨ce de rÃ©sistance is their scorching hot nature. Although there have been moments when I wished there was a tad more emphasis placed on maintaining a spotless environment, I cannot deny that the facility boasts an aesthetically pleasing appearance and is consistently well-maintained. My personal preference for yoga has come as a surprise to me, as it has evolved into an indispensable component of my daily routine and a source of immense enjoyment. In addition, I derive great satisfaction from participating in the hot Pilates, kettlebells, and boot camp classes proffered by Body Heat. Furthermore, their candlelight class held on Friday evenings serves as an excellent means of unwinding and rejuvenating following a stressful week. Ultimately, Body Heat has transcended its role as a mere workout facility and has become a sanctuary where I can seek refuge and solace.

Since there exists a plethora of preceding reviews, I shall succinctly articulate my thoughts regarding Cibo, a contemporary eatery that boasts an impressive clientele and prioritizes culinary excellence. Notably, their bruschetta appetizer merits high praise, as evidenced by the accompanying image. Additionally, it is advisable to reserve some space for their delectable crepe-based desserts.

"Gastronomical excellence and an ambiance of sophistication, this eatery offers a diverse array of delectable cuisine that cater to the discerning palates of its clientele. The menu boasts an impressive selection, ensuring that each patron can indulge in a culinary experience tailored to their unique preferences. My personal fondness lies with the traditional rice pudding, expertly prepared with the subtle essence of Turkish coffee, serving as a delightful accompaniment to the delectable fare. Moreover, the hookah lounge presents an idyllic setting for socializing with acquaintances post-dinner, fostering an atmosphere of conviviality and relaxation."

"This laundry establishment boasts supreme efficacy in its dry cleaning services, rendering it my top preference. The quality of their workmanship is unparalleled, and their accommodating collection system is a significant advantage. The demeanor of their customer service agents is consistently respectful and polite, fostering a welcoming atmosphere. I would enthusiastically endorse this enterprise to any individual seeking exceptional dry cleaning solutions."

I have been a loyal patron of this establishment for a decade and a half, during which time I have had the pleasure of being tended to by the exceptionally skilled and invaluable Marjorie. As someone who is fastidious about their coiffure, I can confidently attest that her proficiency in her craft is unparalleled, and her expertise has earned my unwavering trust. My peripatetic nature, owing to my occupation, has afforded me the opportunity to visit numerous salons worldwide, yet I have never felt compelled to seek out an alternative to Marjorie's services. Her talent and dedication are truly remarkable, and I would unequivocally recommend her to anyone seeking a first-rate hairstylist.

"Indubitably, the most scrumptious prosciutto sandwich I have had the pleasure of consuming! I visited this esteemed establishment for lunch and was treated to a culinary experience that exceeded my expectations in every aspect! The bread, which they artfully craft in-house, was a masterclass in texture and flavor, possessing a delightful lightness and crispiness that was well worth the financial investment and time spent traversing to this gastronomic haven. My meal, which amounted to a mere $9, was a veritable feast for the senses, leaving me utterly satiated and eager to return. The staff, who exhibited a commendable level of friendliness and efficiency, were complemented by the presence of valet services for my vehicle, adding an extra layer of convenience to an already exceptional dining experience. The venue itself, a converted household, maintained an impressive level of cleanliness, further solidifying my resolve to wholeheartedly endorse this eatery to anyone seeking a truly satisfying repast. My anticipation for future visits knows no bounds, and I would not be surprised if this establishment becomes my go-to destination for Friday lunches in the near future."

New to Vegas, I picked this place solely because it was close and convenient. What a great surprise! We just got pizza to go but it was some of the best I've had; hot, fresh ingredients and perfect thin crust. Will definitely be eating here again!

"I recently had the pleasure of indulging in a brow and lip treatment, and I must say, the experience was nothing short of extraordinary! The ambiance of the establishment exuded an air of refined sophistication, with sleek, contemporary decor that seemed to embody the epitome of elegance. Upon entering, I was immediately struck by the warmth and professionalism of the staff, who greeted me with a courteous smile and a gentle touch on the shoulder. My esthetician, whose name unfortunately escapes me at present, demonstrated an unparalleled level of expertise in her craft, effortlessly transforming my unruly eyebrows into a work of art. Her technique was meticulous, precise, and utterly flawless, leaving me in a state of utter amazement. Moreover, she took the time to educate me on proper maintenance and care for my newly-enhanced features, ensuring that I could enjoy them to their fullest potential. The price, while certainly not insignificant, seemed a reasonable exchange for the exceptional quality of service I received. In conclusion, I would highly recommend this establishment to anyone seeking a truly exceptional grooming experience."

We had the best Thanksgiving dinner at Arizona Charlie's buffet!  Fabulous stuffing, real mashed potatoe, great desserts!  No mess to clean up at home!  Thank you for working on this holiday and for making such good food!

"The culinary offerings at this establishment are utterly remarkable, with the vast majority of them being meticulously prepared in-house, thereby negating the possibility of utilizing prefabricated or frozen ingredients. Furthermore, the bartenders exhibit an exceptionally cordial demeanor, which contributes to a convivial ambiance that is further enhanced by an impressive selection of beers that is constantly evolving and consistently surpasses expectations. Additionally, the happy hour specials are truly tantalizing, making it an ideal venue for both indulging in delicious fare and imbibing potent potables. Highly recommended for an enjoyable dining and drinking experience."

I was engaged in a thorough examination of the local market in search of exceptional laminate flooring for my newly constructed abode, and my endeavors led me to TLC, where I encountered Ramin, who provided me with a remarkable level of customer service. His unwavering commitment to honesty and extensive knowledge of the products he represented left an indelible impression on me. My mother initially harbored aspirations for the installation of hardwood flooring; however, Ramin's astute assessment of the situation resulted in a comprehensive elucidation of the advantages and disadvantages associated with such a choice. In light of this information, we opted for laminate flooring, specifically the Shaw brand, which Ramin offered at a highly competitive rate of $1.89 per square foot, inclusive of padding. My decision to procure the product from TLC rather than alternative sources, such as Chinese manufacturers or Home Depot, was motivated by a desire to ensure the acquisition of high-quality materials at a reasonable price point. Thus, I extend my sincerest gratitude to Ramin for his invaluable assistance and express my profound satisfaction with the finished product.

"Upon culminating an enjoyable dining experience at Al Hamra in the company of acquaintances, it became imperative to express our profound appreciation for the delectable repast and exceptional hospitality we had the pleasure of indulging in. Our server, Mario, exhibited a commendable level of expertise and congeniality throughout the evening, ensuring that our dining experience was nothing short of extraordinary. The timely arrival of our orders only served to enhance the overall quality of our meal, as each dish we sampled boasted an impressive medley of flavors and textures that catered to our individual preferences with unwavering precision. Particularly noteworthy were the samosas and onion paneer, which served as a tantalizing precursor to the delectable entrees that followed. The shrimp vindaloo, chicken with coconut, chicken curry, and eggplant dish, all of which were accompanied by aloo naan and mango chutney, showcased a masterful balance of spices that left us suitably impressed and craving for more. Although it has been several years since our last visit to Al Hamra, we are unequivocally committed to returning in the near future, such was the excellence of the culinary experience we enjoyed."

I have had the privilege of visiting my octogenarian friend and neighbor at this esteemed establishment for an extended period of time, specifically, almost a month, and I must say, the experience has been nothing short of exceptional, particularly when compared to other facilities that purport to offer similar services, such as TLC in Henderson; indeed, this rehabilitation center has proven to be a veritable haven, a true blessing for those seeking comprehensive care and dedication. The staff members, across various departments, have consistently demonstrated a remarkable level of professionalism, compassion, and dedication, taking the time to engage with my friend's concerns and needs with genuine interest and empathy, thereby creating an environment conducive to progress and growth, devoid of any trace of desperation or hopelessness. It is heartening to witness the unwavering commitment displayed by individuals like Mike in physical therapy and Jackie in nurse aides, among others, who embody the very essence of patient-centered care, their kindness and selflessness serving as a shining example to their peers. My sincere gratitude extends to every member of this facility for upholding such high standards, setting a laudable benchmark for others in the industry to strive towards.

"Although my proficiency in golf is far from exceptional, I possess an ardent fondness for the sport. This particular course presents an ideal setting for both novice and skilled golfers, boasting expansive fairways devoid of any obstructions, with the exception of scattered houses situated beyond the range of a misdirected shot. The presence of water hazards introduces an additional layer of complexity, demanding careful consideration and precise execution. The greens, while not flawless, exhibited a satisfactory level of maintenance, particularly when considering the affordable price point of less than $50 per round. The genuinely exceptional aspect of this facility, however, lies in the quality of its staff and customer service. From the clubhouse attendants to the food and beverage personnel, the service we received was truly outstanding, complete with starters actively monitoring pace of play and encouraging slower groups to maintain an appropriate tempo. Furthermore, my green fee included complimentary draft beverages and a meal, which I had not anticipated, and access to unlimited range balls. In summary, this particular Saturday of golf in Las Vegas proved to be the most enjoyable experience I've had thus far."

"I have conclusively discovered my grooming specialist! This establishment is utterly remarkable. The level of service provided here is of the highest caliber, leaving zero room for dissatisfaction. I consistently arrange my appointments with Addie, whose proficiency in her craft is evident in the exceptional results she produces. My Yorkie, Preston, received an unparalleled haircut, while my Yorkie-Poo's coiffure was executed flawlessly on the initial attempt, a feat that eluded my previous groomer despite three consecutive tries. If you seek a new grooming experience, I fervently endorse paying a visit to this salon. Their accommodating scheduling policy enables me to secure an appointment promptly, and their obliging staff gladly accommodates my requests for a swift nail trimming during peak hours. Display your support for this locally owned and operated enterprise, and revel in the satisfaction that comes with it."

I do get my nails done here and there.. when I feel like it. However, this is the ONLY place i have been where the have the newest up to date acrylics: shimmer-sparkles- AND colors OH MY! to choose from. I recently moved and still keep in contact to say hello with my girl. SHE MADE MY NAILS LOOK LIKE SHINY JEWELS!!!  The Price is fair for the precise and neat work that is done. Around $35/40 (new) depending. I usually would get a shimmer acrylic on the tips then would fill later. No second thoughts.. if you walk in its worth the wait. :) I have recommended MANY friends here. Nails would never pop off, i would ask to soak or drill down to take off.

"Do not allow fear to deter you from partaking in this culinary experience; the queue, though potentially intimidating, is more than justified by the exceptional quality of the comestibles being served, specifically the hot links, which are utterly delectable, and the green beans, whose preparation is so meticulous that even an individual with a professed aversion to vegetables may find themselves indulging in a second helping."

"HTC excels in providing exceptional services, as evidenced by my recent experience.  I had the pleasure of working with Marilyn, who delivered an impressive anchor tattoo.  Her proficiency and expertise ensured a seamless and efficient process, making the entire experience remarkably stress-free.  Subsequently, I returned to the studio two weeks later, primarily due to my own anxiety.  During this visit, I had the opportunity to interact with Jon, whose exceptional customer service skills and remarkable empathy left a lasting impression on me.  Moreover, my encounter with Anthony was equally delightful, as he exhibited immense kindness, insightfulness, and an agreeable demeanor.  In fact, my concerns were largely unfounded, but Jon and Anthony's combined efforts significantly alleviated my apprehensions.  I am eagerly looking forward to my next visit, whereupon I shall indulge in further embellishments.  Suffice it to say, I am unequivocally committed to HTC, as their team has consistently showcased unparalleled professionalism and dedication to their craft."

"Gourmet burgers of unparalleled quality and customizability, complemented by an array of expertly crafted beverages, served in a captivating atmosphere characterized by a welcoming demeanor exhibited by the management and staff, culminating in a dining experience that surpasses expectations and leaves patrons in a state of utter satisfaction, with neither the artisanal brews nor the savory patties failing to impress."

"I engaged the services of Skyler and the Myriad team for their Real Estate Investment advisory expertise, and I am delighted to attest that their proficiency has yielded a consistent and positive cash flow into my bank account each month! Prior to collaborating with them, I felt overwhelmed by the plethora of alternatives and contradictory viewpoints pertaining to real estate investments. It was a daunting task to navigate through the vast array of options and arrive at an informed decision. However, Skyler and his team proved to be a refreshing exception to this trend. Their youthful energy and seasoned experience blended seamlessly with their unwavering dedication to delivering tangible outcomes. They furnished me with the necessary tools to scrutinize my financial situation, elucidate the associated risks and benefits of various real estate investment strategies, and most crucially, imparted the knowledge required to interpret numerical data accurately. Their innovative approach instilled in me a novel perspective on real estate investing, specifically emphasizing the importance of 'passive income.' I unequivocally endorse their services, and I strongly advise against procrastination in utilizing their expertise, lest you regret not doing so in the future."

"In order to luxuriate in this opulent resort, you will be required to expend a considerable amount of financial resources, however, if you are seeking an exceptional lodging experience in Scottsdale, this establishment undoubtedly ranks among the premier options. The aquatic facilities are truly impressive, and the unwavering provision of chilled potable water and delectable culinary offerings further enhance the indulgent ambiance. Unfortunately, securing accommodations with an optimal view of the surrounding mountains proves rather arduous, and even then, the distance between the guest quarters and the pool renders it somewhat impractical to fully appreciate the scenic vistas. Nonetheless, the intimate casitas situated in close proximity to the pool exude an air of exclusivity, boasting sleek sliding doors that open onto the sun-drenched pool area. The immaculately manicured grounds contribute to the overall sense of refinement and luxury, making this resort an unparalleled haven for those seeking respite in Scottsdale."

After engaging in an enjoyable round of golf, we decided to visit this establishment, and we are delighted that we did, as it exceeded our expectations in terms of both service and culinary offerings. Hailing from Phoenix, we lamented the fact that such a superb eatery was not located closer to our place of residence, but we were determined to savor every moment of our dining experience. The hospitable staff members exhibited remarkable attentiveness and accommodation, ensuring that our needs were met with alacrity and efficiency. Furthermore, the cuisine was not only fresh and hot but also tantalizingly delectable, leaving us in a state of gastronomic satisfaction. Additionally, the prices were eminently reasonable, making our dining experience even more pleasurable. We would unhesitatingly return to this restaurant on our next visit to the area, eager to partake in their culinary delights once again.

Dinner buffet price is up to like $37/person now and wait on a Friday night at 5PM was non existent.  

Our waitress was A-mazing!!!  My brother liked the tea so much that he asked what it was.  Not did she just tell him what it was but she went out of her way to find and write down the distributor name, website, and product flavor name (it was actually a papaya tea by China Mist).  She also noted that they were just testing out the tea and may or may not continue to serve it in the future but the response from customers has been highly positive.

Some new favorite foods this time around to add to the must get list when you come to the Wynn Buffet:
1) Chilean seabass (they didn't have this the first time I came here and I'm a big fish lover so you usually don't see this kind of fish served often)
2) Spicy tuna hand rolls
3) Some kind of buffalo salad
4) Mushrooms (marinated in a delicious sauce)
5) Key lime pie (I didn't like it before, now I do)

"Having recently visited this establishment with a companion subsequent to engaging in employment-related activities, I must admit that my initial expectations were not entirely fulfilled. Despite my predilection for tea over coffee, I opted to order a hot chai latte in the hope of receiving an aesthetically pleasing beverage. Upon inquiring about the possibility of creating designs, I was assured by the courteous cashier that indeed, they were capable of doing so. However, upon collecting my order, I was dismayed to discover the absence of any design whatsoever. Further investigation revealed that the barista responsible for preparing my beverage did not customarily create designs for chai tea lattes, which I found somewhat disappointing. Nonetheless, I chose to appreciate the ambiance and savor the taste of my beverage while seated in the upper level of the venue, where I was struck by the captivating wall decor and library of vintage encyclopedias. Additionally, I sampled a delectable gluten-free cookie and several macaroons, which contributed to an overall satisfying experience. Although the prices may be considered slightly elevated, I believe this location offers a unique and enjoyable alternative to routine coffee shops, and I look forward to revisiting in the future."

Dear Hotel Chocolat

I want you to know I dreamed about you last night, I think I might be in love.

yours,

Jd

...........But really what an awesome shop. Was lucky enough to be there last night for a tasting that was free but I still ended up spending £30 on things to take home with me.

Staff are great, welcoming, banterous and inlove with what they are selling. Was treated to a great avriety of their treats my favourite being a chilli caramel!! Nom!!!!

Their Cocoa-coffee shop at the back is inspired - loved my wee machiato.

Very much looking fwd to cooking with the cocoa meat rub. This place is a palace of chocolate and a must visit for anyone!!! :o)

"The eatery in question does not conform to the characteristics typically associated with a Red Lobster establishment, which serves as the primary motivation behind my frequent visits; said restaurant boasts immaculate restrooms, an accommodating and attentive waitstaffâincluding, might I add, a certain dashing male server who shall remain namelessâa delectable array of barbecue dishes, and a happy hour experience that is nothing short of extraordinary, despite my ambivalence towards the live musical performances occasionally featured therein."

Love this place! Lettuce wraps amazing! Egg rolls so good! Love the passion tea! Good service good food good times. This location is not as busy as some of the others so it's a great place on a Friday night!

"The ambiance exudes an aura of tranquility, effectively cultivating a sense of serenity without succumbing to the pitfalls of excessive Zen-like pretentiousness. The massage rooms, appointed with state-of-the-art amenities, afford clients the opportunity to curate their own personalized sonic experiences, while also boasting visually striking elements such as floral arrangements and scented (or unscented) essential oils that envelop the senses in a cocoon of relaxation. The staff, distinguished by their exceptional benevolence, foster an environment that is both welcoming and nurturing. Furthermore, the locker area is equipped with all the necessary accoutrements, allowing patrons to seamlessly transition from their therapeutic indulgences to their professional obligations outside the spa's walls. Ideal for those seeking a solitary spa experience, the establishment's layout and atmosphere actively encourage quiet contemplation, creating a truly divine setting."

I'm not going to rehash what's been stated hear a billion times, this place is solid.\n\nBut due try to get a Sunday brunch reservation about a month in advance, the brunch menu is unique and unbelievable.  Skip the bloody mary bar and just get something off of the menu.

"Situated in the southwestern region, this vape store boasts of being the first of its kind, offering an extensive array of products at remarkably affordable prices, thereby catering to the diverse preferences of its clientele. The assortment of items available for purchase is truly impressive, with new additions being made on a regular basis, much to the delight of enthusiasts who visit the store frequently. Moreover, the staff members are incredibly cordial and knowledgeable, providing expert guidance to customers seeking advice on selecting the most suitable e-juice flavors from their vast collection."

"My propensity for bestowing perfect scores is limited, and I shall elucidate the reasoning behind this eatery's exceptional rating. Unlike the plethora of Chinese fast-food establishments I have had the pleasure of visiting, this particular venue transcends expectations in terms of quality, quantity, and flavor. Upon entering the premises, I was immediately struck by the spotless ambiance and warm demeanor of the staff. The lunch menu offered an array of options at an unbeatable price point, with beverages included for a mere $7.00 per person. Opting for the house chicken with a spicy twist, I relished each bite, finding the heat level to be satisfactorily tangible without overwhelming my palate. My companion's selection of Orange Chicken proved nothing short of spectacular, with generous portions that could easily satiate three to four patrons. The freshness and temperature of the dishes, expertly prepared while we waited, were truly impressive. In conclusion, this culinary gem has set a new standard for its peers in the local area, ensuring that future visits from yours truly will be numerous and frequent. I wholeheartedly endorse this establishment and encourage potential patrons to partake in the delightful experience that awaits them."

"As an inhabitant of South Scottsdale, I can unequivocally attest that this culinary establishment constitutes a veritable treasure. The comestibles served here are not only remarkably fresh but also tantalizingly delectable, courtesy of the innovative and farm-to-table approach adopted by the chef. Furthermore, the mixology program offered at this esteemed venue is unwaveringly committed to showcasing genuine artisanal spirits, which are certain to satiate the palates of even the most discerning patrons. Lastly, the hospitality proffered by the staff is of the highest order, ensuring that each visitor experiences an unforgettably delightful dining experience, devoid of any trace of disappointment."

"Assessing the overall quality of this culinary establishment, I would venture to say that while it may not necessarily qualify as a five-star restaurant in the classical sense, it undoubtedly merits such a rating in terms of its inventive and flavorsome menu offerings, exceptional customer service, and unwavering attention to detail. Indeed, each dish I have had the pleasure of sampling has been nothing short of exquisite, showcasing an impressive level of creativity and expertise in its preparation. Furthermore, the staff has consistently demonstrated a remarkable level of proficiency, cordiality, and attentiveness, ensuring that my beverages were always replenished in a timely and generous manner. In conclusion, I would highly recommend this eatery to anyone seeking a truly satisfying dining experience at a reasonable price point."

"This culinary establishment boasts an exceptional array of seafood delicacies, specifically their fish and chips, which are unparalleled in quality and flavor, making it an ideal destination for families and groups of friends seeking a gastronomical experience. Each dish presented at our table exuded an aura of excellence, leaving me eager to sample more of their offerings. In addition, they possess an extensive selection of artisanal beers, further solidifying their reputation as a superior British pub. The server's proficiency in describing the menu and dessert options was impressive, ensuring that each patron can make an informed decision regarding their culinary choices. It is imperative that one visits this pub to avoid any regretful omissions in their dining experiences."

"I have an immense fondness for this establishment, as it consistently offers a warm and welcoming ambiance, along with delectable fare, particularly their exceptional cheese curds and succulent chicken tenders, which are unparalleled in quality and taste. Moreover, this restaurant ranks among my most preferred dining destinations within the city of Madison, owing to its commitment to providing an enjoyable and satisfying culinary experience for its patrons."

Nestled in a prime location at the intersection of Higley and Ray in the bustling town of Gilbert, The Coffee Shop boasts an array of delectable omelettes that are sure to satiate even the most discerning palates. As an ardent devotee of this quaint eatery, I habitually opt for the savory Ham and Cheddar omelette, accompanied by a side of crispy potatoes that are simply divine. To further enhance the culinary experience, a splash of fresh orange juice is the perfect complement. While the price point may seem a tad steep at approximately $9, the quality and quantity of the fare more than justify the expense. As such, I make it a point to frequent this cozy establishment every Friday, where I can indulge in a leisurely breakfast while working or simply enjoying the convivial atmosphere. Feel free to join me on a forthcoming Friday, dear Facebook friends, and relish in the epicurean delights that The Coffee Shop has to offer!

"It is utterly impossible for me to articulate the extent of my gratitude! While on holiday in Las Vegas, we decided to venture beyond the strip due to the exorbitant cost and uninspiring culinary options. Serendipitously, we stumbled upon Ventano's through an online search, and our expectations were vastly surpassed. Upon entering the establishment, we were immediately struck by the extraordinary ambiance, which was further enhanced by the exceptional service provided by Danielle and the rest of the team. Their seamless coordination ensured that the breathtaking view of the strip and the impending sunset remained unobstructed, with each member of the staff working in perfect harmony to adjust the blinds accordingly. Furthermore, the delectable cuisine and remarkably reasonable prices only served to augment the already exceptional dining experience. It is truly baffling as to why there wasn't a queue extending out the door. If I were a resident of Henderson, I would unquestionably frequent Ventano's with great regularity. My sincere appreciation extends to the staff for their attentive hospitality and for creating a truly memorable evening."

"Rosie's culinary creations, specifically their delectable doughnuts, have proven to be the most scrumptious and satisfying treats I have had the pleasure of indulging in during my extensive travels for business purposes. Their exceptional quality, coupled with an unparalleled attention to detail in terms of texture and flavor, consistently leaves me in a state of gastronomic euphoria. Moreover, their expertly brewed espresso serves as the perfect accompaniment to these sugary delights. It is my unequivocal recommendation that consuming a Rosie's doughnut will undoubtedly enhance your daily experience."

This evaluation pertains specifically to the bar sector. During a November 2010 excursion to Las Vegas, my spouse and I opted to sample a variety of dining establishments offered by Mandalay, and given the abundance of acclaim bestowed upon Aureole's happy hour, we decided to venture forth to its bar and indulge in an assortment of appetizers and two-for-one wine flights. Our bartender proved to be both hospitable and attentive, accommodating our preferences by replacing a wine in my flight that did not meet my approval with an alternative selection. Furthermore, he afforded us the opportunity to experiment with the state-of-the-art digital wine list and maintained a vigilant watch over our requirements throughout the entirety of the evening. Following our wine flights, he recommended a selection of dessert wines that served as a fitting conclusion to our Aureole experience, effectively preparing us for our subsequent foray into the casino, our inhibitions now diminished. In summary, our time spent at the bar was indeed agreeable, and I must confess that I harbor a certain degree of melancholy in response to the unfavorable assessments Aureole has garnered of late. Despite this, I have always been intrigued by the prospect of enjoying a meal at this establishment, and I shall defer my visit until such time as conditions improve.

"I have an immense fondness for this particular Petsmart establishment, as it has proven to be a veritable treasure trove of all things pertinent to the upkeep and well-being of my beloved animal companions. My affection for this store is further augmented by the fact that I have had the privilege of adopting both my feline friend and canine companion from this very location, and have also availed myself of the expert services offered by their esteemed grooming salon on multiple occasions (albeit, not in a personal capacity, but rather on behalf of my furry charges). Moreover, I must commend the staff at this establishment for their unwavering dedication to providing exceptional customer service, as they consistently go to great lengths to assist patrons in identifying and procuring the items they require, thereby creating a truly pleasant and hassle-free shopping experience."

I have been patronizing Elliott's for a considerable amount of time now, and they have rapidly become one of the few establishments in the Valley that I can rely on. I have taken my 2000 BMW to them on multiple occasions, seeking their expertise for an array of issues ranging from significant to insignificant; including but not limited to, a malfunctioning ABS module, a non-operational A/C unit, defective wheel sensors, and a dysfunctional thermostat, among numerous others.  

Throughout my interactions with them, they have consistently demonstrated exceptional communication skills, transparency, and fairness. They have kept me informed throughout the entire process, meticulously detailing the nature of the problem, the methodology of rectification, and the associated costs. They have always been judicious in their approach, refraining from addressing superfluous issues and focusing solely on necessary repairs. Their turnaround time has been impressive, with recent instances showcasing their efficiency; for instance, they replaced my alternator within the same day. Their team boasts proficient and personable individuals who are always eager to offer comprehensive explanations to any queries I may have, providing insight into their workings. 

I strongly endorse Elliott's Auto Electric to any individual seeking prompt, economical, and reliable services rendered by knowledgeable professionals who possess a thorough understanding of their craft.

It must be a Vegas thing, but you cannot beat a store that servers adult slurpies. The service is quick and you are on your way to explore the main drag with drink in hand. Keep your container and you will save a dollar or two on your refill. It is also a small way to save the planet.

I had been wanting to stay at the Sanctuary for a while now, and we decided on a quick 3 night vacation last week.  I must say we were extremely impressed with the resort, and cannot wait to go back!  The resort is a quiet paradise; it's in top-notch condition, with beautiful grounds, rooms, and amazing service.  The spa was a great experience; we both had reflexology treatments, and were able to spend time in the whirlpool and eucalyptus steam room as well.  The $ we spent on this vacation was well worth it!

"My affection towards District One knows no bounds, as I have had the pleasure of experiencing exceptional service and delectable culinary delights during my recent visit. Specifically, the bartender Adrian has left an indelible mark on my dining experience, as her expertise in mixology and gastronomy has resulted in a harmonious union of flavors that tantalize my taste buds. Her recommendation of the Stir-Fried Pepper Lobster with Garlic Noodles was nothing short of inspired, as the dish's complexity and depth of flavor were truly remarkable. The generous portion size, which clocked in at a whopping three pounds, only added to the overall sense of indulgence and satisfaction. My sincere gratitude extends to Adrian for making my birthday celebration truly unforgettable, and I must admit that the coconut mojitos she crafted were nothing short of mind-blowing."

"It was a truly delightful experience collaborating with such a proficient and amiable team, as evidenced by the exceptional customer service they provided on February 11, 2014. Despite the inclement weather conditions prevailing during the initial visit for an estimate, I opted to exercise patience and reschedule the appointment for a later date. Upon their return, I was thoroughly impressed by the meticulous attention to detail and unparalleled expertise displayed by the crew in cleaning my windows and screens. The dramatic transformation was nothing short of remarkable, considering the prolonged duration since their last cleaning approximately five years prior. Needless to say, I am exceedingly grateful and will unquestionably avail myself of their services on a more frequent basis, ideally annually, given the eminently reasonable cost."

"Indubitably, this eatery reigns supreme among establishments serving pho noodles, and it is my unequivocal recommendation that aficionados of noodle-based soups pay a visit to this culinary haven, as they are bound to be impressed by the delectable fare served within its confines."

We were utterly enchanted by Carlsbad Tavern, as it surpassed our expectations profoundly. Upon entering, we were struck by the alluring ambiance of the patio, which featured a fireplace, palm trees, and water elements that harmonized beautifully with the late evening setting. Furthermore, we availed ourselves of several cocktails from their Late Night menu, which served as an excellent complement to our culinary experience. Our server recommended the New Mexican pot stickers, which we found to be truly sublime; the accompanying sauce was so delectable that we could have easily devoured every last drop of it, had we not been concerned with maintaining a semblance of decorum. Unfortunately, we discovered this gem on the final night of our vacation, thereby precluding us from revisiting it again during our stay. Nonetheless, we wholeheartedly endorse this establishment, as its atmosphere, service, and cuisine are truly exceptional. Therefore, we strongly advise incorporating Carlsbad Tavern into your dining itinerary, as you are unlikely to encounter any disappointment.

Great place to get the things you just can't find at the big chain stores.
High quality pet food, snacks, toys, cloths, and staff that care.
The store is small, but well worth the trip.  You won't be disappointed.
I just moved to the area, and after doing a little research online, I found that this place carried not only the high end food I feed my dog, but also the brand of shoes I wanted to protect my dog's feet from the hot ground here in Phoenix.  I looked some more, and they carry, or deal in just about every high end food on the market, and just about anything worth getting for your dog, and they even have a few items for your feline friend too.

"Extol the virtues of Smart Security's offerings, as they are truly impressive! Joshua possesses an immense amount of expertise in the realm of security, and his erudite demeanor makes him more than capable of addressing any queries or concerns you may have. Do not hesitate to establish communication with him via telephone or through the innovative medium of smartphone applications."

Seitdem ich 2004 zum ersten Mal hier war (ich bin in eine Wohnung gegenüber eingezogen) ist der Mevlana für mich mit Abstand der beste Dönerladen weit und breit. Die 4 EUR für einen Yufka bezahle ich bei der Qualität gerne! Insbesondere beim Fleisch wird auf höchste Qualität geachtet, in 7 Jahren hatte ich nicht ein einziges Mal etwas zu bemängeln.


 Besonders zu empfehlen ist die Döner-Pizza mit Creme Fraiche und Paprika, gebacken im Steinofen.


 Im Sommer kann man auch schön draußen sitzen.


 Der Chef ist der netteste Dönerladenchef den ich kenne, er kennt mich noch immer mit Namen (so wie auch viele seiner anderen Gäste), auch wenn ich auf Grund eines Umzugs in einen anderen Stadtteil leider nicht mehr ganz so regelmäßig vorbeikomme.

This truly is a spectacular dining establishment. I bring all my craigslist dates here for the elegant environment and well cultured Spanish service staff. If you thought eating at the house in \"Beauty and The Beast\" was classic, you have yet to try whattaburger. Swing by your local drug dealer first and I can assure you that all the appliances will be talking you into being their guest! Long live McDonalds!\n\nGod bless

"Culinary excellence abounds at this esteemed eatery, as evidenced by my personal experience on two separate occasions. The ambiance is characterized by an air of intimacy, which is complemented by attentive and proficient service. Furthermore, the fare served here is truly exceptional, with the garlic and spinach nan and chicken tiki masala being particularly noteworthy. These dishes are a testament to the culinary prowess of the chef and the commitment to quality that permeates every aspect of this establishment."

It is our last day in Montreal and we were looking for one last lunch to close out our wonderful trip. We stumbled to Cafe Cherrier and were happy as soon as we stepped in. It was hustling and bustling with a local crowd including some business lunches. Was really interesting to see and observe. Really nice French food lunch. I had the French onion soup which was excellent and a Duck Confit with frites and salad. The salad was fresh and had a light vinaigrette. The duck was cooked close to perfect. Bread was super tasty and wine was light but flavorful.

"As residents of Seville, we have been frequenting the esteemed Blue32 establishment, situated at the intersection of Val Vista and Williams Field. Our ardent anticipation preceding its opening has culminated in lofty expectations, which have been successively surpassed during our last two visits. 

On our previous excursion, we had the pleasure of being attended by a server named Amanda, whose exceptional service and amiable demeanor left an indelible impression upon us. The culinary offerings, notably the flavorsome Alfredo pasta, lived up to our expectations, while the strawberry daiquiri, crafted with fresh strawberries instead of saccharine corn syrup mixture, proved to be an unparalleled delight. 

During our most recent visit, we regrettably failed to recall the name of our exceptional server, whom we have now immortalized in this review as a token of our appreciation. Her considerate nature was exemplified when, in the face of a large party arriving and necessitating additional tables and chairs, she kindly informed us of the situation, allowing us to expedite our ordering process before the new patrons were seated. Throughout our dining experience, we were consistently provided with attentive service, timely refills of drinks and water, and flawless execution of our orders, all of which were delivered with great warmth and hospitality. Furthermore, we must reiterate our encomium for the delectable fresh strawberry daiquiris, a highlight that cannot be overlooked."
Go soft and juicy burgers!  I dream and crave these burgers.  Basic cheese burger with pickles and they special mustard.

This constituted my maiden encounter with Gunnel's, whereupon I opted to have them install Firestone HD airbags, complemented by an onboard compressor system, within my work truck.  The total cost of this endeavor amounted to $800, yet the acquisition of these particular bags proved to be precisely what I required.  Although Gunnel's experienced a brief delay in accommodating my request, specifically five days, their execution of the task was unequivocally consistent with their promises, culminating in a satisfactory conclusion.  Moreover, the visual assessment of their handiwork conveyed an impression of proficiency.  Thus, I found myself in a state of contentment, concurrently ensuring that my vehicle would no longer experience the undesirable sensation of dragging its bumper while towing my trailer.

"Attempting to discover an economical yet delectable dining establishment on the Plateau may prove to be a formidable challenge, but fear not, for we have unearthed a hidden gem that offers an array of culinary delights at a most reasonable price point of merely $5.00 per dish, inclusive of desserts. Be advised, however, that the menu appears to emphasize rich, indulgent fare such as poutine, hot dogs topped with macaroni and cheese, and an assortment of burgers.
