For those who prioritize cardiovascular health, fear not, as vegetarian options and lighter fare selections are also available. We sampled the vegetable wrap, which was replete with fresh, crisp produce encased in a verdant tortilla, accompanied by a decadent chocolate mousse infused with raspberry coulis for dessert - truly a gastronomic delight! Our companion opted for the curried chicken dish, followed by the identical dessert, and declared it superior to their previous experience at Juliette & Chocolate, and at a considerably lower cost, oh my! This quaint eatery boasts an eccentric, retro-oddball ambiance, complete with makeshift chandeliers fashioned from vintage desk lamps, antique 78 records serving as placemats, and graffiti-adorned walls, yet it all converges to create a captivating atmosphere. The service was prompt, courteous, and informative, ensuring a thoroughly enjoyable dining experience."

Five stars is for food only !! Hands down best pastrami I've ever had. Maybe best sandwich period. I got the pastrami Reuben on sourdough. The gentleman on the meat sliding station let me sample the corn beef and pastrami to see which I liked better. He was very friendly but the two girls working the other counters were frowning and not friendly. .  I will def be returning on my next Vegas trip.

Located directly opposite Sugars, this culinary haven beckoned to us with its extensive array of delectable offerings, enticing us to partake in a gastronomical escapade. Following the recommendation of Michelle E., we embarked on a gastronomic adventure, indulging in a light repast after an invigorating aquatic excursion at Planet Hollywood Hotel. The menu boasts an impressive assortment of options, each dish showcasing unique flavors and textures designed to tantalize the taste buds. While some items may appear unremarkable, the bread serves as the piÃ¨ce de rÃ©sistance, elevating each dish to new heights of culinary excellence. Patrons can select from an assortment of soups, hot sandwiches, wraps, and salads, all carefully crafted to satiate hunger and delight the senses. Upon ordering, a buzzer and receipt are presented, allowing individuals to peruse an array of additional delights, including potato salad, macaroni salad, fruit cups, brownies, chips, and, most notably, ice cream sandwiches. The abundance of choices can be overwhelming, yet in a manner that is both pleasurable and exciting. My culinary journey led me to sample the Full Montague, featuring freshly roasted beef, turkey, aged Swiss and sharp cheddar cheese, lettuce, roma tomatoes, and the Earl's mustard sauce, all expertly assembled between slices of exceptional bread. The roast beef was cooked to perfection, displaying a satisfying texture that complemented the other ingredients flawlessly. Additionally, I savored the broccoli cheddar soup, which proved to be one of the most delectable versions I have had the pleasure of consuming. Michelle E. supplemented our meal with a container of brownie bites, rendering a visit to Sugars unnecessary. Earl of Sandwich, your establishment has secured a position among the top five sandwich shops I have visited, and rest assured, I shall return, eager to indulge in another satisfying dining experience.

"My spouse and I had the privilege of hosting our son's pre-wedding festivities at the esteemed Spiedini's establishment, in collaboration with the consummate professional, Tonya, who demonstrated an unwavering commitment to ensuring a seamless and memorable experience. The ensuing soirÃ©e was nothing short of magnificent, garnering effusive accolades from our entire coterie of relatives, numbering an impressive sixty individuals, thereby underscoring the exceptional quality of both the culinary offerings and hospitable services proffered by the venue. Of particular note was the presence and involvement of Chef Gustav Mauler, whose expertise and dedication played a pivotal role in orchestrating a truly unforgettable gathering. Consequently, I would enthusiastically endorse this fine dining establishment to any individual seeking a refined and satisfying dining experience."

Incredible service and attention to detail. Each person in our group of 4 was thrilled with their manicures. Peter and his crew are perfectionists and artists, and are committed to what they do. \n\nIt was my twin sisters' birthdays, and they both received a complimentary bottle of wine! We're not from Vegas, but this will be a part of our itinerary every trip!

I personally visited the 3933 St Denis location, and my experience was nothing short of exceptional. As a first-time tattoo recipient, I was intent on selecting an establishment that would not only provide excellent customer service but also foster a welcoming ambiance, thereby ensuring that I felt entirely at ease throughout the process. Upon entering MTL Tattoo on a weekend, I was promptly acknowledged, and my queries were thoroughly addressed without any necessity for me to probe further. Convinced that I had discovered the optimal location for my tattoo endeavor, I elected to proceed with MTL Tattoo. 
  Prior to the scheduled date of my tattooing session, I contacted them via telephone to inquire about availability, and I was delightfully informed that they could accommodate me without any issues.Upon arriving at the designated time, I encountered Tony, the very same individual with whom I had spoken earlier over the phone. His warm and friendly demeanor put me at ease instantaneously, and he efficiently expedited the necessary paperwork and preparations. Throughout the entire procedure, Tony persistently ensured that I felt relaxed and reassured, elaborating on each step he took and employing techniques to divert my attention whenever necessary. The whole experience was utterly seamless and enjoyable, thanks to Tony's remarkable efficiency and compassion. 
  In conclusion, my encounter with MTL Tattoo was undoubtedly memorable, and I would unhesitatingly endorse their services to anyone seeking a top-notch tattoo experience. My sincere appreciation extends to Tony and the rest of the team for their extraordinary hospitality and proficiency.

Hash House is hands down the best place for breakfast in Vegas. Their portions are too big for on the spot consumption which is an issue and almost gets them four stars from me. Not too many people know this, but Hash House also serves up great lunch. This is a must visit whether you are a resident or tourist.

I live close to the greenway half moon and loved this place so my fiancé and I decided to try to other location, heard they had different food and different interior. 

We sat at the bar, I ordered some wings (cant get enough of half moons wings) and my fiancé ordered a burger and a side of wings.
WINGS WERE PERFECT.
My fiancé didn't like the bun as much on the burger but it was still pretty good.

I really like the change up of this bar, I loved the environment and the way everything flows.

The best part about this visit was probably the bartender, her name was Alexandra.
Because of her my fiancé and I stayed at least an hour past the time we intended on leaving. She did a damn good job getting my fiancé drunk and we had a blast with her. 
Very outgoing girl and the customers around me seemed to think the same.

We will 100% be back on a regular basis!

"Tina Mateo, a veritable fount of effervescent energy and unwavering dedication, imbues this establishment with an unparalleled sense of conviviality and hospitable warmth, rendering it an ideal venue for socializing and enjoying delectable fare and enticing gaming promotions, albeit with a restricted selection of nocturnal victuals."

"Cooper Coons, Ltd., a preeminent legal establishment specializing in estate planning and corporate law, provided my spouse and me with invaluable assistance in establishing our family trust, will, and advanced medical directives. We were impressed by the meticulous manner in which they elucidated each step of the process, enabling us to feel confident that we had selected the optimal firm for our needs. Upon visiting their well-appointed office, we encountered a team of amiable professionals who demonstrated a genuine commitment to fostering enduring relationships with their clientele. By taking the time to familiarize themselves with their patrons' unique circumstances and objectives, Cooper Coons, Ltd. ensures that their clients are empowered to make astute decisions that safeguard their interests. In light of the exceptional service we received, we intend to engage their expertise in establishing our Limited Liability Company in the forthcoming months. I would unhesitatingly recommend this esteemed organization to any individual seeking top-tier legal counsel."

Hands down the best restaurant around. If I were to take one place to a desert island, it would be Houstons. BridgetZ gives me a hard time because it's a chain, but she was also spoiled by living in Manhattan for a while. I still bet she'd put it in her top 5. Things I love:
Hamburger (best in town)
Spinach Artichoke Dip 
Ribs (best I have ever had)
Ahi Tuna Salad (if you are needing to keep it light)
Chicken tenders

Went back today for the first time since moving across town...got a soy latte and pastry. As usual, the staff was incredible. The soy latte cannot be beat...as Jason S. mentioned, they are one of the only places in town that can do a soy latte correctly.

I did notice a sign that their muffins are all $1 and cookies are $1.50 after 4pm - though you have to pay in cash.  This makes me want to go back at 4pm just to get the leftovers...they are amazing! 

Today I saw, a true sign of a real coffee shop...two groups of people engaged in conversations about current issues...

"It is my utmost pleasure to extol the virtues of Ali Murray, the Catering Sales Manager at the esteemed Mandarin Oriental Las Vegas. Throughout our correspondence regarding the possibility of hosting an upcoming event at the resort, Ali demonstrated unwavering promptness, exemplary helpfulness, and meticulous attention to detail in her email responses. Upon our recent visit to Las Vegas, I had the privilege of arranging a meeting with Ali, who graciously awaited our arrival in the lobby, and subsequently provided us with a comprehensive and impressive tour of the Mandarin Oriental's opulent facilities. It is worth noting that the resort's ambiance exudes sophistication and tranquility, offering a serene oasis amidst the vibrant energy of Las Vegas, without being excessively removed from the city's attractions. Ali's exceptional dedication to ensuring our satisfaction was further underscored by her follow-up efforts upon our return, soliciting feedback and offering assistance where needed. Although we ultimately opted for an alternative arrangement, the Mandarin Oriental remains a prime consideration for future events, largely due to Ali's exceptional representation of the resort's commitment to excellence. I would enthusiastically endorse collaborating with Ali, as she embodies the epitome of professionalism, warmth, and dedication to customer satisfaction."

"It is not surprising that individuals are inclining towards converging at this location, as it offers an amicable ambiance and delectable consumables, thereby catering to both tourists and residents. The hospitable and erudite personnel are proficient in guiding patrons through their options, ensuring an optimal dining experience. Particularly noteworthy are the delectable bruschetta offerings, boasting innovative combinations of fresh ingredients such as brie and apple, as well as dates accompanied by pistachios. To avoid disappointment, reservations are recommended, as the stylish throng is substantial. Furthermore, the establishment offers a gratifying happy hour promotion, featuring wine by the glass at a mere $5 prior to 5 pm."

Las Vegas has a big islander community, so Hawaiian food is easy to come by. I've been to a bunch of different restaurants, and Ohana definitely stands out.

Price wise, it's similarly priced with other establishments of its kind. However, the servings seem a bit bigger than normal. I order the mini katsu (one of my favorite dishes), and can barely finish it. Don't get me wrong, your boy can eat. I've tried maybe 6 or so of their dishes, and have yet to be disappointed. 

I haven't had a bad experience yet at this place. The service is always nice. They greet you when you come in and say goodbye when you walk out. Wait time for food is normal. A coworker and I have even recommended that our office have Ohana cater a luncheon, and the whole office loved their food.

This place is amazing, once again, this place rocks. Today I had the Quezadilla with Argentine beef and chimichurri sauce, fresh avocados, just to die for!!! I would ditch any overprice mexican restaurant for the oportunity to eat here, they kick butt!!\n\nIf you like the gourmet food from Cancun, then you will not be desapointed!!!

"Esteemed servers, pristine table settings, and immaculate flooring. Generous servings of culinary delights at reasonable tariffs. Gastronomical experience augmented by superior quality brews."

Please let me know if you have any questions or need further clarification.

We were seated promptly by a friendly beautiful hostess.

Michelle our waiter did a fantastic job on keeping the drinks flowing and the courses coming out on time and perfectly cooked bone in rib eye.   The sides (steamed spinach, garlic mash and sautéed mushrooms were outstanding completing a great meal.

The decor is modern and well laid out with an extensive wine menu.  We recommend making reservations well in advance.

J&O

"It is utterly astonishing that I have yet to pen a review for this esteemed establishment, and My apologies for the oversight. Allow me to effusively extol the virtues of this captivating venue. If you are perusing this testimonial, deliberating whether to partake in the indulgences offered herein, permit me to unequivocally assure you that an evening spent within these walls shall be nothing short of magnificent. The ambiance is convivial, the proprietor and staff are cordial and hospitable, and the diversions available, including board games and poetry slams, serve to foster an air of camaraderie and joviality. Furthermore, I implore you to don your most fashionable headwear on Fridays, as it shall afford you a unique and gratifying experience. In conclusion, I urge you to partake in the merriment and revelry that this enchanting locale has to offer."

"Upon embarking on the process of reacquainting myself with the art of cycling following an extended hiatus, I was delighted to encounter a bicycle store that demonstrated a genuine interest in ensuring my safety and well-being through the provision of meticulous guidance and exhaustive responses to my queries. Although I did not purchase my bicycle from this particular establishment, the staff's hospitable demeanor and fervent commitment to promoting a positive customer experience left me with the impression that I was their top priority. Kudos to this business for prioritizing rider support and fostering a culture of exceptional service."

You never know what you will see on Fremont st. The place for a cheep show from the man in the box to the guy painting with spray paint to the guy doing clay sculpture while you wait also you may see jesus. The light show if pretty cool to.

My son had a blast here. 

We went on a lazy Sunday afternoon, around 1pm and stayed until 4pm.

We only paid $10 for an all day access (unless you go out and decide to come back later, then you have to pay again)

I wish we packed some food though, because you can basically pack your breakfast, lunch and dinner and stay there all day and still pay $10.00.

I didn't have any problems with other kids, or moms not watching theirs. 
It was a really good experience for us.

Besides, you can't bash a business when that happens to you. The parents are responsible for their kids, not the business.

The place is clean. I don't mean SANITIZED but it doesn't have the sticky feel or look to it, and the play sets are not dark or dirty or anything.

WOULD DEFINITELY RECOMMEND!

"It is utterly astounding! I have recently relocated my domicile to a proximate location, and I must say, Those Guys Pizza is an absolute culinary delight! Their spinach salad is a delectable masterpiece that has captured my palate with its unparalleled flavor and freshness. Furthermore, the staff at this esteemed establishment has demonstrated an exceptional level of cordiality and hospitality, making me feel welcome and content. Indeed, their pizza has satiated my hunger and left me in a state of gastronomic bliss!"

A comprehensive examination of exceptional customer service, whereupon, subsequent to our regrettable and conspicuously unusual encounter, we were accorded a telephonic communication from the senior executive overseeing edibles and potables, expressing their most sincere contrition. It is an indisputable fact that human error is an inherent aspect of any operational process; however, it is the mark of truly exceptional establishments to rectify such mistakes with alacrity and proficiency. In our particular situation, the personnel and leadership of Prado displayed an unwavering commitment to ensuring our satisfaction, surpassing our expectations by a considerable margin. Our gratitude extends to the Prado team for an evening that was rendered even more remarkable due to their attentive and solicitous demeanor.

Whenever I have the pleasure of visiting the illustrious city of Las Vegas, I invariably ensure that I allocate sufficient time to partake in a leisurely sojourn to CASA FUENTE, whereupon I indulge in a delectable mojito accompanied by one of their signature house blend torpedos, all the while luxuriating in the tranquil ambiance of the outdoor patio, concurrently indulging in the captivating spectacle of SportsCenter on one of the establishment's numerous televisions. The experience is nothing short of sublime, particularly during the balmy afternoons; however, it is worth noting that the prices, although admittedly steep, are somewhat offset by the unparalleled level of elegance and sophistication that permeates the entire establishment, thereby rendering the expense relatively inconsequential in light of the exceptional quality of the experience. Moreover, the weekend of the BIG SMOKE in November offers an especially unique and memorable experience, with the nights being suffused with an air of excitement and vivacity that is palpable and contagious, making it an ideal time to partake in the festivities and revel in the unbridled joy and camaraderie that permeates the atmosphere.

"It has been an extended period of time since my last review of Komol was updated, thus, I decided to provide a new assessment. The culinary offerings at this establishment continue to impress, as evidenced by my recent experience. Specifically, I finally had the opportunity to sample their herbal salad, which I found to be invigorating and utterly delectable. The flavors were expertly balanced, with a subtle yet satisfying spiciness complemented by a pleasing texture. My fellow diners opted for the mee krob as a starter, in addition to the spicy mint chicken, pork pad thai, and another poultry dish whose name escapes me at present. Each individual expressed immense satisfaction with their respective meals. Furthermore, I ordered a portion of garlic fried rice with beef to take away for my partner, and upon sampling it, I found it to be equally enjoyable. The service at this venue can be somewhat inconsistent, but on this particular visit, the staff was exceptionally attentive and diligent in refilling our water glasses. Notably, they handled the substantial number of patrons during the holiday season with remarkable proficiency, demonstrating their ability to accommodate large crowds effectively."
Sam met me at the service area, checked in my vehicle for its appointment and got me a curtesy vehicle. I was excite to get my car back clean and ready to go.

"A culinary haven that exclusively purveys maple bacon during weekends, rendering it an ardently coveted indulgence, thus making the prolonged anticipation tantamount to an unwavering craving. Adjacent to this edible Eden lies a daunting predicament; specifically, an establishment that seemingly conspires against my waistline's well-being. Alas, the enticing aroma and delectable taste of freshly baked donuts precludes any possibility of abstinence. Furthermore, the staff's hospitable demeanor, reasonable pricing, and mouthwatering treats foster an atmosphere that not only invites, but also encourages repeated visits. As such, this venue has secured a distinguished position as my preferred destination for donut indulgence within the Phoenix/Scottsdale region. HIGHLY recommended, indeed!"

Adrian from MC Plumbing rendered exceptional service when he arrived punctually for the scheduled appointment, as the water heater's pilot light was experiencing frequent extinguishment, which necessitated a warranty repair that did not incur any additional charges due to the company's commitment to providing top-notch customer satisfaction through their same-day service policy.

"Cobra Kai constitutes the most exceptional fitness center I have had the privilege of attending, with Sim serving as an exemplary mentor in the realm of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu, rendering it an unparalleled institution for those seeking to enhance their physical prowess and mental discipline through the practice of martial arts; thus, I unequivocally endorse this illustrious gymnasium."

Surely, I must express my utmost enthusiasm towards this establishment, as it has managed to procure my patronage on multiple occasions. The ease of parking in the downtown area is indeed a significant advantage, and the ambiance of the restaurant, comprising both an indoor dining area and an outdoor patio, exudes an undeniable charm. Furthermore, the hospitality demonstrated by the staff has been nothing short of exceptional, as they have consistently displayed a warm and accommodating demeanor. Of particular note is the fact that I can avail myself of an unlimited supply of water, which proves especially refreshing during the warmer months. A cursory examination of the menu revealed the presence of a yellow lentil coconut curry soup, which, upon consumption, proved to be not only copious in quantity but also supremely flavorful, and accompanied by two slices of bread for the modest sum of $6. Additionally, my daughter sampled a lemon bar from the display case, which she declared to be utterly sublime and well worth the $2.50 price tag. My anticipation of future visits knows no bounds, as I am eager to partake of other culinary offerings, including the prime rib, whose tantalizing aroma wafted through the air and left me in a state of gastronomic longing, despite its somewhat prohibitive cost of $19.
Eli and his crew are great. They take great care in making my yard look the way I want it. and Eli follows up after every visit to make sure I'm happy and get feedback. I highly recommend them.

"This dining establishment holds a position of prominence among our preferences pertaining to the procurement of culinary delights for consumption off-premises, as their offerings consistently exemplify an impressive degree of freshness, flavor, and abundance. Additionally, we have had the pleasure of interacting with the proprietors, who possess a demeanor that is warm, welcoming, and hospitable. Our inclination towards this eatery is such that we are willing to traverse a considerable distance to acquire their gastronomic creations."

"The pivotal aspect of our visit revolved around the culinary selections, thus, I shall proceed directly to the essence of the matter. The gastronomic delights that captured our attention were the Brussels Sprouts, the mildly piquant Buta Shishito, the exceptionally delectable Crudo, the refreshingly zesty Sake Orenji, the savory Pokuyaki, the succulent bluefin tuna, the flavorsome karaage, the carafe of sake sangria, and lastly, the tantalizing GREENIES, which, in and of themselves, would be sufficient motivation for a revisit. It is worth mentioning that the happy hour interval has been modified to span from 5:00 p.m. to 6:30 p.m., thereby advising prospective patrons to arrive punctually. On a Tuesday evening, during the Magic convention week, we had the privilege of experiencing the hospitality of this establishment, and I must say, the ambiance was tranquil, courtesy of the scarcity of patronage. Our server, Charlie, exhibited remarkable efficiency, affability, and engagement in ensuring an optimal dining experience for us. The entire staff demonstrated a genuine interest in our satisfaction, evident in their solicitude and recommendations. In conclusion, my affection for this eatery has grown exponentially, and I am determined to share this hidden gem with my associates, garnering unwavering admiration for Yonaka."

"I had the privilege of encountering Slade, Donna, and Nancy at a philanthropic event hosted by the Suns organization last week at the W hotel.  They were presenting an assortment of their novel delights, and I must say, they were utterly scrumptious! 

Slade enthusiastically recommended that I sample their salted caramel treat, a component of their new line of artisanal chocolates... oh my goodness - it was sublime!  It was a bite-sized indulgence, thus I didn't feel excessive remorse after consuming it, but it possessed a velvety texture, a perfect balance of saltiness and sweetness, and an unparalleled chocolate flavor.  Absolutely delectable! 

I should have exercised restraint and terminated my sampling there, but the novel line of gourmet candy bars beckoned to me, and I couldn't resist trying one of the 'Rocky Rhode' specials.  This particular delight was slightly larger than a conventional candy bar, and I devoured it without hesitation... Here's how it was described on the menu:

"A wickedly sinful twist on the classic rocky road. Beautiful classic flavors based on a rich milk and white chocolate peanut butter ganache, finished off with toasted marshmallows and candied pecans."

In conclusion, it was an exquisitely decadent and heavenly gourmet treat that I've had the pleasure of indulging in!  Do yourself a favor and visit Wicked's new creations... Oh, and as an aside, it appears that they are transitioning to a new name, Wicked Kitchen Gourmet.  Regardless of whether you refer to them by their previous moniker or their new title, their culinary masterpieces remain consistently extraordinary!"

"If you have yet to indulge in the epicurean delights offered by Wah Kee, it is imperative that you prioritize this establishment as your next culinary adventure. Amidst a plethora of eateries serving pre-fabricated noodles, Wah Kee distinguishes itself by meticulously crafting each dish from scratch, including their noodles, which are made fresh daily by skilled artisans. This quaint, family-owned restaurant has been a local mainstay for an extended period, eschewing the glamorous ambiance of chain restaurants in favor of offering patrons authentic, expertly prepared cuisine at a remarkably reasonable price point. Thus, it is recommended that you bypass the ubiquitous, mass-produced noodle shops and opt for an exceptional dining experience at Wah Kee."

This luxury hotel offered us the most breathtaking panoramic view of the renowned Las Vegas Strip, particularly during the spectacular fountain performances, which were conveniently visible from our spacious and stylish room. The establishment boasted an impressive array of cutting-edge amenities that surpassed our expectations, creating an unparalleled ambiance of modernity and sophistication. It is imperative that prospective visitors select this exceptional lodging option to ensure a truly memorable and unique Sin City experience.

"Upon perusing the pages of Vegas Seven, my attention was drawn to an establishment that piqued my curiosity, compelling me to partake in a culinary excursion to sample its offerings. My expectations were not only met but exceeded, as I relished every morsel of the delectable victuals presented before me. In the company of my significant other, I opted for the dual plate combination, featuring succulent brisket and tender pulled pork, complemented by a duo of tasty yams. My companion's selection of a pulled pork sandwich, accompanied by a scrumptious bacon potato salad, proved to be an astute choice as well. Furthermore, our server kindly offered us a complimentary sweet treat for utilizing their check-in service, which turned out to be an incredible banana pudding that left us both in a state of gastronomic nirvana. The quality of the fare, coupled with the exceptional hospitality displayed by the chef and staff, solidified our resolve to return to this gastronomic haven in the future."

I don't eat sashimi so I can't comment on their fish quality, but I do like cooked rolls and luckily Sushi San has a wide selection.  All the rolls I've tried are delicious and you probably can't go wrong with anything on the menu.\n\nWhat stands out the most to me about this restaurant is their amazing customer service.  I usually order to go and sometimes find \"extras\" in my bag, such as miso soup, edamame, or even an entire extra roll!  The staff is super friendly and it's rare these days to find a restaurant with such a stellar level of customer service.

"Indubitably, my most preferred sandwich of all time. I habitually opt for the Pitts-Burger, and it has consistently been exceptional. Moreover, despite my previous indifference towards coleslaw at other establishments, Primanti's distinctive rendition boasts an unparalleled flavor that harmoniously complements every component of the sandwich. Furthermore, the service at this particular venue has always been satisfactory, yet it is the extraordinary, dream-haunting sandwiches that warrant repeat visits."

During a bachelor party in March, we had the privilege of visiting this esteemed establishment, and our experience was nothing short of extraordinary. The panoramic view from the balcony was truly breathtaking, offering a sweeping vista of the entire city of Las Vegas. While the club itself was somewhat diminutive in size, it in no way detracted from the overall enjoyment we experienced. We opted for bottle service, which was a stark contrast to the lackluster service we've grown accustomed to in our hometown of Atlantic City. The vigilant bouncer ensured that our table remained unencumbered by unwanted patrons, and he even escorted us to the restrooms when the club reached its capacity. As the night progressed, the dancers introduced glowing glasses and foam bars, transforming the club into a kaleidoscope of vibrant colors. Our waitress was attentive, checking in on us regularly to ensure that our beverage needs were met. Even when one of our companions accidentally toppled a table, the staff graciously reassembled it without hesitation, despite our protests. The host demonstrated exceptional hospitality, generously providing us with five bottles at a rate equivalent to three, accommodating our group of ten individuals with ease. It is imperative to display appreciation and generosity towards the staff, as they will undoubtedly reciprocate such kindness with exceptional service.

"Serendipitously stumbled upon this culinary haven today, and my gastronomical expectations were exceeded by an unparalleled degree. The delectable Super Sicilian sandwich I had the pleasure of consuming boasted an assemblage of flavorsome meats, artisanal bread expertly toasted to a golden crisp, a generous portion of melted gouda, and a tangy dressing that harmonized the various components with remarkable proficiency. My fervent desire to partake in their pizza offerings, available solely during the evening hours, was ignited by the exceptional quality of the sandwich, and I am eagerly anticipating my next visit to indulge in their culinary masterpieces. The hospitable staff and seamless service further enhanced the dining experience, solidifying this establishment's status as a veritable gem in the realm of Phoenix's sandwich shops."

Moon stands out as one of the better nightclubs in Vegas. Where to Begin?

Pros
-If you look around well, you can get comps to enter Moon, Playboy Club & Rain for free (or cheaply)
-The View is spectacular, the Vegas strip serves as your backdrop
- Since it is away from the strip, if you get there early enough, the wait is not too bad
-Since Moon is in the Palms, you are guaranteed a young, hip crowd with some of the best hotties Vegas has to offer
-The roof opens up and lets you breathe in some fresh air, when we were there, the roof opened up and produced some fake snow
-The music is very good!
-By Vegas standards, the bars are not too hard to get to
-It is exceedingly superior to the Playboy Club located on the floor below
-The venue itself, the decor, lighting, ambiance, etc. is young, hip and cool!

The only cons I can think of are
-It is harder to get to since it is located off the strip
-It def. draws in a more pretentious crowd 

I was very satisfied with my experience at Moon! it is easily one of the better nightclubs in Vegas!

Nice selection of Fuente Cigars including some very exclusive lines. Knowledgeable and friendly staff, reasonable, not cheap cigars. Top-of-the-line cigars for the most part. And finally, a very nice lounge. Nice to see a classy cigar-bar to enjoy while my wife shops! A win-win!

In my eight-year tenure as a resident of Las Vegas, I had never had the opportunity to dine at Spago, primarily due to its price point being slightly beyond my budgetary constraints. However, upon learning of their twentieth anniversary celebration featuring a roll-back pricing promotion, I deemed it appropriate to partake in the culinary experience offered by this esteemed establishment. In the company of my companion, I visited the restaurant and requested the assistance of the assistant general manager, Drew, in selecting our meals. The following are the dishes he recommended, along with my personal thoughts on each:

Spago's Signature Roasted Beet Goat Cheese Salad, although not necessarily within my typical culinary preferences, proved to be quite delectable.

House Smoked Sturgeon, served with a Crisp Potato Galette and complemented by Horseradish Cream, presented a flavor profile reminiscent of a spicy latke, enhanced by the addition of fish, thus rendering it quite palatable.

The \"Chinois Style\" Colorado Lamb Chops, accompanied by a Cilantro Mint Vinaigrette and Sweet & Sour Eggplant, demonstrated remarkable tenderness and rich flavor, even when consumed independent of the accompanying sauce.

Cantonese Style Roasted Duck, boasting Wild Huckleberries, Ginger, and Stir-Fried Baby Bok Choy, arrived in generous portions, much to our surprise, as we had anticipated receiving only a single main course to share. Consequently, we departed with ample leftovers.

Although the total expenditure surpassed my initial expectations, the quality of the cuisine, combined with the exceptional service, rendered the dining experience truly satisfying. Furthermore, I must commend Spago for their extraordinary bread platter, which unfortunately, I did not have the privilege of sampling extensively due to my limited appetite. My sincere gratitude extends to Drew W. and Scott G. for their contributions to an unforgettable evening.

"We opted for a culinary excursion featuring twice-cooked pork, chicken katsu, and pork pot-stickers, which we retrieved from an establishment specializing in gastronomical delights. My spouse and I were thoroughly captivated by the delectable flavor profiles showcased in both the twice-cooked pork and chicken katsu, as they presented a harmonious blend of diverse taste sensations, diverging from the customary uninspired Chinese seasonings commonly encountered at local eateries. Although the pot-stickers were somewhat diminutive in size, their quality remained satisfactory. I would unhesitatingly place a future order for takeout from Flo's, as my expectations were surpassed by their culinary prowess. In fact, I would confer a perfect five-star rating, commending their exceptional flavors. My anticipation for sampling their additional offerings remains high, and I look forward to exploring more of their menu items."
"Furthermore, upon arriving at the eatery at 5:00 pm on a Tuesday afternoon in mid-May, it was apparent that the bar area was brimming with patrons indulging in happy-hour festivities, while the dining space featured approximately seven tables accommodating four guests each. This level of activity signifies a positive aspect of the restaurant's reputation, particularly during an off-peak tourist season."

This culinary establishment is utterly remarkable.  The chef, a true master of his craft, graced our table with his esteemed presence and extended a warm welcome.  We opted for two of the daily specials, and our palates were thoroughly satiated by the delectable fare.  My dining companion and I both relished every bite of our respective entrees, with mine being the Dagwood sandwich and theirs the Chicken Parm; both dishes showcased the kitchen's proficiency in creating flavorful and visually appealing cuisine.  The sweet treats that followed left us both in a state of unadulterated bliss, particularly the sublime Creme Brulee - a paragon of its kind - and the extravagant indulgence platter, a symphony of rich, savory, and sweet elements that included, but was not limited to, decadent brownies, luscious cheesecake, velvety ice cream, fresh fruit, fluffy whipped cream, and an array of tantalizing cheesecake spring rolls that, on their own, would have been sufficient reason to warrant a future visit.  Given the venue's identity as a sports bar, one might not anticipate encountering such refined and sophisticated culinary offerings, yet, it is undeniably worth experiencing firsthand.  Rest assured, I shall return, as this eatery has secured a place among my favorites.

I have nothing bad to say about my RC Willey experience.

My fiance picked out a new couch in the Henderson store.  We were pleasantly surprised - the salespeople were somehow able to strike the balance between being helpful and letting us browse without pressure.  We chose a beautiful tan leather sofa (which, of course, was backordered).  When it was delivered, I was surprised that the delivery was actually made IN THE TIME FRAME GIVEN!  You know how it goes... they say sometime between 11 and 2, and it ends up being 9 p.m.... well, not this time!  The delivery men worked very hard to get the large couch in our small apartment without destroying anything.  I was surprised that we didn't lose a wall, but they were skilled!

Our couch is in perfect condition.  We even got a follow-up call from the store manager to make sure it was delivered satisfactorily.  All in all, we couldn't be more pleased with RC Willey.  We will be returning when we want more furniture!

My spouse queried, "Is it feasible for you to compose an assessment when I provided you sustenance and you opted not to visit the eatery?" To which I responded, "Indubitably, my love!" Adoration In and Out! Indeed, individuals whose domiciles are situated in regions devoid of In and Out manifest envy towards those of us who possess the capacity to indulge in their mouthwatering burgers at will! These culinary masterpieces boast an unparalleled moisture level and flavor profile that leaves patrons yearning for more. While I'm not particularly fond of their fries, the sheer excellence of their burgers renders them an afterthought; however, I lament the absence of a crispy, curly fry option on their menu, a feature that has become increasingly scarce in today's fast-food landscape, with Chipotle being the sole exception. Apart from that, my better half and I consume In and Out cuisine infrequently, yet with the advent of their novel establishment, we find ourselves frequenting it with greater regularity, thereby contributing to the revitalization of our local community.

"It is my unequivocal conviction that these individuals possess an exceptional proficiency in their culinary endeavors, specifically in regards to the preparation of dishes characteristic of the Mediterranean region. My personal experiences with their spanakopita, tiropita, and chicken gyros have all been extremely satisfactory, and I have had the pleasure of interacting with courteous and accommodating staff members on multiple occasions, both in person and via telephone. Additionally, their delivery services are prompt and efficient, thereby ensuring that customers receive their orders in a timely manner. In conclusion, I highly recommend this establishment for those seeking a genuine Mediterranean dining experience."

Went there for lunch and the food was fantastic! There is a free valet which helps as there seems to be limited parking. Their ice tea is a black/passionfruit blend that was very refreshing. Very trendy decor and I would definitely go back!

"Do not proceed beyond the confines of the Seabass, my dear gastronomic adventurer, for within its walls lies a culinary delight that will satiate your epicurean inclinations and render any further exploration of the menu futile. The miso glaze, a symphony of flavors that harmoniously unite the savory and the sweet, has been perfected to such an extent that it would be a travesty to sample anything else. We, ourselves, have succumbed to the allure of this delectable dish, finding ourselves inexorably drawn to its tantalizing aroma and taste, to the point where we have relinquished all control over our dining decisions, allowing our second choice to be relegated to a mere afterthought. And, indeed, the Crunchy Spicy Yellowtail, a roll of such sublime quality that it defies description, serves as a worthy accompaniment to the Seabass's gustatory splendor. Thusly, it is imperative that you, too, partake in this gastronomic journey and, in doing so, elevate your dining experience to a level hitherto unattained. Reservations, therefore, are an absolute necessity, lest you find yourself bereft of the opportunity to indulge in this culinary masterpiece."

I was a little skeptical about trying a fro-yo place because they are popping up all around the valley, but when I stepped in here, I knew this place was good. They are very inviting and the atmosphere is relaxing. I come in every time i'm in the neighborhood. Yummy flavors!

La Unica boasts an unparalleled culinary experience, with their delectable tacos being a personal favorite of mine, priced at an affordable $1.75 apiece. The burrito Tuawana is also a popular choice among patrons, and for good reason - it's a flavorful masterpiece. Furthermore, the establishment's ice tea is expertly crafted, with a harmonious blend of sweet and unsweetened varieties. The staff at La Unica are exceptionally friendly and welcoming, making each visit a truly enjoyable experience. In my opinion, this eatery reigns supreme in the Charlotte area when it comes to Mexican cuisine. Notably, La Unica is situated in a modest strip mall, with signage that politely dissuades lingering patrons, emphasizing the high volume of customers they routinely serve. Despite this, the restaurant's efficient service and superior offerings make it well worth a visit.

"Amusement abounds at this captivating steakhouse, where an stylish bar scene, replete with a skilled DJ spinning an eclectic mix of tunes, seamlessly converges with an array of cozy tables, affording patrons the luxury of both privacy and prime people-watching opportunities; STK's effervescent ambiance makes it an ideal destination for gastronomes seeking delectable cuisine as well as an animated atmosphere. My affection for this establishment knows no bounds! \n\nThe verdant hue of the Green Intensity Martini imbues it with an enticing allure, while its piquant and invigorating flavors tantalize my taste buds; the silky texture of the tuna tartare, complemented by the subtle heat of the chili oil, elevates it to a culinary masterpiece. The sublime combination of the rich, buttery flavor of the baked bread infused with the pungent tang of blue cheese results in a gustatory experience that transcends the ordinary; the tender, juicy filet medallion, cooked to perfection, satiates my carnivorous cravings, while the accompanying chimichurri sauce, with its perfect balance of herbs and spices, accentuates the flavors of the meat without overpowering it. Although the Parmesan truffle fries fail to live up to their promised potential, with the truffle essence being somewhat indistinct, they remain a satisfying side dish. This eatery's propensity for excellence ensures that patronage will be repeated and frequent."

This course has been within my purview for an extended period, but its cost was a tad beyond my financial means, however, I opted to designate it as a "tax return indulgence" for myself, and I am utterly thrilled with my choice! Each hole presents a unique challenge. The staff exhibits exceptional proficiency. The greens, though slightly imperfect, deliver a genuine roll and remarkable speed. At a tariff of $110 through their official website (booked seven days in advance, which is more economical than GolfNow, incidentally), it offers a substantially better value than the standard North Scottsdale courses, and its quality is on par with, or surpasses that of its peers. Some minor drawbacks include the compacted sand and a few tee boxes with limited level areas. Furthermore, if your ball ventures into the desert, consider it lost. Lastly, I intend to play this course again during its busiest season and multiple times throughout the summer. Do not let this opportunity pass you by; it may eventually become entirely private.

"This establishment serves as our culminating Sunday afternoon venue, subsequent to our religious observances. Their delectable hummus, pitas, pizza, and wraps constitute an epicurean delight, with the hummus trio complemented by grilled fowl and supplementary pitas and cucumbers being our preference. Furthermore, their mahi mahi is a popular selection among our progeny. Additionally, the lavash pizza and red lentil soup are tantamount to gastronomical nirvana for our offspring. It is customary for us to request a half and half mixture of the tropical and green iced tea, which is invariably accompanied by a complimentary to-go cup upon our egress. My spouse and I have had the pleasure of frequenting this establishment since our collegiate years, when we would walk to the PJ in Tempe, located off Apache Boulevard, and now we are fortunate enough to have one within close proximity to our place of residence, thereby facilitating our ability to partake in their salubrious and delectable fare."
The food was outstanding, as were the drinks. The decor is simple, but cool. Service was top notch. Worth the price tag!

"Wow!!! Seriously, suspend whatever activities you are currently engaging in and hasten to Greco Fresh Grille at your earliest convenience. The menu boasts an array of delectable options, including Greek salads, pitas, gyros, kabobs, and vegetarian selections. As I am currently embarking on a health-oriented regimen, I inquired as to whether they could accommodate my request for a singular chicken kabob accompanied by a side of grilled vegetables (not explicitly listed on the menu). The cashier was incredibly obliging and assured me that it would pose no issue. Following a brief interval, she returned with my culinary creations. Initially, I sampled the grilled vegetables, which were bursting with flavor and not excessively salted. Subsequently, I indulged in the extraordinary chicken kabob. Unquestionably, it was the most exceptional specimen I have had the pleasure of consuming, and that is coming from an individual who has an unwavering affection for Greek cuisine. It was tender, juicy, and seasoned to utter perfection with heavenly herbs and spices. I devoured it in a mere five minutes! To further enhance the overall experience, the proprietor and his staff exhibited remarkable hospitality, making me feel utterly at home. I shall undoubtedly become a regular patron of this establishment. It merits a perfect score of ten, boasting reasonable prices, fresh ingredients, and exceptional service. I am utterly delighted to have discovered this hidden treasure in South Charlotte!"

I possess familial ties in Las Vegas, and it is imperative that we pay a visit to this location during our sojourn, specifically at the midpoint of our stay and immediately prior to our departure. The culinary item known as carne asada fries is of exceptional quality, and the shrimp burrito is similarly impressive.

"Indubitably, my culinary inclinations gravitate towards Beef Stand, whereupon I relish their delectable cheese fries and savory meatball sub. Although their Italian beef and hot dogs are palatable, my gastronomical satisfaction is principally satiated by the aforementioned duo. Notwithstanding, my sole criticism pertains to the structural integrity of the meatball sub, which tends to disintegrate into an amalgamation of two humongous meatballs, accompanied by a modicum of bread and sauce. Perhaps, this anomaly contributes to the overall appeal? Regardless, it precipitates a predicament for me, as I frequently depart the establishment with a conspicuous crimson stain embellishing my attire, thereby rendering my sartorial choices somewhat restricted."

Our lodging faced the shopping venue of Bellagio, which presented an unmitigated ordeal. I am convinced that upon my demise, the celestial realm will manifest itself in a manner akin to this (Chanel, Prada, Louis, Dior, Tiffany's), such that it shall serve as a constant reminder of the transcendent nature of luxury. When my acquaintance intimated that she was contemplating the acquisition of a Prada bag, my countenance assumed a hue of envy so profound that it bordered on the precipice of mortality.

Thus, we ventured forth into the establishment, whereupon we encountered a sales associate by the name of Charles Punzal, whose demeanor was nothing short of angelic. His patience and dedication to our needs were tantamount to a veritable blessing, as he assiduously presented us with an array of color options in saffiano leather totes, thereby facilitating our decision-making process to a most appreciable extent. Ultimately, we departed the premises with a stunning, black purse that exuded an aura of timeless elegance.

I would unhesitatingly endorse a visit to this emporium, and, in particular, solicit the assistance of Charles, should one harbor an inclination towards investing in an article of luxury that shall confer upon its proprietor a state of unadulterated bliss.

Home away from home. Great selection of Cigars, wrist watches and shaving products. Great place to hang out and have a smoke and watch sports on 6 large tv screens. No membership fees and you can also store you collection in the back room free of charge. Highly recommend Cigar King.

Under the meticulous care of Dr. Glassman, patients can anticipate receiving empathetic and comprehensive medical attention, as he manifests an unwavering commitment to ensuring their well-being and comfort. Through his unhurried approach, he fosters an environment where individuals feel valued and respected, dedicating sufficient time to address their concerns and elucidate complex medical concepts in a manner that is readily digestible for laypeople. Furthermore, Dr. Glassman's team exhibits a similar level of dedication and warmth, as they greet patients with sincere cordiality and strive to create a welcoming atmosphere, thereby enhancing the overall quality of the medical experience. Based on these factors, it is highly recommended that individuals seeking exceptional healthcare services consider Dr. Glassman as their primary care physician.

This place is fantastic! I've been there a few times for business lunches and everyone has always been happy. The pizzas are ample for one person or could be split if you also got a saled (which is huge). Everything looks and tastes fresh and I love that you can ask to have as much as you want piled on and it's still the same price. Although the line can back up at lunch (much like a Chipotle) since everything is made to order, the pizza is done in 3 minutes after being cooked in a hig-powered 550 degree oven. I don't think I've even had a problme finding any seatign even when the line is long. I actually think this pizza is better than 90% of pizza I've had elsewhere. To me, it's worthy of 5 starts. I just wish they had one right where I live.

This place ruined all other Chinese restaurants for me. Seriously. I've eaten everything here that I can pronounce and even a couple things I can't. 

The absolute MUST from this place is the tofu flower with spicy Szechuan sauce. It comes with pork or chicken in a broth of dried, fried whole chilies. It is smaller than it used to be, but still quite a lot of food. Worth every bit of pain you will feel the next day. In fact, you'll probably grow to like it. I recommend you ask for a dish of steamed broccoli (not on menu) to incorporate with the dish. 

Other homeruns include the seafood sizzling rice, cumin beef, Szechuan peppercorn anything, green beans and pork and the shallot beef. All so very, very good. Remember, though, when they say cumin (or any other spice/flavor), they really, really mean it. 

Rating Scale:
1 Star: Avoid the town in which this place is located just to be safe.  
2 Star: Risky at best. 
3 Star: I'll try it again or consume here in a pinch.
4 Star: I eat here regularly if financially and calorically feasible.
5 Star: I'm comfortable taking other chefs here.
Bun Bo Hue.... that is all I have to say. You don't always find bun bo hue with that much flavor but this place has it all. I'll be back for sure

I am 100% confused by the one star rating on here. 

I'm a newbie bicyclist/triathlete and just trying to learn the ins and outs of bike maintenance. I knew my gears were being wonky and I suspected it was my derailleur but I know just enough to make an educated guess and then turn it over to someone that actually has a real clue. Being a newbie I was a bit worried about being taken advantage of or not being considered a "real" biker with my 2nd hand Trek. 

I'm so glad I stumbled upon Espada's great reviews on Yelp. I easily found the shop right on North Davidson. Parking is like anywhere else in NoDa - sometimes easy, sometimes a pain in the ass. When you walk in you're in an art gallery/jewelry store/bike shop but no worries, bike shop in the back, easy to see. Steve isn't a huge chatter but he was able to take a look at my bike right away and I wondered around the shop as I waited. I asked some questions all of which he easily answered and his prices are beyond reasonable (I'd called around beforehand). I rode around yesterday and my bike is back in business. I never felt like he thought I asked a dumb question (I'm sure I did) and I certainly didn't feel like he tried to up-sale anything

So go support this local bike shop and check out the art while you wait.

Where do I initiate the narration of my extraordinary encounter? It is imperative that I commence with the creative and resourceful mixologist, Daniel, who was orchestrating the beverage establishment during June's absence. My goodness! The assortment of potions that he skillfully concocted, particularly the top-secret recipe that I am unable to disclose, were utterly breathtaking and left me in absolute awe! Throughout the entire duration of our visit, Daniel demonstrated exceptional proficiency in his art, seamlessly blending an array of flavors and ingredients to create an unparalleled drinking experience. The ambiance was further enhanced by the talented pianist, Spidoni, whose melodious performances captivated our attention and contributed to the overall enjoyment of our evening. In light of the limited seating capacity, it is advisable to arrive promptly to ensure an optimal experience. My husband and I felt extremely fortunate to have had Daniel's undivided attention for the majority of our visit, creating an atmosphere that was both intimate and exclusive. Without a doubt, this excursion ranks among the most memorable and impressive adventures I have had the pleasure of experiencing, and I eagerly anticipate the opportunity to revisit this exceptional establishment in the near future.

"The culmination of a prolonged period of exhaustion can be effectively alleviated by partaking in a delectable dish comprising macaroni and cheese, accompanied by a sophisticated beverage such as a martini, within an establishment featuring a musical ambiance that does not disappoint."

As a local, it would be utterly nonsensical for me to visit Planet Hollywood for a sandwich, so my 5-star rating should not be misinterpreted as an assertion that I would regularly frequent their establishment; rather, it is based on a comparative analysis of convenience and price relative to the typical offerings found within a Las Vegas casino. At a mere $6, it would be challenging to locate a superior sandwich on the Vegas strip, although it is by no means the most exceptional sandwich I have had the pleasure of consuming. Nevertheless, Earl of Sandwich offers a satisfying culinary experience, characterized by warm bread, delectable meat, and reasonably prompt service. Additionally, the location's proximity to the Sports Book presents an advantage, enabling patrons to conveniently enjoy a sandwich while watching a game. 

I concur with Misti's observation regarding the absence of options pertaining to bread, toppings, and sauces, which includes the conspicuous lack of oil and vinegar, a fundamental component in sandwich shops. The sandwich itself is not excessively filling, which can be perceived as either beneficial or detrimental, contingent upon one's perspective. If planning to attend a performance such as Peepshow, a light meal from Earl may be advisable to avoid discomfort during the show. My personal preference is the Full Montagu (I believe), consisting of turkey and roast beef, which has consistently met my expectations, and I have yet to encounter any errors in my orders.

Cornerstone, a colossal ecclesiastical edifice, aptly earns the appellation of a "Mega Church" due to its imposing magnitude. However, the intriguing aspect lies in how its vastness facilitates the creation of a tailored experience for each individual. Despite the possibility of attending Sunday services weekly for a year without encountering the same person twice, the church offers a diverse array of classes, small churches, support groups, and other assemblies that cater to various preferences and stages of life. Those seeking a more intimate community can find their niche, while others desiring the anonymity of a large congregation can also do so, all amidst a warm and welcoming atmosphere.  
Cornerstone boasts a multitude of amenities, including a coffee shop and bookstore, abundant volunteer opportunities, gender-specific ministries, retreats, mission trips, exceptional worship leaders, and sermons that delve deep into biblical teachings while relating them to contemporary life. Additionally, the church provides meticulously designed programs for children, staffed by background-checked, well-trained personnel who enthusiastically impart the week's biblical lesson to your little ones. Even infants just weeks old are welcome, while older children enjoy engaging activities during the services. To explore this dynamic spiritual hub, attend a service, and visit the information booths for further guidance.

"This marked our maiden visit to this esteemed culinary establishment, and we relished a truly remarkable dining experience, courtesy of the warm hospitality of our chef and server, who manifested an unwavering commitment to ensuring our satisfaction. The fare was indeed exceptional, boasting an array of delectable options such as fried rice, chicken, New York steak, filet mignon, shrimp, and lobster. Particularly noteworthy were the filet mignon and shrimp offerings, which proved to be the most sumptuous and flavorful that I have had the pleasure of indulging in... unquestionably a must-try for gastronomes seeking an epicurean adventure. It is worth mentioning that our youthful offspring, aged seven, was similarly enamored with the culinary delights presented before him, evincing an unbridled enthusiasm that bordered on fervor, and imploring us to return at the earliest convenience. Rest assured, we shall indeed revisit this gastronomic haven in the near future."

"The ambiance of this terminal has undergone a considerable transformation, becoming significantly more pleasant and hospitable compared to its previous state, although still falling short of perfection. The local populace exudes warmth and friendliness, fostering a sense of comfort and security. A diverse array of commercial establishments and culinary options are available, affording me the opportunity to indulge in some retail therapy during the interval preceding my flight, thereby enhancing my overall experience."
Really beautiful place. Must go see - herb garden - TOUCH N FEEL was really good. Otherwise really big place and definitely can cater to an event. Thai Garden was also good.

I love me some Merc Bar, it's tres chic from it's comfy couches to it's awesome staff.  The drinks are indeed pricey but they pack a punch so it really all evens out in the end. How can you not love a bar that's got a twin in NYC and lets you dance on the tables?!

Allan Wolper did an interview with Natalie Bauman of Bauman Rare Books last year! \n\nHere's the link, her interview is near the bottom of the page: http://www.wbgo.org/news/ondemand/wolperArchives.php

I have no idea why this place has 3.5 stars... I thought the place was absolutely amazing!  I get it that these are some expensive burgers... but they are also very VERY delicious! This IS Vegas, and for Vegas I thought the price was pretty reasonable.

I had the Tenderloin Rossini under the Tiny Buns section.  They were two mini burgers of BEEF MEDALLION WITH FOIE GRAS, WILD MUSHROOM, ARUGULA AND TRUFFLE MAYO.  It was so good... It was a perfect portion too!

Other burgers that I recommend are the Rising Sun and Duck Duck Goose.

It's casual, its comfortable, and definitely a perfect place to go to if you want to avoid bougie and expensive restaurants on the strip.  I thought the service was great... I'm sure other people had different experience with the service depending on what server they got, but ours was very nice :)

"Several years ago, my sibling recounted an anecdote regarding a group of affluent individuals from New York who sought to indulge in a culinary experience provided by a local delicatessen while luxuriating in their poolside cabana. These gastronomes yearned for a taste of genuine New York-style delicacies and Italian cuisine amidst the glamour of Las Vegas. We thus embarked upon an exploratory venture to sample the fare offered by this esteemed establishment. It is with great pride that I attest that, even after half a decade has elapsed, this eatery remains a steadfast favorite of mine within the city's culinary landscape. This enduring affection extends beyond the delectable victuals themselves, as the proprietors, Julia and her kin, epitomize hospitality. Regardless of the duration of one's absence â?be it a day, a week, or several months â?they take great pleasure in engaging in conversation, inquiring about one's well-being, and radiating warmth with their endearing smiles. Such a welcoming ambiance permeates the menu, featuring freshly prepared sauces daily, authentic New York-style pizza pies, succulent garlic knots, and those mouthwatering arancini. My initial visits to Cugino's preceded the widespread availability of these savory rice balls, necessitating a request or advance ordering. Now, I unwaveringly opt for the larger variety, replete with a flavorful filling. Patrons partaking in a meal on the premises should entreat the staff to warm the arancini, graciously blanketed in sauce and melted cheese for an unparalleled gustatory indulgence. From a straightforward dish of spaghetti to the linguini showcasing clams, every offering maintains an impressive level of quality, arriving steaming hot and freshness personified."

"The supreme quality of the pizza served at this establishment is unparalleled within the vicinity of Summerlin, boasting an abundance of fresh toppings and a delectable flavor profile that transcends the mundane and mediocre offerings of its competitors. While the cost may be slightly elevated, the culinary experience it provides renders it a worthwhile investment for those seeking a truly satisfying gastronomical indulgence."
Partying all night in Vegas would not be complete without a night at Drais! Hot hot crowd. Coool people. Easy to get in. Not easy to leave.

"Although my dining experience at this establishment was generally satisfactory, there was a certain je ne sais quoi lacking in the ambiance that prevented it from attaining absolute perfection; however, the culinary offerings were undoubtedly intriguing and distinctive, and the hospitality we received from James, our server, was truly exceptional, elevating our visit to an even more memorable level. Despite some reservations regarding the ambiance, I would unhesitatingly endorse this restaurant based on the strength of its gastronomic delights and outstanding customer service."

Loved my experience at Nevada Nails! Diem did a great job on my nails and was so nice and personable. Definitely made a mani/pedi even more enjoyable. I loved how many colors they had to choose from - lots of regular polish colors and hundreds of gel colors, including Rockstar. They have a special right now for a gel mani/reg pedi for $45, which is a great price. I can't wait to go back and be pampered again!

It is my utmost pleasure to express my profound gratitude towards such an extraordinary group of individuals, whose remarkable attributes, including their unwavering independence and unparalleled capacity for teamwork, have left me in absolute awe. The exceptional manner in which they have seamlessly blended their autonomous nature with an unwavering commitment to collaborative effort has been nothing short of astonishing. Furthermore, I must say that the cutting-edge box and innovative programming that we had the privilege of experiencing were truly captivating and thought-provoking. My sincere appreciation extends to Joe, who played an instrumental role in orchestrating this extraordinary experience.

"Indulged in the delectable Fried Chicken, meticulously cooked to achieve an optimal degree of culinary excellence, characterized by an irresistible combination of succulent juiciness, golden-brown crispness, and an unparalleled intensity of flavor; the hospitable crew, proficient in their art, ensured a seamless dining experience, marked by prompt and attentive service, tailored to satisfy the discerning palates of patrons, thereby eliciting an unwavering endorsement, enthusiastically encouraging prospective gastronomes to partake in the epicurean indulgence, should the opportunity arise."

"Indubitably, it is an indisputable fact that this establishment provides an unparalleled level of customer satisfaction, boasting a consistent quality of beverages that is simply unmatched. As a regular patron, I can unequivocally attest that the exceptional caliber of service rendered by Cory and Lexi during the morning hours is truly impressive, their proficiency and dedication to their craft being a testament to the high standards upheld by this enterprise. Moreover, the attention to detail exhibited by these diligent individuals is nothing short of remarkable, as they have demonstrated an uncanny ability to recall my preferred beverage with unwavering accuracy, even going so far as to have it prepared and awaiting my arrival at the window. Such extraordinary efforts have not gone unnoticed, and I must express my heartfelt gratitude for the sheer convenience and pleasure afforded by their exceptional service. It is indeed fortunate that this business has chosen to establish itself in Phoenix, as it has undoubtedly enriched the local community by providing a veritable oasis for those seeking a superior coffee experience."

Yum! I was visiting Montreal and my friend suggested this place. Delicious burgers, sandwiches, fries, salads and beers! Mmm. Everything is reasonably priced. I had the Bac'n'Cheese burger with half fries and half salad and it was sinfully delectable!\n\nDefinitely good bang for your buck! Hit this place up if you're in the area!

After reading all the negative comments about their customer service I was apprehensive going in there this afternoon. But I've shopped at their London and Swiss stores and love the brand. I must admit all those fears came to naught. All the girls were very helpful. Especially the girl in the changing area. She helped me diligently for the almost 2 hrs I was there. All the staff were most helpful and prompt in checking for sizes. Great experience overall!

"The pinnacle of Apple-related encounters has unequivocally transpired, characterized by unprecedented celerity and effortlessness. My device's display exhibited irreparable damage; however, an unused, state-of-the-art handset was promptly provided as a replacement, courtesy of the impressive guarantee offered by the manufacturer. It is indubitable that Byrd possesses exceptional proficiency and a remarkable demeanor, marked by affability and expertise, which significantly contributed to the seamlessness of the transaction."

"Although Dreyer's ice cream is ubiquitous and readily accessible, its gustatory qualities seem to be enhanced when positioned between two freshly baked cookies, thereby creating a culinary experience that transcends mere convenience. Furthermore, the ability to choose between two distinct cookie flavors, such as double chocolate chip and red velvet, further elevates the enjoyment of this delectable treat. In my case, I opted for the peanut butter cup ice cream variety, which was strategically situated between the two aforementioned cookies, thus creating a harmonious balance of flavors and textures. As I leisurely consumed this delightful sandwich while strolling past the nearby hobo drawing photos, I couldn't help but appreciate the friendly demeanor of the staff member who had assisted me, as well as the exceptional value of this indulgence, which was a mere $2."

"Through my restaurant.com coupon, I serendipitously unearthed George's, a culinary gem that would soon become my go-to destination for delectable Greek fare. In the company of my significant other, we opted to sample two of their signature original Gyros, along with a side of fries and a mixed green salad, respectively. Prior to the arrival of our primary dishes, we decided to precede them with an order of fried mushrooms and jalapeno poppers, which, much to our delight, emerged from the kitchen in a timely fashion, exquisitely prepared and presented. Notably, the fried appetizers we had previously encountered had often been served in a state of semi-frozen mediocrity or, conversely, drenched in an excess of grease, detracting from their overall enjoyment. However, these particular mushrooms and poppers were the epitome of culinary mastery, boasting a satisfying crunch and expert seasoning that left no trace of lingering oiliness, thereby elevating our dining experience to a new level of gastronomic satisfaction. Furthermore, the Gyros and fries that followed suit were equally impressive, with generous portions that belied their reasonable price point. It is with great enthusiasm, therefore, that I proclaim George's as my unequivocal favorite purveyor of Gyros, ensuring that future visits are all but inevitable."

My better half had perused that the bar at the Capital Grille possessed an impressive menu, and subsequent to investigating the surveys, it seemed, by all accounts, to be a decent decision. We went to the eatery and were welcomed by an exceptionally attentive hostess who quickly started to situate us. We asked whether we could sit in the bar and she said indeed and seated us in the bar. 
  The bar was uninhabited, as the eatery had quite recently opened, yet there was a mixologist there getting ready for the day. She welcomed us warmly and brought us the menus. She then clarified the different things on the menu that we inquired about and took our requests. As she was withdrawing, my significant other made a remark to me about my birthday, yet I didn't have the foggiest idea that the mixologist had heard the comment. 
  The mixologist then brought us our wine and hors d'oeuvres, which were amazing. We attempted the Ahi Tuna Sashimi, which was mind-blowing. Afterward, we had the Capital Grille Burger and truffle fries, which were likewise amazing. For dessert, we had the flourless chocolate cake, and indeed, it was amazing, particularly with a glass of port. 
  After an extraordinary feast, the check was conveyed to us, and at that point, the mixologist said that it was my birthday and that they perceived this and gave our hors d'oeuvres and the dessert at no expense; what a fantastic thing to hear. 
  We had an extraordinary time, extraordinary nourishment, extraordinary wine, and remarkable administration. We will return.

"Wayne, oh, Wayne-your culinary team's proficiency and dedication to providing an exceptional dining experience at Greasewood for our bar mitzvah Shabbat dinner were truly remarkable. The delectable fare and convivial ambiance you orchestrated not only met but exceeded our expectations. Of equal importance was the meticulous attention given to accommodating our multiple severe food allergies, which engendered a sense of security and peace of mind for our guests. Your unwavering commitment to ensuring their well-being was genuinely appreciated. The evening's success cannot be overstated; it was utterly flawless. We are deeply indebted to you and your staff for their tireless efforts and unparalleled hospitality. It is our fervent hope that this unique eatery, a veritable treasure trove of gastronomical delights, will continue to thrive and remain a vital part of Scottsdale's culinary landscape."

Thank you, Nikko, for the most delectable sushi we have savored in recent times! The exceptional valet parking service accorded us a sense of exclusivity, which was further enhanced by the convivial ambiance of the establishment. Upon being seated at the sushi bar, we relished a delightful sampler platter, comprising an assortment of sashimi, nigiri sushi, and a tantalizing slightly spicy tuna roll. For two ravenous individuals, the Sushi/Sashimi Omakase presented remarkable value at approximately $36. Additionally, we shared Age Dashi Tofu with Shrimp, which was served scorching hot, immersed in an extraordinarily rich and savory dashi broth, nearly rivaling the intensity of beef. The house sake was also quite palatable.

The atmosphere at this venue is truly captivating, making it an ideal setting for a sophisticated evening out. The modern and stylish decor creates an environment that is both elegant and welcoming, allowing even casually attired patrons like ourselves to feel comfortable. The sushi bar exudes vitality and merriment, while the spotless and well-organized prep line showcases the culinary team's dedication to precision and cleanliness. Freshness of the fish is of utmost importance, and the skilled chefs adhere to the highest standards in their preparation. Kudos to the ownership and management for their commitment to excellence.

On Fridays and Saturdays, the ambiance transforms around 7:30 or 8 pm, as the lighting alters and the DJ initiates their mix, creating an energetic and lively atmosphere. While the music can become quite vibrant, it only adds to the festive spirit of Nikko, which boasts some of the finest energy in Charlotte. Overall, this dining establishment ranks among the city's premier choices.

"ASTOUNDING!!!!! Succinctly put, there's no necessity to indulge you with an elaborate narrative. Instead, a cursory examination of the YouTube video showcasing the culinary network will furnish you with a comprehensive understanding of the subject matter."

"I have had the pleasure of visiting this establishment on multiple occasions, and each time, I have been thoroughly impressed. Despite its modest appearance, this restaurant truly excels in the aspects that matter most. The quality of the ingredients utilized in their culinary creations is exceptionally high, resulting in an unparalleled freshness and flavor that is sure to delight even the most discerning palate. Additionally, the prices are remarkably reasonable, making it an excellent choice for those seeking a satisfying dining experience without breaking the bank. I would highly recommend that you sample one of the'specialty' items from their menu for each member of your party and request that they be served consecutively, allowing you to partake in a delightful sharing experience. This approach enables you to indulge in a greater variety of dishes, savor an array of flavors, and enjoy a convivial meal with your companions. Furthermore, I suggest starting your culinary journey with a few bites of their delectable papaya salad and crispy spring rolls to whet your appetite before embarking on the main event. In conclusion, this eatery holds a special place in my heart, and I wholeheartedly endorse it to anyone seeking a truly memorable dining adventure."

My wife and I love this place.  The service is always excellent and every dish we've had is off the hook.  I love the shrimp and grits and the shrimp poboy.  The poboy is the best I've had outside of New Orleans when I lived there.  My wife loves the scallops which is an occasional special.  Great for kids, too, and our 6-year-old daughter loves it.  

Last time we were there, our daughter wanted to walk around and talk to the hostess and they became bff's and then she met the chef.  He was super friendly as well.  Everybody is very accommodating and tolerated a talkative, charming 6-year-old.
Great job!!

Such a wonderful exhibit! I came here with high hopes and they were far exceeded. The entire exhibit is so well put together. Touching a \"real\" iceberg to feel how cold it is. They have the perfect mix of Science and History in here, the way the museum leads you from one point to the next is so surreal. You have an entirely new understanding when you leave. The ending board where you see if you lived or died is especially interesting!

"It is imperative that I extend gratitude towards my spouse in this particular instance. Due to our recent acquisition of improved insurance coverage, I suggested to my husband that it would be judicious to transition to a different dental care provider. He was in dire need of a thorough cleaning prior to the culmination of the current year, thus I encouraged him to seek out a suitable practitioner with a sense of urgency. This was approximately one week ago. I must admit that I was rather impressed by my husband's proficiency in locating an adept dental office, as well as his success in securing an appointment for me on the very same day.
