The front office staff demonstrated a remarkable level of efficiency and friendliness during our interaction, while my hygienist, Deann, exhibited a commendable degree of professionalism and cordiality. Furthermore, the doctor who performed the routine examination assured me that in the event of an unexpected emergency, he would be the individual responding to the call, thereby eliminating the need to contend with an answering service. This aspect is truly remarkable, although I sincerely hope that I will not be compelled to avail myself of such services in the future."

"I was in pursuit of an exceptional familial spring break activity, and my quest culminated successfully with the discovery of an optimal experience. My clan and I, being novice equestrians, did not seek an arduous, all-encompassing adventure; rather, we desired a brief yet memorable excursion. The 1.5-hour ride proved to be the ideal duration, offering us the opportunity to appreciate the picturesque landscape, magnificent steeds, and hospitable staff without feeling overwhelmed or exhausted. Our guide, Dave, demonstrated remarkable proficiency in illuminating regional historical landmarks, flora, and other points of interest, while exhibiting commendable patience and understanding in his interactions with my juvenile offspring, aged 9 and 12 respectively."

"Commencing my day with an optimum level of efficacy and efficiency, this venue serves as a haven for both myself and my acquaintances who are visiting from out of town, offering an array of delectable cupcakes and breakfast items that are simply unparalleled in terms of quality and taste, thereby making it an ideal setting to indulge in some caffeinated beverages, unwind, socialize, or engage in intellectual pursuits such as studying, all while basking in the welcoming ambiance that permeates throughout the establishment."

I was cognizant of the fact that I was not experiencing an altered state of consciousness when I witnessed a slender, dancing banana at the social gathering I attended last night, as I was in a state of sobriety, and it was also Halloween. However, in the midst of a post-Halloween funk and Sunday blues combination, I began to ponder if perhaps I had been surreptitiously administered a psychoactive substance last night, when Mr. Incredible, who was also present at the gathering, greeted me at Pink Spot. To maintain his anonymity, I shall refrain from disclosing his identity, but the culinary creation he prepared for me, consisting of a sandwich with a bread roll made from wheat flour, containing a mixture of tomato, egg, bacon, avocado, sprouts, and American cheese, accompanied by a beverage made from espresso and cocoa powder, and enriched with free Wi-Fi, proved to be a veritable panacea for my despondent state. I shall confer a rating of five stars upon this establishment, as they have achieved something that transcends considerations of gustatory pleasure, cost, and ambiance, namely, they have served up a copious portion of bonhomie. Moreover, it would not be inappropriate to augment their star count slightly, in light of the unfortunate review bestowed upon them by Megan D, who appears to be a peripatetic critic, traversing Phoenix and meting out dissatisfactory assessments with abandon. Wait... return to that felicitous place, Dugaldo. Felicitous place. Pink Spot.

"My gastronomical experience at this esteemed establishment was thoroughly enjoyable, as I had the pleasure of consuming their delectable lamb dumplings, which were replete with an array of flavors that tantalized my taste buds and left me in a state of culinary satisfaction. Furthermore, the hospitality displayed by the staff was of the highest quality, as they exhibited a warm and welcoming demeanor that made me feel valued and appreciated. Additionally, the traditional Chinese seaweed served as a salad was a delightful accompaniment to the main course, and its unique texture and flavor profile further enhanced the overall dining experience. Suffice it to say, I shall return to this venue in the future, primarily to partake in the delicious salad that has left an indelible mark on my palate."

"Discussion regarding assortment and superior quality is warranted when referencing this exceptional establishment specializing in smoking paraphernalia! The vast array of choices available at this smoke shop is truly impressive, with an emphasis on showcasing a diverse range of products that cater to discerning patrons seeking premium items. Additionally, the venue features an art gallery, further enhancing the overall experience for visitors. While more affordable options are available for those on a limited budget, the primary focus lies in offering high-end pieces that double as masterful works of art. Furthermore, the store offers caps for graffiti artists and a refrigerator stocked with delectable Arizona beverages for customers to enjoy."

We indulged in a culinary excursion at this establishment on a Friday evening, and were able to gain immediate admittance, much to our delight. The fare provided by the proprietors was not only expedient but also of exceptional quality, prompting us to consider transporting additional servings back to our temporary lodgings. Unfortunately, spatial constraints within our minuscule refrigeration unit precluded such an endeavor. Nonetheless, the noodles were cooked to perfection, a feat often elusive in the realm of gastronomy. Furthermore, the pot stickers, fashioned from scratch, constituted a welcome departure from the ubiquitous, mass-produced variants that proliferate in contemporary cuisine. Lastly, the fried wontons, ingeniously filled with an unconventional yet delectable substance, and the sake, a beverage of superior quality, left an indelible impression upon our palates, rendering this dining experience worthy of wholehearted endorsement.

I have been coming here for 6 years and have always had an amazing experience.  The bartenders are always friendly - and in the dinning room, Jen is an absolute amazing person to have serve you.   Also, way cheaper for quality drinks right next to the strip.

"Upon receiving a recommendation from Lindsay, my trusted source for culinary explorations, I had the pleasure of experiencing an exceptional dining escapade at this captivating steakhouse. As we entered the eatery, we were immediately enveloped in an ambiance reminiscent of the sophisticated and glamorous era depicted in the hit television series 'Mad Men,' further heightening our anticipation for the delectable fare awaiting us. The gastronomical offerings did not disappoint; in fact, they surpassed our expectations with their unparalleled quality and presentation. Specifically, the tender and juicy steak, complemented by the rich flavors of the bean chili/soup, left an indelible mark on our palates. Additionally, the earthy, savory mushrooms served as an exquisite accompaniment to the main course, contributing to the overall excellence of the meal. Our dining experience was further enhanced by the warmth and attentiveness of the staff, with Patti, our server, playing a pivotal role in ensuring that every aspect of our visit was tailored to perfection. Her proficiency, cordiality, and effervescent personality not only elevated our dining experience but also fostered a sense of belonging, making us feel like valued patrons rather than mere customers. My gratitude extends to all the staff members who contributed to creating such a memorable evening."

What a surprise! Came here from a recommendation by a friend, and it lived up to it's rep. It's got a nice, trendy, modern sort of atmosphere, and combined with tasty Thai fusion (I don't know if I'd call it 100% traditional) - it's a definite hit!  We'll be back again

Usually when I expect something to be amazing it sucks. This place was actually as good as I thought it would be. I ordered the famous chicken and waffles :) good stuff...between my sis and I we barely finished it. The place is good.. def worth a try and I def would go again when I'm in Vegas.

Love it.  
Great Place, nice Location.  

Maybe a happy Hour Would be Great. ;-) 

Manager i forgot his Name greated & seated us immediatly & was so nice. Explained everything.  

Out waiter Ron or Ross??? I think Ross was nice & attentive

Food : we ordered Pizza & mushrooms. It was excellent 
Salat was Great Too

Sizes are huge & Perfect to Share. 
Will  be back soon.

"I arrived at this esteemed establishment in the company of multiple individuals and we proceeded to order an array of beverages, including mixed drinks and shots, accompanied by an assortment of delectable steaks, encompassing various cuts and sizes, as well as a selection of sides. The steak, I must say, was utterly exquisite, its tenderness and flavor tantamount to nothing short of culinary perfection. My dining companion and I shared a 16-ounce New York strip, and our palates were thoroughly satiated, even after consuming every last morsel of the succulent medium-rare meat. We also sampled some of the other patrons' filets, which, to our delight, proved to be equally as delectable. While the sides, including creamed spinach, potatoes, asparagus, and macaroni and cheese, were certainly satisfying, it is undeniable that the main attraction was, without a doubt, the exceptional quality of the meat. Furthermore, the service we received was both cordial and efficient, our server possessing a pair of well-toned arms, and the cocktails were robust and expertly crafted. Although the prices charged for the pleasure of dining at this upscale venue are indeed substantial, one cannot help but acknowledge that the experience warrants such a tariff, given the superior quality of the cuisine and the overall ambiance of the establishment."

I have been patronizing Don & Charlies for an extensive period of time, and I must say that the culinary offerings and hospitality have been remarkably consistent, which is truly impressive. The creamy coleslaw, liver, Seattle Salmon, and particularly the pork ribs have all been delectable options that never fail to satisfy my gastronomical cravings. Moreover, the memorabilia adorning the walls serves as an exceptional enhancement to the overall dining experience, reminiscent of a Major League sports venue.

"I have had the pleasure of partaking in the epicurean delights offered by Rosemary's on numerous occasions, specifically for lunch (now exclusively available on Fridays) and dinner, over the past four years. Their culinary offerings have consistently impressed me, with each dish showcasing a harmonious balance of flavors, textures, and presentation. The establishment's commitment to providing exceptional service and value is evident in every aspect of the dining experience. Of particular note is their thoughtful selection of wine and beer pairings, which complement each course perfectly. Additionally, the spacious bar and lounge area offers an inviting atmosphere, where patrons can indulge in a variety of tantalizing "small plates" or opt for items from the main menu. My personal preferences include the delectable BBQ shrimp and salmon tartar appetizers, as well as the mouthwatering seasonal soups. For entrees, I highly recommend the succulent scallops, crispy skin bass, and tender steaks. Furthermore, Rosemary's offers a tempting promotion on Sunday evenings, featuring half-priced bottles of wine. Throughout the year, they also host various beer and wine dinners, providing an opportunity for connoisseurs to sample an array of exquisite vintages and craft brews."

I recently took NCT's level 1 Improv Workshop and I LOVED it.  My first class I awkwardly sat on stage and nervously laughed and couldn't come up with anything.  By the end of the class, I was kung-fu-ing my way to rescue Princess Miyuki with a prince who still lived with his parents.

The class focuses on the basics of Improv - listening, "yes, and", relationships, responding emotionally and staying rooted in reality.  Dorian was able to provide consistent guidance and constructive criticism to move me forward as an actor.  The other students are equally awesome, as everyone is at least some form of funny.  

I would recommend (and do recommend!) everyone I know at least take a level 1 improv class, and I love the people at NCT.  The skills I've gained from 6 weeks of workshop have already helped me become a better listener and improviser at work, as well as with friends.  Looking forward to more Improv with NCT in the future!

"Upon perusing the evaluations, I was flabbergasted by the fact that we had yet to experience The Deli, given its proximity to our domicile. This eatery possesses a diverse array of attributes that cater to an assortment of tastes, including exceptional hospitality and an innovative approach to locally sourced cuisine, complemented by a weekend cocktail lounge for patrons who encounter a prolonged waiting period for seating. The hummus, accompanied by warm, freshly prepared crackers, is an absolute necessity for any visitor. My personal selection consisted of a half sandwich and chicken and corn chowder, which proved to be an unparalleled gastronomic delight; however, I found myself unable to complete the meal due to its generous portioning, which did not result in a sensation of overindulgence or heaviness but rather a profound gratification stemming from the consumption of a delectable feast. Our culinary excursion also included a sampling of their homemade ice cream, specifically the Peanut Butter variety, which elicited an enthusiastic response of approval from my dining companion and me. In conclusion, each item we ordered at The Deli surpassed our expectations, making it essential for anyone who has yet to partake in the pleasure of dining there to halt their current activities and pay the establishment a visit at the earliest opportunity."

"Visit Sweet Republic during the current week and express your endorsement of 'Bake for Hope' verbally, specifically stating, 'I support Bake for Hope,' and the establishment will generously contribute a percentage of their earnings to Bake for Hope, a philanthropic organization committed to increasing consciousness of breast cancer and directing the profits from numerous bake sales across the country to local chapters of Susan G Komen for the Cure. On the upcoming Saturday, Bake for Hope will be present at the venue, offering for purchase their delectable handcrafted cupcakes, brownies, and cookies, constituting an ideal combination when paired with ice cream."

Steve's proficiency in communication and his fastidious approach to customer service are truly remarkable. My experience with him was nothing short of exceptional, as he successfully rectified a dent that both the dealership and Dent Pros deemed irreparable. Not only did Steve demonstrate an unwavering commitment to excellence in his work, but he also distinguished himself through his meticulous attention to detail and his ability to set realistic expectations for his clients. His transparent pricing structure further reinforced my confidence in his services, and I would unequivocally recommend him to anyone seeking top-notch paintless dent repair. In the unlikely event that I encounter another dent in the future, Steve's establishment will undoubtedly be my first and only choice.

"It is my utmost pleasure to provide a succinct yet effusive endorsement of Piper's Pub, an establishment that has captured my heart and palate with its unparalleled culinary prowess and commitment to providing an exceptional drinking experience. In essence, this enchanting Scottish tavern has ascended to the pinnacle of excellence among Pittsburgh's plethora of dining and imbibing establishments, rendering it an obligatory pilgrimage for aficionados of fine fare and libations.

The gastronomical odyssey that awaits patrons at Piper's Pub is nothing short of extraordinary. The kitchen's masterful execution of traditional British delicacies, such as Scotch eggs and fish and chips, is complemented by inventive twists on classic dishes like the open-faced roast beef sandwich, all of which are elevated to new heights by the inclusion of fresh, locally sourced ingredients. Moreover, the proprietors' fastidious attention to detail is reflected in the meticulous preparation of each dish, ensuring that even the most discerning diner will find themselves in gastronomic nirvana.

The beverage selection at Piper's Pub is equally impressive, boasting an extensive array of imported and domestic brews that cater to diverse tastes and preferences. The owners' unwavering dedication to quality is exemplified by their commitment to maintaining spotless tap lines, thereby guaranteeing that every pour is as flavorful and refreshing as the last. For those who worship at the altar of scotch whiskey, Piper's Pub offers a veritable mecca, with a comprehensive list that showcases some of the rarest and most exquisite bottlings from the distilleries of Scotland.

However, Piper's Pub's appeal extends far beyond the realm of gastronomy and mixology. This venerable establishment has become a sanctuary for devotees of the beautiful game, providing a welcoming environment where enthusiasts can gather, don their team's colors, and revel in the excitement of live football matches, complete with satellite feeds and an electric atmosphere that rivals the fervor of any stadium.

In conclusion, Piper's Pub merits unequivocal praise and recognition for its unwavering commitment to excellence across all aspects of its operation. It is an oasis that transcends the mundane and ordinary, offering a truly immersive experience that will leave patrons in a state of unadulterated bliss. In my opinion, this gem of a pub warrants a rating of five stars, without a shadow of a doubt."

Rosati's culinary offerings extend beyond their renowned pizza and takeout services, encompassing a diverse array of delectable dishes available for consumption within their spacious eat-in dining area. Patrons can indulge in a myriad of savory delights, including mouthwatering ribs and crispy fries, authentic Chicago-style hot dogs, and an assortment of expertly prepared pasta dishes. In addition, Rosati's features special dinner promotions on a nightly basis, providing customers with an unparalleled value.

"What a profound disparity superior customer service can effectuate! 

Upon embarking upon my second visit, I opted to bring my daughter along. Prior to venturing forth, I placed a telephone call to ensure that accommodations were available for us. The individual who responded to my query was quite cordial, thereby evincing an immediate enhancement in demeanor! 

Upon arriving at the establishment, we were promptly acknowledged with hospitality and extended a choice between two unoccupied tables. Although the venue was brimming with patrons, our server was readily available, while a colleague of hers expeditiously attended to our beverage requests. Our server, in particular, was nothing short of magnificent. Truly, a consummate professional! 

The culinary offerings were utterly scrumptious. My daughter, being a teenager, often presents a challenge in terms of satisfying her gastronomical inclinations. Happily, the menu proved to be suitably diverse, as she relished The Cabernet Burger, accompanied by what she described as 'perfect' french fries. Personally, I savored the most delectable Meatloaf Sandwich. Our server astutely suggested a French lemonade for my daughter, owing to my reluctance to consume wine and her distaste for dark sodas. This beverage proved to be immensely popular! 

The overall experience was utter perfection, much like the fries, leaving us both eagerly anticipating our next visit."

"It is highly unlikely that I will ever consider acquiring a cake from any other establishment, as I have been thoroughly spoiled by the exceptional quality and service provided by this particular bakery. My experience was nothing short of regal, as the staff treated me with utmost respect and attention, while the ambiance of the shop itself was aesthetically pleasing. Furthermore, the cakes I purchased were truly divine, with their exquisite flavors and artistic presentation. Not only did they taste superb, but the meticulous care taken in their packaging and appearance was truly impressive. The level of customer service I received was unparalleled, surpassing even the highest standards I had encountered in my previous residence. Additionally, the prices charged for these delectable creations were surprisingly reasonable, considering their exceptional quality. In conclusion, I am absolutely enamored with this bakery, and it has secured a loyal patron in me."

Phone in your orders because they're cooking your food to order.

My last year of undergrad, I called in so many times the guy knew my voice (when I changed my phone number, he still recognized me).

I could eat a half dark meal every day.

I recently had the pleasure of discovering this quaint establishment on December 31st, 2014, which marked the culmination of the year. Upon partaking in their delectable crepes, I must confess that they were indeed the most scrumptious specimens I have had the privilege of consuming. Kudos to the culinary expertise of the chef! In addition, their coffee was a perfect complement to the meal, providing a delightful beverage that not only satisfied my taste buds but also invigorated my senses. The hospitality of the wait staff was also worthy of mention, as they exhibited a commendable level of friendliness and courtesy. A particular highlight was the complimentary petite dessert and appetizer bestowed upon me by the affable server. Although there may be a brief delay in receiving your order, I suggest that you take advantage of the opportunity to unwind and savor the ambiance of the venue.

"Having resided in Edinburgh for a five-year duration, I had yet to experience the culinary offerings of Palmyra, until the aforementioned void was ameliorated by a recent visit with a companion in the evening hours. Arriving at 10 pm, we discovered that the majority of establishments in the vicinity were closed, much to our chagrin. Upon perusing the menu, I opted for a diminutive falafel, priced at Â£3.50, however, courtesy of my academic credentials, I was extended a 10% discount, resulting in a total cost of Â£3.15 for the delectable treat. The falafel appeared to be of a fresh, non-frozen variety, while the hummus was conspicuously homemade, and the Lebanese-style wraps were reminiscent of those encountered during my travels to the Middle East. The wrap was copiously filled with an assortment of salad, falafel, and hummus, subsequently toasted, and neatly wrapped in both tin foil and a napkin for our convenience. The ambiance within the establishment was somewhat lackluster, owing to the dim lighting commonly associated with kebab shops, thus, we elected to transport the edibles to our place of residence. The taste was truly satisfying; fresh, filling, and delicious, with a generous portion size that left me unable to consummate the entirety of my wrap. I shall unquestionably return to Palmyra when seeking a reasonably priced, delectable, and satiating repast, and would recommend others to follow suit, although suggesting the expediency of takeaway."

OMG Yelpers - thanks so much for your recommendations - we were in Vegas for the weekend and didn't want to eat on the Strip. We drove out to this place for dinner because of all of the Yelp reviews and it was fantastic. Everything was delicious and authentic (and spicy!) and the service was great too. We cannot wait to come back - yay!

I finally got the chance to stay at Encore and holy beejesus, the rooms are absolutely beautiful.  There really aren't words to describe how gorgeous and luxurious the rooms are.  I've stayed at almost every single big hotel on the strip and this is the nicest by leaps & bounds.  The rooms are big, the bathrooms are big.  Even the hallway from the door to the bedroom is longer than my last apartment's.  We had a beautiful view of the pools.  The bedroom and living room are separated.  I can tell the casino was definitely decorated to appeal to Asians.  Everything is red and gold, with dragons, lucky dogs, and butterflies everywhere.  If I could afford to, I'd stay at Encore on every one of my trips to Vegas.  I'd give it 20 stars if I could.

My siblings and I collectively decided to visit Las Vegas to commemorate the milestone birthday of our youngest sibling, which marked her transition into adulthood. Prior to our culinary excursion, we had arranged plans to dine at an alternative establishment, however, we ultimately opted to indulge in the gastronomic offerings of Lavo, much to my delight. The dining experience proved to be one of the most memorable and satisfying meals I have had the pleasure of consuming. Each member of our party selected a distinct dish, including kobe-stuffed arancini, clams, sea bass, penne alla vodka, and tiramisu for dessert. The quality and presentation of each dish were exceptional, and we thoroughly enjoyed ourselves within the atmospheric confines of the adjacent nightclub. I would unhesitatingly return to this esteemed establishment in the future.

"A remarkable dental practitioner and exceptional support staff. The dental aid is proficient in facilitating a comprehensive understanding of your oral healthcare protection. She possesses the expertise to effectively collaborate with your dental insurance provider to maximize reimbursements. I sought the services of this dentist due to an unforeseen dental emergency. The arrangement of a consultation was seamless, and the attention received was expedited. There were no extensive delays. I was mistakenly informed by a different dental specialist that I did not have coverage for dental implant procedures when, in fact, I possessed seventy percent coverage under my active insurance policy. KUDOS! Additionally, the execution of my dental implant treatment was performed with great skill and precision."

"Hail, good sir! I must express my utmost satisfaction with your culinary establishment. My companion and I recently had the pleasure of partaking in your delectable offerings, and I must say, we were both thoroughly impressed. The baba ganoush, in particular, was a revelation - its rich, creamy texture and subtle tang of flavor left me in a state of gastronomic nirvana. I must confess, I have never been particularly fond of hummus, but the version served at your esteemed establishment has converted me into a devout aficionado. The generous portion of pita bread accompanying the dish was an added bonus, and I must commend your staff for their unwavering commitment to customer satisfaction. Furthermore, I was delighted to discover that the croquette dishes bore a striking resemblance to the burritos I once enjoyed, albeit with a far healthier twist. In conclusion, I must express my heartfelt gratitude for the exceptional dining experience afforded to us by your restaurant. Rest assured, we shall return forthwith, clad in attire emblazoned with the legend 'Baba Ganoush Forever'."

"Exquisite, independently operated retail establishment specializing in unique, high-end apparel and accessories from select, exclusive designers; staffed by knowledgeable, friendly sales associates who provide exceptional customer service, creating a charming, intimate shopping ambiance that fosters an organic sense of community among patrons, thereby rendering it a must-visit destination for fashion enthusiasts seeking a distinctive, personalized retail experience."

Hands down! This is the best Yelp decision I have ever made. Ever since I yelped Sushi places in Las Vegas and came across this gem, it has been nothing but amazing! The staff is super friendly and recognizes you after have eaten there a couple handfuls of times. 

The Happy Hour menu is small but everything is AMAZINGLY prices and I love the Sake choices! (Lychee Cold Sake is my favorite). 

My boyfriend and I even came here for a Non-Happy Hour dinner and everything was delicious. The chef gave us some Cajun Albacore on the house and that blew my mind. The next visit, we are letting him take control on what we eat because it was that delicious! 

Soho, you have customers for life!

One day Brett came in to my store ( Home Depot )  with his family to rent a tool. I recognized him since I watch the show. I happened to help him since he was next in line.  He was really a nice guy and very friendly. When I helped him to his car since the tool he rented was very heavy to lift. We chatted for a bit. Before going, he said for me to come in to the shop for a tour of the shop. Of course I accepted. Days later I went to the shop. Someone at the front desked walked me to his office. He did recognize me and kept his word about the tour. I met some of the workers. Everyone was very friendly. I got showed some exotic fish, the back area where they make the tanks. Met a few of their birds lol. It was a good experience. Thank you to ATM
Compared to the palazzo, this (Caesars) store is much bigger in terms of their display cases so my gf got to try on and see what's in season.

"Savor the delectable flavors of our premium beef rib and baby back pork ribs, and relish in the charming ambiance of our establishment, all while enjoying competitive pricing. While the Outlaw Burger may not have met your elevated expectations, we assure you that our ribs are truly exceptional."

"Indubitably, this eatery serves the most scrumptious and genuine Mexican fare I have had the pleasure of savoring stateside. As an individual who was born in Chicago but spent their formative years in Mexico, my palate has been finely attuned to the rich flavors of authentic Mexican cuisine. Upon partaking of the delectable Mole Verde, my gustatory senses were treated to an unparalleled culinary experience. Moreover, the establishment boasts an interior design that is nothing short of breathtaking, featuring an impressive piece of wooden artwork that pays homage to Mexico's storied past. For a more comprehensive visual representation, I highly recommend perusing the linked YouTube video."

Famous Dave's ribs are the best in town and I've tried a lot of different barbecue houses. Their wedge potatoes are incredibly delicious and the corn bread muffins are awesome. The service is friendly and the place is clean with an open roomy atmosphere. This is one of my favorite restaurants and I recommend it to anyone who likes barbecue.

"It is my utmost conviction that the personnel responsible for canine coiffure within these premises are truly exceptional in their vocation, as evidenced by the unwavering dedication and meticulous attention to detail they consistently display in their work. Moreover, the proprietor and staff members have always exhibited an unparalleled level of concern and commitment towards ensuring the well-being of their clientele, which has led me to become a steadfast patron of this establishment over an extended period of time."

Since our relocation to our current abode several years ago, this establishment has served as our preferred and sole destination for acquiring donuts. Despite the advent of a novel and illustrious donut shop in our vicinity, Rainbow Donuts retains its superiority. Following a couple of visits to the recently established enterprise, we have come to appreciate the conspicuous discrepancy in quality between the two. The staff at Rainbow Donuts consistently exhibit warmth and cordiality, while the culinary offerings are invariably delectable and diverse, encompassing an extensive array of flavors that cater to the discerning palates of their clientele. We unreservedly endorse this venue to those seeking a satisfying donut experience.

Britney Clark was fantastic with her services! We met her and gave her all the information necessary to serve our party.

We handed her an OOP along with a picture of the person needed to be served, and she was able and successful at serving her within 5 minutes!

Money well spent, thank you Britney!

aw man, this is a far, sketchy walk from the quad at 2:30am but worth it!
i kept going back up for more and more spicy adobada tacos- they were so freaking good.  i thought that the asada meat was a little dry but delightful nonetheless.

this is not gastronomie, it's street food at it's finest and probably the most authentic taco experience i've ever had.

"I have an immense fondness for this establishment!  You can invariably discover something delectable to consume.  I recently visited this venue for a friend's birthday celebration.  I would highly recommend their outdoor dining area.  It possesses a considerable size, and you may experience a delay if you fail to reserve a table in advance, even during the week for lunch.  We indulged in my preferred appetizer, the dates enveloped in bacon.  I thoroughly enjoy the arugula salad that accompanies the dates.  They also provide you with bread and a pesto dip made from olive oil.  That alone could suffice as a meal.  We ordered the chicken chopped salad, which was utterly scrumptious!  We informed the waitstaff that all four of us would be sharing, so they brought it out already portioned into four bowls.  Additionally, we relished the margarita flatbread and the sweet potato cannelloni that was simply divine!  We also ordered the cheeseburger, which was cut into four pieces as well.  The server also presented a chocolate cake accompanied by ice cream for our friend's birthday.  We received exceptional customer service!  We shall return shortly.  Perhaps for happy hour, as it is a satisfactory one!"

Seriously one of the best meals I've ever eaten. Ordered the Wellington, chorizo stuffed lobster tail, onion soup, green salad & rib eye. All absolutely amazing! Service was awesome place was cool worth every penny. If you are havin hard time thinking prices are high it's def worth it. Will go back my next Vegas trip!

Loved finding this unique and tasty restaurant off the strip for our vacation! The food was a  pleasant twist on the authentic flavors. Since my husband has taken trips to Spain this was a real comfort food trip for him. \n\nBe sure to try different tapas and share them in the standard Spanish tradition. We also enjoyed the Paella. A must for Vegas.

"My spouse and I were indulging in an excursion with our two youngest progeny when we chanced upon this culinary establishment. We opted to investigate its offerings further. What a serendipitous discovery indeed! I customized my own bowl, selecting the tofu option while specifying a carb-free variation, augmented by twice the amount of vegetables. Furthermore, I requested the green curry sauce. The tofu served was certified organic and non-GMO, and the entirety of my order was vegetarian in nature. The resultant dish was nothing short of sublime; fresh produce, impeccably grilled tofu, and a sauce that struck the perfect balance between piquancy and flavor. 
My better half elected to sample the spicy tuna roll, accompanied by the cucumber salad. His satisfaction with the culinary experience was palpable. Our son, aged twenty-two months, opted for the children's teriyaki chicken, accompanied by noodles. As per the standard operating procedure, he was presented with the choice between a cookie, mandarin oranges, or a beverage. He selected the latter. Our infant daughter, however, declined to partake in the gastronomical indulgence. 
The venue offers both sit-down and takeout options, with orders placed at a counter and subsequently delivered to the patron. The service was brisk and efficient, while the tariffs were reasonable. For approximately twenty dollars, we collectively enjoyed a wholesome, delectable repast. In a society where fast food has become ubiquitous, Tokyo Joe's presents a welcome respite. Whether one's dietary inclinations lean toward carnivorous, pescatarian, or vegetarian preferences, this eatery caters to them admirably. I shall unquestionably revisit this culinary haven."
I'm going to give this place 5 stars only because I feel bad I kinda threw up on their floor... \n\nI'm really sorry, Jimmy. I was really trashed!!

"This phenomenon exemplifies the embodiment of the genesis of Las Vegas's essence, whereupon an exceptional live jazz ensemble, complemented by aesthetically pleasing female dancers possessing extraordinary choreographic proficiency, and further enhanced by a gifted vocalist, collectively deliver a captivating spectacle that warrants unequivocal recommendation for any individual seeking a unique and memorable experience within the city's multifaceted entertainment landscape."

"The quality of the service rendered by the establishment was truly remarkable, as it transcended my expectations in terms of efficiency and responsiveness. Specifically, upon contacting them at the eleventh hour with a request for an assortment of chocolate-dipped strawberries, they exhibited an unwavering commitment to customer satisfaction by successfully procuring the desired items for me."

"A remarkable Cirque production that necessitates observation, boasting acts that rank among the most perilous and awe-inspiring performances witnessed within the scope of Cirque shows in Las Vegas. The proficiency and precision displayed by the performers in executing their crafts is utterly captivating, leaving one bereft of speech due to the sheer physical prowess and agility demanded by such feats."

"Feeling somewhat unwell one day and yearning for a culinary experience that would remind me of my beloved Bay Area Asian cuisine, I embarked upon a quest to locate a dining establishment that served exceptional Pho. Utilizing my trusty iPhone, I conducted a thorough search of the local vicinity, seeking a restaurant that would satisfy my craving for this delectable Vietnamese delicacy. After diligently perusing numerous options, I decided upon a particular venue that boasted an impressive reputation for serving authentic Pho. Following a leisurely 20-minute drive from my stylish loft, I arrived at the eatery, eager to indulge in a steaming bowl of savory noodles. Upon entering the cozy establishment, I was immediately struck by the welcoming ambiance and the enticing aroma of exotic spices wafting through the air. The menu offered an array of tantalizing options, each showcasing the nuanced flavors and textures that have become synonymous with genuine Vietnamese cuisine. Opting for a diverse selection of toppings, including an assortment of succulent seafood and flavorful tofu, I eagerly anticipated the arrival of my steaming bowl of Pho. As I savored each spoonful, I was delightfully surprised by the rich, complex flavors that danced across my palate, leaving me utterly satiated yet still yearning for more. In addition to the delectable Pho, I also opted to sample the Vietnamese Shrimp Rolls, which were expertly prepared and presented with a dash of elegance. Ultimately, I departed the restaurant feeling pleasantly content, my hunger thoroughly satiated, and my spirits lifted. Moreover, I still had sufficient financial resources remaining to indulge in a spot of shoe shopping the following day, an added bonus that brought me immense satisfaction."

"Having been engaged in a diligent quest for a suitable computer repair establishment to facilitate an operating system upgrade from Windows XP to Windows 7, as well as execute a comprehensive migration of my Outlook Express files to Outlook, I was confronted with a myriad of challenges. My endeavors to enlist the assistance of numerous companies proved largely unsuccessful, as only a select few bothered to respond, and their proposed service fees were left alarmingly open-ended. In the midst of my growing frustration, a novel storefront conveniently materialized adjacent to the UPS Store wherein I maintain a rented box. Upon the enthusiastic recommendation of Joe, the proprietor of the aforementioned UPS Store, I opted to entrust my computer conundrum to the capable hands of Matt and Dave. My decision proved nothing short of serendipitous, as the duo tenaciously tackled the intricate task at hand, undeterred by its complexity. Despite the prolonged nature of the undertaking, spanning from June 13th to June 24th, they steadfastly honored their commitment, refusing to compromise on either their integrity or the agreed-upon fee. Presently, I am delighted to be composing this testimonial on my revitalized computer, brimming with gratitude for my fortuitous encounter with these exceptional technicians. I emphatically urge anyone seeking computer-related solutions to consider their services, which extend beyond PCs and laptops to encompass phones, tablets, and televisions, among other devices."

"My affection for Luv-It is unwavering; my preferred sundae is the Western, although I have endeavored to broaden my horizons by sampling some of their daily flavors. While I may be accustomed to my customary sundae, I find that it surpasses the flavors of the day served in a cone. Although I appreciate the variety they offer, I still prefer the familiarity of my beloved sundae. Occasionally, I indulge in their unique flavors, and I relish the opportunity to observe the diverse clientele while waiting in line. Despite the occasional delay, I acknowledge that progress has been made regarding their extended hours, as they now operate seven days a week, which was not always the case. Following a satisfying meal at Viva Arepeas, a visit to Luv-It for dessert is an ideal way to culminate my downtown excursion. It is indeed a delectable experience, and I must advise that bringing cash is essential, as an ATM is available in the adjacent mini mart for those who require it."

In town celebrating my son's wedding, I came in to Vo's looking for a pedi/mani/fill's for 5 people on 6/6/14, including the bride.  \nOne of the best experiences we'd ever had. We all agreed on that.  The fact it's family owned and operated makes for a great time.  From the customers to the staff, everyone was happy and engaging.  \nThank you Vo's for being so attentive and making us laugh. We loved our time with you.

We entered this establishment during a Yelp-hosted gathering with the intention of crafting a brief assessment of our experience. Julia, an individual who has achieved considerable success in the realm of chocolate confectionery, graced us with her presence and imparted a captivating account of her journey in the industry. Her demeanor was characterized by effervescence and enthusiasm, which greatly enhanced our enjoyment of the occasion. As we partook in the festivities, we had the privilege of sampling three of her sumptuous creations, specifically a passion fruit cake, a red velvet cake, and a chocolate mousse, all of which harmonized beautifully with an exceptional chocolate martini. It is suffice to say that these indulgences left us in a state of unadulterated delight, and we unhesitatingly anticipate the prospect of revisiting this venue in the future.

"Gastronomical indulgence and exceptional hospitality were the hallmarks of our dining experience at this esteemed establishment, as we savored their delectable pumpkin curry, a culinary masterpiece that showcased the chef's artistry and expertise in the kitchen. The menu offered an innovative heat scale, ranging from a modest 1 to a formidable 5, and we opted for the latter, bravely venturing into uncharted territories of fiery flavors. While the intensity of the spices was undoubtedly a bold departure from the usual Thai cuisine, it was tempered by the subtle sweetness of the green tea ice cream, a delightful dessert that capped off a truly satisfying repast. We look forward to revisiting this gastronomic gem, eager to sample more of their creative and mouthwatering offerings."

It was proximate to the termination of the diurnal period and I was capable of vacating my occupational duties somewhat prematurely, thus permitting me to place a telephone call to D'Lisa. She possessed the capability to schedule an appointment for me in a remarkably brief time frame, despite the fact that it was an eleventh-hour request and the hour was advanced considerably. Upon my arrival, she had prepared herself for my visit and extended an offer of a refreshing beverage. She executed the waxing procedure with utmost proficiency and efficiency, sculpting my eyebrows into a flawless arc. I shall unquestionably revisit her establishment and eagerly anticipate my subsequent encounter, as the entire experience was utterly satisfying and bereft of any disagreeable aspects. My sincere gratitude is extended toward her!

"Indubitably, an economically priced tire can be procured at this establishment. My affinity for this particular location stems from the fact that they provide a comprehensive warranty in conjunction with a multitude of supplementary services, thereby rendering the acquisition of a new tire a seamless and convenient process. Furthermore, I must commend the staff on their exceptional efficiency, as I was able to complete my transaction and depart the premises in a mere fraction of time, specifically, less than fifteen minutes. Kudos to them for their impressive customer service!"

"Other rapid-service Mexican establishments impose additional charges for supplementary fajita vegetables or excessive salsa on the side, whereas Chipotle permits customers to request augmented quantities of nearly every constituent without incurring further costs, excluding double meat or guacamole; the servings are copious, and the company's emphasis on the ethical considerations of culinary production serves as an exceptional marketing strategy, thereby making it an ideal dining destination for me, irrespective of the number of companions accompanying me."
Go see Heather G! She's cut my hair the last few times and I won't go anywhere else .. She does a. Ice scalp massage and uses good styling products.

I would not trust anyone but Connie to watch my dog.  The pictures she has posted of her clients are so cute and adorable.   She is so flexible and when she has watched my dog in the past, I would always get a text message about how she was doing.  Great place highly recommend.

The best mussels ever, and great pastas and pizzas. my husbands favourite is the steak in Diablo sauce.   friendly staff and great atmosphere nice selection of wines  this is  my favourite italian restaurant

"This eatery warrants a perfect five-star rating due to its harmonious confluence of delectable comfort cuisine, an ambiance that exudes refinement and warmth, and a service staff who display consummate proficiency and attention to detail. The duck breast dish was truly exceptional, and I would unhesitatingly endorse opting for this culinary masterpiece. Although there was a slight delay in the delivery of our initial courses, and they arrived independently of one another, the restaurant graciously chose to omit these items from our final bill. Ultimately, we were thoroughly enchanted by both the exquisite fare and the exceptional hospitality extended to us."

We had a delightful early dinner on Saturday at Tina's!  The food was fantastic and we loved the laid back family atmostphere.  My daughter was with a friend and I and even she loved the food.  We spent quite a while having the unique experience of conversation and learning of this culture!  We all three cant wait to go back for yumminess and a warm atmosphere!  thanks Tina!

Love scottsdale quarter and this store by far has the best semi annual sale selection. Organized, clean and I got wall flowers for $2 refills what a huge reflection will be back! A great asset to the shopping center!

"My affection towards the ABC Store is unwavering, with its extensive array of products catering to my dietary requirements, and the Las Vegas location on the Strip epitomizes convenience, offering an expeditious procurement experience for both sustenance and mementos; furthermore, the abundance of locally manufactured items from Hawai'i ensures that I can relish a tangible connection to my cherished island paradise, while the diverse assortment of souvenirs, including an abundance of Hello Kitty Vegas memorabilia, serves as a testament to the store's commitment to catering to the diverse preferences of its clientele, thereby rendering it an optimal destination for fulfilling my shopping needs."

"Upon my maiden visit, I was thoroughly captivated by the ambiance and the exceptional level of service delivered by the server, who demonstrated remarkable proficiency in simultaneously fulfilling her dual roles as a bartender and server, all while maintaining an unwavering work ethic that left me utterly impressed. Furthermore, the venue itself exuded a vibrant energy, which was complemented by an array of delectable culinary offerings that satiated my appetite to the point of near-bursting. Even now, my thoughts are preoccupied with musings of my prospective return and the tantalizing prospect of savoring their gastronomical creations yet again."

"Upon perusing the previous reviews, my consternation mounted, as it appeared that an unfortunate prejudice against establishments of a certain size was prevalent. As a Madisonian, I am ardently devoted to supporting local businesses; however, I find it incongruous to dismiss a restaurant merely due to its growth and development. Following a brief investigation, I discovered that Claddagh operates a mere 15 pubs, all situated within the Midwestern region, and are owned and run by Irish proprietors. Furthermore, their culinary offerings are indeed impressive, particularly their exceptional Fish and Chips, delectable burgers, and inventive fusion dishes. During my visit, I sampled their Chicken Curry, which, despite my initial reservations, owing to my fondness for Indian cuisine, proved to be quite flavorful. Additionally, their Happy Hour presents an excellent opportunity to indulge in reasonably priced libations, as evidenced by the modest cost of my Bud Light. It is worth mentioning that Claddagh does, in fact, carry Spotted Cow, although the availability may vary. Lastly, their outdoor seating area accommodates canine companions, which contributes to the establishment's overall appeal."

"The savory, tender, and juicy quality of the ribeye steak at this establishment was truly remarkable, and it is abundantly evident that the culinary expertise of Chef Emeril Lagasse has once again succeeded in creating an unparalleled dining experience for patrons such as myself. Furthermore, I must express my sincere gratitude for the exceptional service and ambiance provided by the staff, which greatly enhanced my overall satisfaction with the meal. It is my fervent hope that my subsequent dining excursions, including a planned visit to Commander's Palace in two years' time, will continue to showcase the same level of gastronomic excellence and hospitality that I have come to expect from this esteemed culinary institution."

We stayed here over the ASU move in weekend. We absolutely loved the rooftop deck with the pool and hot tub at night. The breakfast was amazing. Fresh fruit was delicious! The staff were so friendly, and they took us by shuttle when we needed it since we didn't have a rental car. Thanks, everyone! From our family in Wisconsin to yours. We will be back!

"My culinary preferences have undergone a transformation; whereas I formerly professed to abstain from indulging in sweet treats, I now make an exception for the delectable cupcakes purveyed by Butter and Me, whose proprietor, Kelly, boasts an unparalleled mastery of the art of creating sublime butter cream icing that complements the ideal texture of her cakes, leaving me perpetually in awe and inspiring me to enthusiastically endorse her bakery, which consistently delivers exceptional quality and reliable service, including timely weekend delivery, further solidifying my unwavering patronage."

Urban Mutts has undergone a transformation, altering their moniker to So Fetch! In order to experience their proficiency firsthand, I brought along my two canine companions - a majestic Saint Bernard and a playful cocker spaniel. The grooming process was nothing short of extraordinary, as my Saint Bernard emerged with a lavish summer cut, replete with a regal purple Lion's tail. The grooming team at So Fetch demonstrated unwavering dedication to their craft, meticulously styling my Saint Bernard's coat into pigtails adorned with exquisite Hawaiian blooms, thereby accentuating her innate elegance. Furthermore, they went above and beyond my expectations by giving my cocker spaniel, Leo, a refined makeover, artfully blending a sleek, clean-cut appearance with the preservation of his iconic ears and legs. To add a touch of whimsy to their new looks, both dogs were treated to a sprinkle of dazzling glitter, imbuing them with an air of enchantment.

When I came here, I knew it would be hard to go to any other bar on campus again. Their beer selection is impressive to say the least. The range and caliber of the drink selection is great. 

I came here on a number of happy hours to meet with colleagues and friends and it has always been a pleasant experience. 

One criticism (for myself or the owners) is that it is sometimes annoying that there are two Blind Pigs (the original and the brewery; one on walnut and the other on Neil) because oftentimes we get confused which one we are going to. If you are looking to get some food, I am afraid you are out of luck because they only have drinks. 

On many occasions I went to the sandwich/bread shop to get appetizers and/or a meal and there were no objections. I call it: BYOF. Definitely the best place to go for a drink for those who love and appreciate good brews.

I LOVE THIS PLACE. My second review, yes--but I wanted to see if I could add a sixth star. Came back here three more times, and every single time the owner has come out and talked to me. He's such a great guy and totally boosts this place. GO GO GO.

A novel standard has been established for public houses in Las Vegas. 
  In my preliminary evaluation, I extolled the remarkable hospitality and exceptionally convivial ambiance of this diminutive, unpretentious establishment situated on the western periphery of the city, but I also noted that the culinary offerings were not particularly noteworthy. 
  Well, that has undergone a transformation with Sagos latest menu. I possess two words - EXCELLENT EFFORT! 
  By reorienting the menu towards the restaurants Baja motif, administration has introduced an entirely novel array of options, comprising of delectable selections such as fish and shrimp tacos, homemade pizza, a mouthwatering chicken avocado sandwich, a fresh interpretation of the BLT with a tomato jelly that is truly impressive, and numerous other tantalizing dishes. 
  If you partake in a visit - which is highly recommended - you must sample the Ceviche. Encased in what appeared to resemble a sea-shell shaped, crisp flour tortilla, the flavor is sublime, and the proportion of serving size to price will satiate your hunger while simultaneously inspiring you to place an additional order. 
  Kudos to Sagos; you have excelled in every aspect - exceptional cuisine, exceptional service, and an exceptional atmosphere. I shall return forthwith.

"It's analogous to the Scottsdale Gun Club, sans the pecuniary burden of projectiles! An optimal location for practicing marksmanship, accommodating both novice and seasoned shooters. Instructional courses tailored for children and grown-ups. Boasting a climate-controlled environment and rigorous safety protocols, I could easily while away an entire summer herein, thoroughly enjoying myself. Five stars, hands down."

I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Cosmopolitan, and I must say, it was an unforgettable experience! The accommodations were utterly breathtaking, with a stunning view of the Las Vegas Strip from our spacious balcony. In fact, we had the perfect vantage point to observe the majestic Bellagio fountains, which were situated directly beneath our luxurious lodgings. I must admit, I became so thoroughly entertained that I inadvertently left behind my cherished $230 Tory Burch sandals. To my utmost dismay, I thought they were gone forever. However, when I contacted the hotel's lost and found department, I was delightfully surprised to discover that a diligent housekeeping attendant had kindly returned my mislaid footwear. I felt compelled to express my heartfelt gratitude and offer a generous gratuity, but unfortunately, the identity of the benevolent staff member remained unknown. Nonetheless, I would like to extend my sincere appreciation to the Cosmopolitan for providing exceptional hospitality and maintaining such a commendable team of dedicated and trustworthy employees.

Milunka is great! I never really write yelp reviews but I decided to write one for her because she really takes her time to make sure your face is clean and thoroughly taken care of. Her facials are great because she does extractions, which is probably the most important thing about getting a facial done! I've gone to her twice and will definitely be going back again!

I have had the pleasure of experiencing Meg's therapeutic expertise for nearly a year, during which time she has administered various forms of manual therapy, including lymphatic drainage and profound deep tissue manipulations. Following each session, I have felt revitalized and rejuvenated, attesting to Meg's exceptional skill and dedication to her craft. It is noteworthy that Meg takes the time to establish a personal connection with her clients before the massage, thereby creating a tailored experience that addresses specific needs and preferences. I wholeheartedly endorse Meg for her extensive knowledge, unwavering passion, and commitment to delivering exceptional massage therapy services.

This establishment undoubtedly could not be more optimal. I visited this restaurant for an evening meal alongside some family members subsequent to perusing favorable Yelp assessments. Upon our entrance, we were cordially received by the proprietor's father, who promptly presented us with tortilla chips and a delectable salsa for the table and offered thorough explanations regarding the menu's offerings. The culinary selections were utterly scrumptious - I opted for the CC Sizzle sopaipilla variant. Its flavors were so captivating that I devoured every last morsel, resulting in an unfortunate yet utterly gratifying food-induced lethargy. My fellow diners also relished their respective meals. Prior to our departure, the chef emerged and graciously bestowed upon us steaming hot sopaipillas enveloped in cinnamon, compliments of the house. Their delectability was unparalleled. As we prepared to exit, we compensated and gratuited our attentive server. To our astonishment, he declined the gratuity; however, after persistent encouragement, he ultimately accepted the generosity with great appreciation. His commitment to ensuring the satisfaction of his son's clientele was sufficient enough to guarantee our return to this eatery. I strongly advise giving this dining establishment a try; you will assuredly not experience any regret.

I honestly have never gotten my nails done at Polished and not that I want to write a review about waxing- but all I can say is Hayley is fabulous-quick and professional. I have visited here for six years and will continue to. Tips in cash or check only.

"My sentiments regarding this establishment are unequivocally positive, as it offers an impressive array of high-quality coffee and tea products, reminiscent of those found in Europe. Patrons can purchase freshly brewed coffee or beans, as well as loose-leaf tea in bulk quantities, starting from a 1/4 pound and up. Additionally, the shop boasts an extensive selection of coffee and tea accessories, confectionaries, and chocolates. The prices are reasonable, and the staff is both cordial and knowledgeable. On my last visit, I opted for green tea, and while the gentleman attending to me was not particularly familiar with tea varieties, he exhibited commendable resourcefulness by locating a colleague who possessed greater expertise. This experience serves as a testament to the staff's dedication to providing exceptional customer service. As a suggestion, consider visiting this shop on Thursday afternoons, when Market Square hosts its weekly farmer's market, allowing you to conveniently acquire fresh produce and delectable pierogies in addition to your coffee and tea purchases."

Paymon's unwavering commitment to culinary excellence has captured my heart, particularly during the sweltering summer months when their delectable cold cucumber soup ascends to an unparalleled level of gastronomic delight. Such a refreshing elixir serves as a precursor to the savory indulgences that await, including, but not limited to, the tantalizing chicken curry, hummus, dolmas, and lentil soup, each a masterclass in flavor profile symphony. My unbridled enthusiasm for this eatery compels me to partake in their happy hour festivities forthwith, an occasion that promises to satiate my epicurean inclinations and leave me in a state of unadulterated jubilation.

"This establishment and its proprietors possess exceptional qualities, manifesting in a superior customer experience.  Mr. Phong and his spouse exhibit amiable and jovial demeanors, regaling patrons with engaging anecdotes.  A diverse array of imported beverages is available, and Phong demonstrates his commitment to customer satisfaction by procuring specific items upon request, despite not regularly stocking them.  Prices are reasonable, and a variety of necessities complement the impressive beverage selection, further enhancing the overall experience."

With all the hype and great things said about this place, why wouldn't I try a little Good Fellas Grill.  In addition, I was looking for something a little on the healthy side, and this somewhat meets that criteria.

OH MY GOSH!  Isn't that hummus and baba ganoush amazing?  The owner split our plate in half so we could enjoy this excellent dip.  It packed flavor, freshness, and a delicious spread on top of my pita.  The wifey and I were not able to finish it, and I would have to be so bold to say that it even tasted better the following day.  No way?  Oh yes way, my friend!

There is a ton of hype on the lentil soup, but I would have to say the potato soup had more flavor and was definitely more hearty than the lentil.  Therefore, I would highly recommend trying the potato as well.

The wifey had salad wraps while I had the 2 meat combo.  Since my wife did not share the wraps, I am sure they were delicious, as she kept them to herself.  The 2 meat combo is like the combo punch and kick you would see watching old school batman with the words saying, "bam, pow, or crunch!"  Meaning, the meat, the chicken, with the rice, onions, and tomato make for a treat for excitement.

It definitely lives up to its hype and adds on to another great Greek Restaurant in Phoenix!  We will see you again!

I love, love, love me some  Oregano's and I'm so glad I live just a few miles away. Their salads, their sandwiches, appetizers, pizzas and pizookie dessert are all amazing. Serious grub, very affordable, huge portions, a fun atmosphere, super friendly wait staff...this place has it all.\n\nThe only negative I have ever had is just a personal preference. If you are in a mellow mood or looking for something more romantic on a date night, this isn't the spot. It's LOUD and pretty cramped full of tables, people and antique 'stuff.' Fun if you are in a social mood and don't mind your personal space being invaded often.

"A plethora of captivating attractions await visitors in this historic district, boasting an array of shopping establishments, quaint eateries, and vibrant nightlife venues, while presenting a challenge in securing parking facilities; thus, I strongly suggest opting for the convenience of valet services. Steeped in rich heritage, this quaint area offers a glimpse into the past through its numerous historical museums and charming trolley rides, further enhanced by the abundance of delectable dining options that cater to diverse tastes and preferences. Additionally, every Saturday, the bustling Farmers Market showcases an assortment of local vendors, providing yet another advantage of exploring this picturesque neighborhood, which is home to an eclectic mix of unique shops and boutiques, each offering a distinctive experience for visitors."

My boyfriend and I took a last minute trip to Vegas, and based on reviews, made a reservation at Cut.  We were not disappointed.  From the moment we walked through the door the service was friendly, accommodating, and attentive from the hostesses, to the bartender, to our two waiters.  Wine choices were on par. Nice, simple decor.  Excellent presentation and recommendations on types of steak.  Did not skimp on the bread (which unfortunately we took full advantage of).  We shared the American Wagyu Beef porterhouse for two and it was possible the BEST steak I have ever had.  Cooked to perfection.  Sides of mac and cheese and caramelized cauliflower also did not disappoint.  We finished with a huge and yummy chocolate souffl\u00e9.  The whole experience was a delight.  Great meal, great atmosphere, great service.  You can't ask for much more.  We definitely made the right choice with this restaurant.

"Experience the magic of cinema in an intimate setting, reminiscent of a bygone era, where the art of filmmaking takes center stage and captivates a discerning audience. Occasionally, one may have the privilege of enjoying a cinematic masterpiece alongside a mere 18 other connoisseurs, creating an atmosphere that can only be described as sublime. For those seeking a truly unique and immersive experience, the Schauburg is the quintessential destination."

"If you seek an exceptional method of caring for your beloved companion animal during your absence, I strongly advise considering the services of Doolittle's Doghouse. Their unique approach involves entrusting your pet to the tender care of a meticulously chosen 'nannie,' who will lavish your furry friend with affection and attention within the comfort of their own home, thereby eliminating the need for sterile kennels and runs. As a seasoned veterinarian, I exercise great discretion when offering endorsements, and I unhesitatingly recommend this premier pet-sitting service to my acquaintances, relatives, and clientele."

Don't really need to say much here, as 2000+ reviews at a 4.5 star average speaks for itself. I was out all night and was too tired to go out for lunch with my friends, but they were kind enough to bring me an Earl's Club back. It was probably a good hour or so by time they ordered it to the time they brought it back to me, but the sandwich was still warm and delicious! I can't imagine how much better it would be fresh! For $6, this is a freaking steal compared to a lot of the more expensive food options in Vegas. Couple that with the fact that it's open 24 hours, and this place is money.

First time here (yesterday) I had the beach house burger, was the best hamburger I have ever had.  Came back today for lunch and had the br\u00fbl\u00e9e burger... New best burger I've ever had.  Didn't know a hamburger could do this to my taste buds.

Anna pretty much took the words out of my mouth on this one. I'm going to add one more thing. They have a extremely unique way of arrange flowers, very modern and bespoke looking. I can't (and won't) describe it any further, visit to see!

Meaghan has been doing my hair for 18years and she is amazing! I have followed her all over the city! She is very precise on her color, blending highlights and a perfect hair cut every time! I highly recommend give her a try and I promise you will be in love. She is also very reasonable priced for the excellent services! I love going to see her!

"Whenever I find myself in Las Vegas, I invariably make a point to visit this establishment, as it has consistently demonstrated an impressive level of quality and popularity, irrespective of the time of day or night that I choose to patronize it. On my most recent visit, I opted to sample their tacos al pastor and carne asada, which I can confidently assert are among the finest examples of such culinary delights that I have had the pleasure of indulging in during my extensive travels to this city, renowned for its vibrant nightlife and diverse dining options."

"This eatery boasts an exceptional ambiance, secluded within a miniature plaza; its gastronomical delights are truly sublime, particularly the velvety broccoli soup and the delectable Mediterranean wrap, which culminates in a resoundingly positive experience that warrants its inclusion in my catalog of preferred luncheon venues."

"Optimal counsel for patrons of De'Lucas is to arrive promptly, particularly during weekends, to avoid an extensive wait time. We arrived at approximately 8:00 a.m. on a Saturday and encountered only a brief delay of roughly five minutes. Subsequently, we engaged in some retail therapy along the strip, and upon our return at 10:00 a.m., a considerable queue had formed, awaiting admission. The culinary offerings were undoubtedly fresh and delectable, with the toast and French toast being crafted from premium Mancini bread. The pancakes were equally impressive. The service was expedient and cordial, considering the high volume of customers. To maximize your experience, we recommend arriving early and savoring a leisurely morning, as we did."

"This gastronomical indulgence represents the epitome of culinary excellence; a delectable breakfast burrito, imbued with an unparalleled divine essence, courtesy of the chef's judicious utilization of their signature salsa. The ambiance within the establishment exudes an urban chic appeal, further enhanced by the presence of a Mexican grandmother diligently preparing the fare in the kitchen, thereby ensuring an unwavering commitment to authenticity. A prolonged waiting period for our repast served as a harbinger of the meticulous attention invested in each dish's preparation, much to our delight. The ensuing flavors aroused our taste buds, eliciting an involuntary expression of rapture, thereby validating our decision to patronize this eatery. My unbridled enthusiasm compels me to acquire their El Sol salsa, while simultaneously fostering an eagerness to explore the surrounding downtown Chandler district, replete with an array of captivating Mexican restaurants. Unquestionably, this dining experience has supplanted Los Favoritos as my preferred culinary destination."

Vegas is a foodie town, and Aria has a lot of wonderful restaurants.  If you ask me, Julian Serrano is the best restaurant in Aria and it's one of my favorite places to eat in Las Vegas.

I LOVE THIS RESTAURANT.  

Service is top-notch and fast.  For a party of 14, I was worried about the wait time for food.  No need to worry, they know what they're doing!  Food started coming out almost immediately.  Tapas are a terrific option for large groups.  The pace of dishes coming out was perfect.  Also our waiter was able to split up the bill (we ordered in groups of 3 to 5 people).  

Finally, the food.  It's excellent!!  Everything is amazing but I particularly recommend the calamari, which is among the best I've ever eaten.  Other notable dishes include the salmon, the risotto, croquetas, peppers, papas bravas.

You simply cannot go wrong eating here.

"The most delectable red curry I have had the pleasure of consuming in a considerable amount of time! Indeed, I am experiencing an intense sensation of salivation merely by pondering its rich, flavorful essence. Moreover, if one were to request it be prepared with an additional degree of piquancy, oh my, will they truly deliver on that front! I thoroughly enjoy partaking in their luncheon special, which for the reasonable sum of $7.50, includes a bowl of savory soup, two mouthwatering wontons, a crispy egg roll, and, of course, a generous serving of fragrant rice accompanied by a main course of one's choosing. The prices are quite reasonable, the service is attentive and efficient, and, needless to say, the red curry is utterly sublime. While their orange chicken dish is undoubtedly worthy of praise, I find myself consistently opting for the red curry, as it is simply too delicious to resist. My sole criticism pertains to their choice of dipping sauce for the egg rolls, which, in my opinion, would greatly benefit from being replaced by the sweeter, more tangy chili sauce commonly served at Thai establishments."

"Consistently delivering exceptional customer service, this establishment has proven itself to be a paragon of excellence in the realm of automotive maintenance. My recent visit for a flat tire repair served as a prime example of their proficiency, as I was greeted promptly and attended to with utmost efficiency, sans any unnecessary upselling or prolonged waiting periods. In fact, the accuracy of the estimated wait time imparted by the knowledgeable and friendly staff further solidified my confidence in their capabilities. Unhesitatingly, I would recommend this location to anyone seeking top-notch service and an unparalleled customer experience."

"Indubitably, one of the culinary gems of Phoenix, our dining experience at Windsor was nothing short of exceptional. As ardent devotees of Postinos, we were jubilant upon learning of its opening, and our elevated expectations were not only met but exceeded by the delectable fare offered. From their signature cocktails, which struck an impeccable balance between flavors, to their diverse and rotating selection of craft beers that showcased a remarkable attention to detail, every aspect of our meals was utterly satisfying. Furthermore, the hospitality we received was of the highest caliber, making us feel welcome and valued throughout our visit. For those seeking a restaurant that offers a warm and inviting ambiance, complemented by attentive service and a menu brimming with mouth-watering dishes, Windsor is an unquestionable choice."

I had previously visited Rochelle's Salon on one occasion and was thoroughly displeased with the individual who styled my hair, which led me to harbor some trepidation when considering a return visit; however, after a considerable lapse of time, I decided to summon the fortitude necessary to give the establishment another opportunity, albeit solely for the purpose of obtaining a blow dry and style. Subsequently, we continued to engage in this manner for an extended period, during which time they recommended that I consult Abel, who demonstrated exceptional proficiency in his craft and ultimately fostered a sense of trust sufficient enough for me to entrust him with the responsibility of cutting and coloring my hair. Currently, I am an ardent devotee of Rochelle's Salon, and Abel, possessing a remarkable combination of creativity, affability, and adaptability, continues to excel in his role as a hairstylist, although his attempts at offering romantic counsel are perhaps best described as amusing, if not slightly salacious. Notwithstanding, Liz, stationed at the front desk, has exhibited an impressive faculty for remembering clients, a trait that has proven invaluable in cultivating a sense of familiarity and comfort within the salon's patrons.

I dropped into this gym while traveling for work. The staff was amazingly inviting and friendly.  The facilities were spacious and new.  The workout was rewardingly tough.  I can't say enough good things about this gym.  If you are contemplating joining a cross-fit gym, I highly recommend.

"We were impressed by their exceptional clientele assistance, as they proactively notified us of a potential delay in our prearranged transportation from the airport, prioritizing our punctuality by offering a refund for an alternative taxi, thus ensuring seamless logistics during the busy holiday season."

We have had the pleasure of partaking in the culinary delights offered by this esteemed establishment on multiple occasions in recent weeks, with each visit showcasing an unwavering commitment to excellence in the preparation of their dishes. Our experiences have been nothing short of exceptional, as we have sampled a diverse array of items from their menu, all of which have demonstrated a masterful blend of flavors and presentation. Of particular note is their salad, which boasts the nutritional benefits of kale in place of ubiquitous lettuce, providing a healthier alternative without sacrificing taste. Additionally, their chicken wings are cooked to a golden, crispy perfection, while the Turkeygiving Burger presents a formidable challenge to its competitors. Lastly, the Chicken N Waffles dish is an absolute delight, with its rich, savory flavors leaving us in a state of epicurean nirvana. Suffice it to say, our patronage of this restaurant will continue unabated in the near future.

"Exceptional customer experience! The van driver manifests remarkable hospitality and support. We entrust our garments to their facility for laundry and tailoring services, and their performance has consistently met or surpassed our expectations."

"If you are seeking a unique and stylish pair of athletic shoes that exude a sense of funkiness, then you should consider visiting this establishment, as they boast an impressive array of such footwear. I can confidently attest to the exceptional quality of their merchandise, and I am certain that I will return in the future to peruse their wares once again."

Went there today for the first time and was impressed!!!  It's really lovely inside, very spacious - couches, tables, and a side room with big tables where you can sit and do work with books, a laptop, etc.  The decor is also really lovely.

I also think their menu is fabulous. While I've only been there once and can't speak to the quality of all the items listed, my friend had a tea she enjoyed, a panini that she said was delicious; and I had the side salad that was excellent for only $4.99.  They are also giving away free donuts with purchase to promote their opening and I thought it was very tasty.

Their menu includes salads, sandwiches, paninis, deserts/pastries/donuts and coffee/espresso.  

I will definitely go back - great location, lovely inside, and a great offering of foods.

My better half and I became cognizant of the existence of this eatery/watering hole through an amicable acquaintance, and our culinary experience was utterly devoid of any trace of disappointment. The comestibles served at this establishment are of exceptional quality, the staff members are cordial and affable, and the tariffs charged for their consumables are eminently reasonable and pocket-friendly. Following our initial visit, we have had the pleasure of partaking in their gastronomical offerings on multiple occasions, and we unhesitatingly intend to perpetuate this practice in the future.

I have used completely clean for several years for my cars and company trucks and they are fabulous always on time and will work on meeting me were my trucks or cars  are even at last minute to get them cleaned Thank you

During my recent sojourn in Las Vegas, which transpired in the month of February, I had the pleasure of visiting a particular establishment on three separate occasions within the duration of my one-week stay.
