The culinary offerings at this venue were indeed impressive, and the hospitality displayed by the staff was nothing short of exceptional, characterized by engaging dialogue that contributed to an ambiance that was both convivial and welcoming. It is worth noting that among the various options available, The Avalon emerged as my personal preference, primarily due to its generous portion of goat cheese. Additionally, I would be remiss if I did not express my enthusiasm for the Berry Lemonade, which served as an ideal complement to the delectable fare offered by the restaurant. In conclusion, I would like to extend my sincerest commendations to the management and staff of this esteemed establishment, and I eagerly anticipate the opportunity to revisit and partake in their exceptional cuisine once again in the future, should my travels bring me to this captivating city once more. Provided that any doubts or uncertainties may arise, I would advocate for an exploratory visit to this venue, as I am confident that the experience will prove to be nothing short of gratifying.

"Upon entering the establishment, I proceeded to procure a novel battery for my timepiece, an endeavor that was successfully accomplished within a mere three-minute timespan. This experience was decidedly more satisfactory than those at the shopping center, where such services are often provided at a less impressive level of efficiency."

"Goodness gracious! I had no idea what exceptional automotive servicing entailed until I stepped foot into Rebel Auto's premises. The level of proficiency and amiability displayed by their team left me utterly flabbergasted! To think that they offer a complimentary arcade for patrons to indulge in while their vehicles are being attended to, it's truly an impressive gesture. It's not some cheap marketing ploy, mind you; it's a genuine attempt at ensuring their clientele experience utmost satisfaction. The pricing, my goodness! It's unparalleled, especially when juxtaposed with the exorbitant fees charged by dealerships for vehicles barely two years old. My goodness me, the expediency with which they executed the oil change left me dumbfounded! Furthermore, the staff presented me with sound counsel, all the while refraining from applying any pressure tactics. As a recent transplant to this locality, I feel incredibly fortunate to have stumbled upon Rebel Auto. It appears they've secured a loyal patron in me for the long haul!"

I went here today for lunch   Needing time away  from work so I drove to sakana I walked in, the place was very busy right off the bat I was greeted with a big hello and smile ......thank you I had the savanna lunch special 9.99 which included miso soup a nice salad  6 or so pieces of fish 6 pieces of rolls and a smoked salmon tempura roll  thing very good and plenty of food

"It is utterly impossible to replicate the extraordinary experience offered by Skoti, as my previous endeavors to partake in the Las Vegas nightlife sans his expertise have proven. Not only did I purchase tickets and endure lengthy queues, but I also received no preferential treatment whatsoever. In contrast, Skoti's exceptional proficiency ensures a seamless and expedited entry into the most coveted clubs, regardless of the size of your gathering. His remarkable efficiency has consistently enabled me to bypass lines, much to the astonishment of my companions who have witnessed my swift entrance. Moreover, Skoti's unparalleled familiarity with the city's culinary scene makes him an indispensable resource for anyone seeking exquisite dining experiences. Thus, I unequivocally endorse his exceptional services to anyone seeking an unforgettable Vegas adventure."

Great donuts, a little hard to find but worth the hunt. Must taste their cronuts and their apple fritters. My wife loves the chocolate chip rolls. They can also make your next party cake. We have had them make a birthday cake and a anniversary cake in the past. Always excellent!

This location is utterly remarkable! Its geographical positioning renders it easily accessible, and the complimentary valet service is undoubtedly flawless. Although there was no charge associated with this amenity, I felt no hesitation whatsoever in compensating a nominal fee for the sheer convenience it afforded us. The culinary offerings at this establishment are truly exceptional! In the company of several acquaintances, I partook in a leisurely Saturday morning repast here. Our party of six to seven individuals was graciously accommodated within a commodious and inviting seating area. Our server, cognizant of our preference for the delectable beverage known as mimosas, considerately suggested that we might derive greater satisfaction from a full bottle, given its comparable cost to individual glasses. (In essence, $5 per person.) Upon perusing previous patron testimonials, my attention became captivated by the enticing prospect of savoring the bruschetta. Nonetheless, my fellow diners were inclined toward the breakfast items listed on the menu. Each dish, boasting an array of tantalizing flavors, appeared irresistible! My personal selection was the panini composed of prosciutto and Brie, accompanied by a portion of crispy fries. Oh, how thoroughly delightful! Such a satisfying blend of flavors, leaning slightly towards the sweeter spectrum owing to the presence of fig, yet showcasing an impressive diversity of taste experiences with each bite. I am eagerly anticipating a future visit, having learned that this venue offers special promotions on Mondays and Tuesdays, featuring wine and bruschetta at advantageous prices.

"During our Saturday excursion, my spouse and I were in pursuit of a novel and captivating venue for luncheon, as per our custom. Upon espying Hiromaru Fusion Ramen, my companion exclaimed, 'That's the one!' The eatery's unpretentious yet vibrant embellishments provided a visual respite from the more somber ambiance characterizing some ramen establishments I have had the pleasure of visiting. Our server was prompt in delivering our beverages and offered an elucidation of certain menu items to my partner. I opted for the TATE-YAMA RAMEN, a veritable mountainous assemblage of vegetables, sprouts, and delectable noodles that did not disappoint. My better half selected the TONKOTSU CURRY TSUKEMEN, whose appearance and aroma evoked great anticipation. Both dishes were meticulously arranged and presented, showcasing the culinary prowess of the chef. Although we solely indulged in ramen options during our visit, we took note of various intriguing offerings being enjoyed by our fellow patrons. We eagerly look forward to returning and exploring additional menu selections. Hiromaru Fusion Ramen unquestionably merits high praise and recommendation for a satisfying repast with a touch of originality."

"It is unequivocally evident that the poultry delicacy I had the pleasure of consuming was of exceptional quality, surpassing my admittedly limited culinary experience and expertise in the realm of fried chicken. Indeed, the succulent morsels boasted a satisfying crunchiness, while simultaneously showcasing an impressive juiciness that complemented their rich, savory flavor profile. In conclusion, I unhesitatingly proclaim that the fried chicken in question was nothing short of extraordinary, constituting a veritable gastronomic masterpiece."

"It's time to whip out the trusty American Express card, my friend! If you're in search of a charming, centrally located boutique that offers an array of distinctive gifts and products, look no further than Paper Skyscraper. Conveniently situated near the heart of Charlotte, this delightful shop is an excellent destination for those seeking unique items for their loved ones, colleagues, or perhaps even themselves. Of course, it goes without saying that the store's wares are particularly well-suited for the discerning tastes of your LGBTQ+ acquaintances. However, do not let that deter you from exploring its diverse selection; after all, variety is the spice of life! On a recent visit, I found myself in a bit of a pickle while attempting to procure a suitable gift for my mother's birthday. Thankfully, Boulevard came to the rescue with their assortment of quirky yet endearing ceramic bird candles, birdhouses, and grapeseed beauty product gift baskets. Not to mention, they boast an impressive collection of stylish, wallet-friendly jewelry that makes for either a thoughtful surprise for a friend or a well-deserved indulgence for oneself (Greenmarketgirl's eco-cuffs, anyone?). Additionally, the store features an array of handcrafted items that are not only exclusive to Boulevard but also reasonably priced and supported by exceptional customer service. So, be sure to drop by and explore their constantly evolving inventory â?who knows what hidden treasures you might discover?"

O.k., o.k. We had to stop in and try this place just to see what all the hype was about and if any of it was true. Can you say OMG!!!!!!!!!!!!! This place is the real deal and I can't say that I, nor my taste buds, have ever had a sandwich as good as these are. Yes, we have been back and it is just as good and we will be back again and again as long as our stomachs don't explode from the massive amount of food you get on the plates they serve you. Hot dog they call them here but they are the largest hot dogs I have ever seen and cooked to a plump juicy temp with an awesome bun. The burger is a 1/2 pound which we ordered well done and yet it came out so juicy and full of flavor. The cook has his stuff together here. I might just have to forgo the diet and head back over there tonight.  ;-)
We just randomly stopped for breakfast here.  It was really delicious! Julie was our server and she was really perfect.

One of my all-time preferred culinary establishments, definitive evidence that value does not necessarily entail compromise. Ideal for luncheon, dinnertime, takeout, and catering services, I have availed myself of their offerings on multiple occasions. My gastronomical inclinations tend towards the conventional menu, which provides an intriguing blend of flavors and textures without being overly daunting. Particularly noteworthy are their soups, which possess an uncanny ability to warm one's inner being. Their Pad Thai offerings are similarly impressive, copiously furnished with succulent cuts of meat. Upon ordering catering services for a sizable gathering, I was pleasantly surprised by the exceedingly reasonable pricing and the convenience afforded by their delivery options. An excellent venue for social engagements, the ambiance is enhanced by a well-curated selection of libations and a happy hour menu. For those who prefer beverages of a sweeter persuasion, I would enthusiastically endorse their Thai iced tea. However, it is worth noting that certain patrons may find the spiciness of their dishes to be somewhat formidable; thus, it is advisable to specify a milder preparation method, lest one encounter discomfort. In conclusion, I cannot recommend this establishment highly enough, save for the caveat pertaining to fiery culinary creations.

"The Buffet at Wynn offers an unparalleled dining experience, with a vast array of delectable options that cater to diverse palates. The ambiance is sophisticated yet welcoming, creating an ideal setting for a leisurely meal. My recent visit on Labor Day weekend proved particularly memorable, as the restaurant had raised the price to $37.95 per person, inclusive of tax. However, the quality and quantity of the cuisine rendered the additional cost inconsequential. In fact, I would not hesitate to pay double the amount for such a sumptuous spread. 

The culinary highlights included tender lamb chops, expertly prepared and flavorful; succulent king crab legs, a seafood lover's dream; and prime rib, cooked to perfection, with a delightful pink hue and juicy texture. The abundance of premium meats made it challenging to explore the entire menu, but the variety of dishes ensured that every craving was satisfied.

While the wait time of one hour and 15 minutes was somewhat lengthy, it was understandable given the popularity of the establishment and the peak dinner hours. Nevertheless, the exceptional service and attentive staff mitigated any frustration, making the delay seem negligible.

My usual aversion to sweets was temporarily forgotten, as the assortment of decadent desserts beckoned me to indulge. The rich flavors and artistic presentations made each sweet treat a masterpiece, further enhancing the overall dining experience.

In conclusion, The Buffet at Wynn is an unequivocal recommendation for those seeking a superior buffet experience. Its unwavering commitment to excellence in food quality, presentation, and customer satisfaction makes it an unforgettable indulgence."

"I have an immense fondness for this establishment; it is truly a concealed treasure in the midst of downtown Phoenix. My significant other and I make it a point to visit at least once a week, as it offers an ambiance that is simultaneously hip and enjoyable. The culinary offerings are exceptional, with the Cash Money being my perpetual preference. The dressing they utilize on their greens is utterly divine, and the staff exhibits a level of cordiality that is unparalleled. This venue possesses an idyllic atmosphere for a romantic escapade, as the setting transforms into a softly illuminated haven once the sun has descended below the horizon. Moreover, the classic hip hop melodies they play serve to enhance the overall experience. I wholeheartedly endorse this location to anyone who seeks a unique dining adventure." They will be closed for a period of ten days for vacationary purposes, and I already find myself eagerly anticipating their reopening.

"The proffering of duck fat fried French fries at the onset of our dining experience served as an initial indicator of the culinary excellence that was to follow, and it became patently evident that we were in an establishment of considerable gastronomical merit. Although we did sample a few selections from the primary menu, the Rib cap proved to be the piÃ¨ce de rÃ©sistance of our repast, surpassing all else in terms of sheer gustatory satisfaction."

"In N Out Burger unequivocally reigns supreme as the optimal fast food establishment I have had the pleasure of dining at, with their culinary offerings showcasing an unparalleled taste that is unmatched by the vast majority of mass fast food chains. The burgers and fries, in particular, are tantamount to gastronomic masterpieces, boasting an irresistible flavor profile that has captivated my palate. I must admit, however, that the sheer influx of patrons at this particular location during my visit proved to be somewhat of an encumbrance, as the throngs of people gathered within the confines of the restaurant made it challenging to secure a table. Moreover, the decidedly inclement weather conditions outdoors rendered the prospect of consuming my meal al fresco untenable, thus compelling me to partake of my repast within the comfort of my automobile, parked within the vicinity of the eatery. Notwithstanding these minor inconveniences, my dining experience at In N Out Burger remained an unequivocal success, solidifying its status as one of the preeminent burger joints across the United States. Now, if only they would consider expanding their operations to the Great Lakes region, thereby affording me the opportunity to indulge in their delectable fare on a more regular basis."

I go to Lifetime Fitness on my own, however, I found my weight loss goals on a plateau even though I was doing cardio twice a day!  

I've seen this place since it's close to some of my favorite restaurants; Nobuo at Teeter House, PIzzaria Bianco, etc...  

I read about them online and I saw that many people had only great things to say about them.  They were correct!

I've only been here three times total; once to sign-up and twice to workout.  The staff already knows me by my name!  They are incredibly helpful, friendly, and they genuinely care.  I've had personal trainers before but they don't compare to the staff here!  

They have  free class at 9 AM on Saturdays if you want to check it out at no risk to you.  You have nothing to lose!  Come check them out!  I've already recommended them to so many people I think this Saturday morning may be packed!

We were staying on the Las Vegas strip and were looking for a good sushi place tha t was a good value.  Yelp reviews led us to Sushi House Goyemon that is a few miles away.  We went for the AYCE and it was excellent.  Everything we tried was excellent.  A few of the YELP reviews suggested the pig bellies or something like that, and that was the only item we chose that was one I'd pass up next time. Nice people and great service.

The modified text is: Disillusioned by the unanticipated dearth of a chilly ambiance and the absence of a designated table, we opted to vacate the premises after a brief tenure, however, our departure was forestalled by the hospitable manager, Bill, who employed his powers of persuasion to induce us to remain and lavished upon us an unwavering commitment to ensuring our satisfaction; ultimately, we were gratified that we had elected to prolong our visit. This culinary establishment proved to be the apogee of our gastronomical excursions in Las Vegas, with its delectable Pretzel bread serving as a harbinger of the delectable fare that was to follow. A stimulating elixir of ginger and rum, artfully concocted to awaken the palate, preceded the meticulous preparation of both the Gypsy and Martini, which showcased the chef's fastidious attention to detail. A delightful amuse-bouche of creamed eggplant salad, presented on a dainty lily-shaped plate, served as a tantalizing prelude to the piÃ¨ce de rÃ©sistance that was the Cioppino, with its judicious blend of flavors and textures, including the velvety smoothness of seared scallops and the unctuous richness of pork belly, all of which were arrayed on a bed of golden toasted bread. Furthermore, a refreshing dessert duo, consisting of a rum-pineapple-coconut upside-down cake and a chocolate truffle, both complemented by an expertly curated selection of champagne and tawny port, served as a felicitous conclusion to this epicurean odyssey. Throughout the meal, numerous additional flourishes and considerations were proffered to enhance our sense of exclusivity and indulgence.

She commenced her culinary escapade by partaking in a delectable serving of She Crab Soup, which proved to be an exceptional choice, prompting her to ponder whether a larger quantity would have been more suitable. Subsequently, she sampled the fish tacos, which were a resounding success, thereby solidifying her resolve to return for future dining experiences.

Best steakhouse in Vegas. My wife and I come here almost everytime we are in Vegas and it is always amazing. We have tried all of the other top steakhouses on the strip but this place is much better with out the over doneness of the casinos and they dont rip you off. \nSteaks are always cook perfectly and their sides are great.

I personally entered the establishment, stepping into a scene resembling utter pandemonium, as it happened to be the precise day on which Ashleys was generously offering credits up to a maximum of $2,000; despite numerous patrons expressing their discontent with having endured prolonged wait times surpassing five hours, my own experience involved a brief two-hour delay. Upon being warmly welcomed in a remarkably hospitable manner, I received thorough assistance during my maiden voyage in acquiring furniture through this unconventional means. Every single staff member, including the manager who helped me, displayed extraordinary friendliness. Absolutely no grievances exist, and I shall unquestionably revisit this location for prospective purchases in the future.

"Sake of unparalleled freshness. Gastronomical mastery manifest in rolls of consummate craftsmanship. A veritable cornucopia of options, ranging from a demure half-roll to an indulgent full-roll, each one a paragon of gustatory delight. Lychee sake of uncommon potency and flavor, a true apogee of mixological prowess. Efficiency of service that belies the torpid pace of its culinary counterparts, transcending the mundane through sheer virtuosity."

I customarily refrain from evaluating theatrical establishments; however, I feel compelled to extol the virtues of a remarkable individual (Aries) who serves as a manager at a particular cinema. His exceptional demeanor and benevolent actions have inspired me to express my gratitude during this festive season. My spouse, offspring, and I embarked upon a journey from California to visit acquaintances and relatives for Thanksgiving, and we were eager to view the cinematic production entitled "Frozen" on the eve of the holiday (Wednesday). In the midst of our excursion, I contacted the AMC Theatre by telephone and engaged in a conversation with a courteous female representative, inquiring about the possibility of obtaining tickets at the promotional price of $5, which was previously offered on Mondays through Thursdays. She confirmed the existence of this offer, albeit with the exclusion of holidays. Subsequently, I posed a query regarding the classification of the present day as a holiday, given its proximity to Thanksgiving. She responded by stating that it would not be considered a holiday, thus the tickets would still be available at the discounted rate. I was overjoyed at the prospect of experiencing a delightful cinematic experience at an affordable cost. However, upon arriving at the theatre to procure the tickets, the young male attendant informed me that the total cost for the three of us would be $29.90, a sum that far surpassed my expectations. I brought to his attention the conversation I had with the woman on the phone earlier that day, mentioning the $5 special. He recommended that I consult with his manager, Aries. Upon the manager's arrival, he promptly offered his apologies to us and presented us with the tickets gratis. My spouse and I were taken aback, utterly unprepared for such a generous gesture. I felt an overwhelming desire to express my appreciation to Aries, whose actions left an indelible mark on our family's evening out, transforming it into an unforgettable memory.

A well kept secret! If you are looking for wine treats, you have to check this out. It is like a little wine store located right inside the department store. They do tastings and classes and have a special room for the fine stuff.. I have only just peeked through the glass, but YUM!

Everything but the Kal-bi was delicious, but then again it is a tofu house.  It would give any garden grove area tofu restaurants a run for their money.  Kal-bi was good, just needed to be seasoned more.  Bim bim bop was very good; fresh ingredients.  Banchan was fresh and tasty also.  Great Korean place in Vegas!

Great hole in the wall chicken wing joint. Large variety of flavors - will need many more visits before I've tried a majority of them. An OK beer selection, and flat screens abound for watching sports.

"An exceptional venue for commemorating a milestone anniversary, this establishment offers a truly remarkable experience, characterized by exemplary service and an ambiance that exudes warmth and sophistication. Upon entering, we were immediately struck by the welcoming demeanor of the staff, who demonstrated a genuine commitment to ensuring our comfort and satisfaction throughout the evening. The culinary offerings were equally impressive, with the Fried Calamari being a particular highlight, its tender texture and flavorful spicy sauce eliciting praise from both myself and my spouse. Our main courses, the Fillet and Butterfish respectively, were likewise superb, boasting generous portions and expert preparation. Furthermore, the Hawaiian martinis we sampled were truly delightful, their unique blend of tropical flavors and refreshing effervescence making them an ideal accompaniment to the meal. Based on our thoroughly enjoyable dining experience, we would unhesitatingly endorse this restaurant to anyone seeking a refined yet convivial setting in which to celebrate a special occasion."

"Elated that this culinary establishment has inaugurated its operations in such proximity to our domicile, we are eager to partake in their gastronomical offerings, particularly the delectable yellow curry, which boasts an adaptable spice intensity ranging from a mild 1 to a formidable 10, complemented by the flavorsome garlic chicken, its succulent texture further enhanced by a generous sprinkling of crunchy garlic on top; however, we do lament the absence of al fresco seating, a feature we believe would greatly enhance the overall dining experience; nonetheless, we shall unquestionably return to indulge in their culinary delights."

"A genuinely authentic Chinese experience, reminiscent of a Panda Express, awaits patrons upon entering this establishment. The interior presents a stark contrast to the exterior, boasting a plethora of Chinese waitstaff diligently attending to their duties. An aquarium housing various species of fish serves as a focal point, captivating the attention of diners, much like the ubiquitous 'fish-tank' cliche. Upon being seated in close proximity to the aquatic display, I felt compelled to sample the culinary delights available. Opting for a fried variety, I requested the dish be prepared with a black bean and spicy garlic sauce, thereby teaching the fish a lesson in reciprocity, so to speak. However, it is worth noting that the menu offers an array of traditional Chinese cuisine, accessible to those familiar with the culture's gastronomic customs. To fully appreciate the breadth of options, it is advisable to acquaint oneself with the lesser-known,'secret menu' items, showcasing the richness and diversity of Chinese culinary traditions. In conclusion, this eatery truly embodies the essence of an exceptional Chinese dining experience."

"Indubitably, one of the premier establishments in Las Vegas, offering an unparalleled culinary experience, this esteemed eatery has secured a coveted position among the city's gastronomic elite. My personal preference is to partake in the delectable offerings of their dinner menu, allowing me to tailor my meal to my exacting specifications. The garlic naan, an absolute must-try, is sublimely complemented by a tangy dollop of plain yogurt, serving as a refreshing contrast to the rich, velvety texture of the naan itself. Among the main courses, the lamb korma and chicken tiki masala are exemplary showcases of the chef's artistry, with each dish boasting a complexity of spices that titillate the palate and satiate even the most discerning of appetites. A word of caution, however, as the chicken tikka, though undoubtedly succulent, may pale in comparison to the aforementioned dishes, owing to its relatively straightforward preparation. Nonetheless, the okra vegetable dish is a veritable cornucopia of flavors, bursting with an array of tantalizing spices that leave an indelible mark on the taste buds. While some may lament the tempo of the service, the quality of the cuisine more than compensates for any perceived lag, making it an inconsequential trade-off for an experience of such caliber. To cap off the meal, a steaming cup of chai tea serves as the perfect digestif, its warming, comforting properties providing a suitably satisfying conclusion to a truly exceptional dining adventure."

"This venue is utterly remarkable, boasting meticulously curated beverages that exude an unparalleled aroma and flavor profile. Their innovative concoctions incorporate a judicious blend of spirited essences, expertly infused with an array of succulent fruits, resulting in a truly sublime and invigorating experience for the palate. I opted for a customized rendition of their signature'smash' variant, featuring a harmonious fusion of strawberries, lemon, and vodka, complemented by a subtle hint of triple sec's sweetness, thereby creating a refreshing and delectable potion that showcased the bartender's extraordinary proficiency."

"I thoroughly enjoy the extensive array of culinary selections offered at this establishment, in contrast to the more limited offerings of Hot N Juicy. Moreover, I find the distinctive Cajun sauce served here to be particularly delectable and flavorful, imbuing each dish with a singular essence that sets it apart from others. Furthermore, the staff's exceptional dedication to ensuring a pleasurable dining experience for patrons is truly commendable, as they consistently display an energetic, cheerful, and respectful demeanor that greatly enhances the overall ambiance of the restaurant."

Last evening, I had the pleasure of hosting an impromptu Monday Night Football gathering at my humble abode. During the course of the festivities, I engaged in a cordial conversation with a remarkably courteous and deferential staff member by the name of Danny. Through him, I successfully placed my order, emphasizing the imperative nature of its accuracy. Danny, without a moment's hesitation, graciously assured me that my expectations would be meticulously upheld. Upon the timely arrival of my culinary selections, I conducted a thorough examination of each item, and to my immense satisfaction, the pizza and chicken wings were cooked to perfection, precisely adhering to my specifications. The wings, in particular, boasted an ideal seasoning ratio, complemented by an application of wing sauce that struck an impeccable balance between flavor and restraint. My guests and I both shared an unwavering enthusiasm for the culinary offerings, with the wings emerging as an undisputed highlight of the evening's gastronomic experience. My sincere gratitude extends to Danny for his fastidious attention to detail, exceptional customer service, and, of course, the delectable victuals themselves. It is with utmost confidence that I predict a steady stream of future patronage, not only from myself but also from my social circle, to this establishment. Kudos are certainly in order for HH, whose commitment to excellence has earned them an esteemed reputation.

Belly up to the bar in the midst of the eatery for the premier people and sports observing seats in the house, boasting an abundance of televisions ensuring that not a single moment of your preferred games will be missed, regardless of whether you're supporting multiple teams simultaneously. Take advantage of the pool tables for entertainment during halftime, and revel in the privacy of the secluded backroom, the site of my own overindulgence at a corporate gathering. DJs spin the latest tracks during commercial breaks of particularly significant contests, while Fox Sports broadcasts live from within the bar itself on occasion. Prices align with the Scottsdale standard, while the cuisine rivals that of high-end bars. Ensure that you have properly groomed yourself and donned your finest jersey, as the patronage of Fox Sports Grill boasts an impressive array of attractive sports enthusiasts, and you may find yourself rooting for the same team.

I had the privilege of residing in Tucson for a remarkable sixteen years, reluctantly departing with my three children, newly acquired husband, and two stepchildren in 2002, seeking new horizons in New York. Although New York boasts numerous admirable qualities, it regretfully falls short in offering genuine, authentic Mexican cuisine. My family is not easily deceived in this regard. Thus, when I return to Arizona to visit my loved ones, I crave nothing more than savoring the rich flavors of authentic Mexican food. As my parents and sister reside in Apache Junction, we satisfy our cravings at Los Tacos. The establishment maintains meticulous cleanliness, and the staff exudes warmth and kindness, engaging us with courteous service. While language barriers exist, their proficiency in English does not hinder our interactions. The culinary delights are prepared fresh to order, complemented by homemade tortillas. A salsa bar, abundant with an assortment of delectable condiments, including salsa fresca, roasted hot peppers, spiced carrots, salsa verde, and a delightful chipotle salsa, enhances our dining experience. Uncertain about their coffee offerings, I graciously accept their tolerance of my bringing my morning Starbucks Vente, as my son, who joined me on this trip, enthusiastically partakes in a brisk two-mile walk each morning to acquire our daily caffeine fix, followed by a brief stroll to Los Tacos. This delightful routine epitomizes an idyllic start to the day. I wholeheartedly endorse Los Tacos, unhesitatingly recommending them to anyone seeking an exceptional dining experience. Undoubtedly, the four-mile trek each morning proves well worth the effort.

This particular establishment exudes an undeniable charm and appeal, boasting a pristine ambiance that is complemented by the warm and welcoming demeanor of the proprietress, whose cordiality extends to the reasonable tariffs charged for the culinary delights served here, all of which combine to create a veritable gastronomic haven that is sure to delight even the most discerning palate.

I had a remarkably pleasant and thoroughly enjoyable experience at this establishment, characterized by the exceptional proficiency and exemplary demeanor of the massage therapist, who exhibited a consummate level of expertise in their craft, inducing a state of deep relaxation that precipitated a brief period of soporific indulgence on my part, ultimately resulting in a sensation of vastly improved well-being and revitalization upon conclusion of the therapeutic session, thereby rendering me fervently inclined to endorse and recommend this particular venue without reservation or hesitation.

Vogue Bistro offers an exceptional French culinary experience, catering to both intimate gatherings and larger groups with equal proficiency, as evidenced by my multiple visits in various settings. Their extensive beverage list, featuring an array of expertly crafted cocktails and martinis, harmoniously complements a menu boasting an impressive diversity of delectable options. My personal preferences include the savory meatloaf, tender steaks, and any of the innovative chef specialties, all of which have consistently impressed my palate. In conclusion, this establishment guarantees satisfaction, rendering it a failsafe choice for any dining occasion.

We indulged in an opulent sojourn at the illustrious Wynn resort last week, whereupon we partook of two delectable meals on separate occasions, specifically a luncheon and a breakfast. Our culinary excursion transpired thusly: a savory Chinese Chicken Salad accompanied by an refreshing glass of Iced Tea, followed by a trio of Vegan Sliders that elicited unbridled enthusiasm from my spouse. Our gastronomical odyssey continued with a leisurely breakfast, featuring a sublime Peach Bellini, a delectable Main Lobster Benedict replete with an abundance of succulent lobster morsels, and a flavorful Garden Vegetable Omelet that garnered unwavering acclaim from my significant other. Furthermore, we sampled their expertly brewed coffee and freshly squeezed orange juice, both of which proved to be of exceptional quality. The hospitable staff and scrumptious fare contributed to an unforgettable dining experience, which unfolded amidst the elegant ambiance of the restaurant's interior during lunch, and later, beneath the sun-kissed sky and tranquil surroundings of the poolside terrace, courtesy of a fortuitously secured reservation. Of particular interest to vegan patrons is the fact that Steve Wynn, the resort's eponymous proprietor, has embraced a plant-based lifestyle, resulting in the integration of a dedicated vegan menu across his esteemed establishments, showcasing an impressive array of mouthwatering options that we had the pleasure of sampling. Our anticipation for a future visit remains palpable, as we eagerly look forward to relishing the resort's culinary excellence once again.

This novel advancement, in my opinion, constitutes a triumph! There is an abundance of individuals converging and expending their financial resources within what was previously a parking area. A diverse array of establishments, ranging from casual eateries to specialty stores, can be found, ensuring that you will undoubtedly encounter something that piques your interest. I have a particular fondness for the layout, designs of the shops, and the lavish attraction that boasts the distinction of being the tallest Ferris wheel on the western coast. I am eager to revisit this location, whether it is for the purpose of dining, observing the populace, or engaging in recreational activities. If the primary objective was to retain individuals and restrict their spending to solely Caesars properties, then I believe it has been accomplished successfully. Accolades are extended to the architects, developers, and any additional individuals involved in the brainstorming process. Individuals are able to effortlessly transition between the Linq Hotel and Casino, the Flamingo, Harrah's, and other nearby establishments, thereby maintaining their financial expenditures within this specific region of the strip. Impressive forethought indeed!

I have not had the pleasure of visiting the Linq frequently enough to fully appreciate its diverse array of intriguing venues, including the charming Blvd. Cocktail, whereupon I rendezvoused with an acquaintance on a tranquil Tuesday evening and was impressed by the sluggish pace of the establishment, which allowed me to engage in a leisurely conversation with the affable and hospitable bartender, Mike, who, despite the absence of ginger beer, skillfully concocted an Irish Mule that surpassed its customary counterpart by employing a resourceful blend of genuine ginger, ginger ale, and other unspecified elements; furthermore, the ambiance was enhanced by the presence of a talented pianist who solicited our musical preferences and demonstrated his proficiency in performing an eclectic repertoire of tunes by various artists, including JT, Foo Fighters, Kanye West, et al., within the intimate, speakeasy-inspired setting of the bar, where the mixologists displayed their expertise in creating innovative cocktails, and additionally, the venue featured a picturesque patio situated directly on the promenade, thus ensuring my future patronage.

I perform the vast majority, specifically ninety-seven percent, of my familial unit's purchasing activities at this particular retail establishment, and I must say that I hold a particularly strong affection for the on-site bakery that this location boasts. While it is true that the quality of some of their pre-prepared culinary offerings can be somewhat variable, much like those found at any other retailer, I have discovered that their Indian-inspired options are surprisingly palatable for a quick and convenient meal on-the-go. Furthermore, the meat and cheese selections available at this store consistently impress me with their exceptional quality, and the staff members who work at this location are unfailingly cordial and accommodating in their interactions with myself and other patrons.

"BurGR is utterly remarkable, boasting the most delectable burgers I have had the pleasure of consuming! The exceptional quality of the staff's service rivals that of Ramsey steak, undoubtedly setting a new standard for culinary excellence. Upon ordering the Farm Burger, my taste buds were treated to an unforgettable experience, while my wife's Hells Kitchen burger proved to be equally impressive. Furthermore, the humble basket of 'Just Fries' was elevated to new heights by the inclusion of two distinct ketchups - a spicy chipotle variety and a fragrant curry option. Without question, we shall return to this gastronomic haven before our departure from Las Vegas."

"My spouse is thoroughly captivated by this culinary establishment! Despite its unassuming exterior, it offers an exceptional dining experience! My partner opted for the full rack of slow-cooked pork ribs, while I selected the pulled pork sandwich. Both dishes were utterly satisfying, with the latter showcasing tender, juicy meat that literally fell off the bone. However, my personal fixation with this eatery revolves around their delectable cornbread, boasting an irresistible sweetness akin to a decadent pastry. In conclusion, this local gem is undoubtedly worth a visit if you're seeking an authentic, flavorful dining adventure."

Ive been going here for 2 years now and just cannot get my nails done anywhere else.. The quality and selection of nail gels is incomparable to any nail salon I have ever been to.  The only downside about this place is that you must make an appointment and have to make it a couple weeks in advance to get a time that is suitable for you. I personally have been going to Lil Kim there... She always takes her time, pays attention to detail, and does excellent work.. Like I said before I could never go anywhere else regardless of the price or location... They are that good!

I absolutely love POLISHED! I live about 15 miles away and I pass hundreds of nail salons and I would never go anywhere but here. The color selection is like no other. I have never seen so many. It is always busy in here but I have never had to wait to get serviced. Tina does my nails and she makes them look perfect each time. The receptionists Arielle and Brianna make everything go smoothly and they always greet you by name. Whenever I have people in town I always take them to Polished! I love it here!
Ate here with a group.  Everyone enjoyed their meal.  Can wait to return to Vegas to eat their again.  I had the brisket dog, so yummy!

Nostrovia martini, an exceptional beverage befitting the warm season, and Starry night martini, reminiscent of the renowned Van Gogh artwork, both possess an unparalleled level of excellence!!! The ambiance created by the ICE bar (a literal embodiment of its name) and the overall adornment within the establishment evoke a sense of Russian culture, thereby fostering an atmosphere that arouses my affection for vodka.

Both my canines frequent this establishment...One of my dogs that visits this venue is a cavalier King Charles spaniel, which can be arduous to maintain due to its coat requiring regular grooming, however, upon completion of the process, the animal appears content, revitalized, and utterly adorable (a characteristic it perpetually possesses). My second canine companion, a Lhasa apso-poodle hybrid, has also availed itself of the services offered by this enterprise; despite being a juvenile specimen, it has demonstrated apprehension during past visits, yet the staff's proficiency in their duties has ensured the animal's comfort and wellbeing, facilitating a stress-free experience for both the pet and its owner.

Wow - I was totally impressed with Chris and his crew. We got in everywhere we wanted to go - communication was easy and fast. My cousin and I had a GREAT time at the Palms and Foundation Room. I'm sure I'll make my way back to Sin City and will definitely hit up Chris and his team before I go. Thanks guys!!!!!

"Oh my goodness, this location was utterly breathtaking! It resembled an adult version of Raging Waters or Candy Land, which was fascinating. I felt an overwhelming desire to engage with the various water features they had, such as this stripper pole that showered water on the individuals beneath it. Additionally, there was this small overflowing pool with transparent sides, which seemed to be reserved for VIP patrons. It was the epitome of perfection on a Sunday afternoon; the sky was a brilliant blue, the temperature was around 90 degrees in August, and there was ample space both inside and outside the pool to relax. Furthermore, there were plenty of shaded areas, conveniently located and well-maintained restrooms, and an abundance of stunning individuals everywhere. I am thoroughly disappointed that I failed to acquire a new swimsuit for this occasion and don appropriate heels."

"Remarkable discovery! I had the privilege of encountering her recently, and I must say, it was an absolute delight! As a recent transplant to Arizona, I was understandably apprehensive about locating a qualified professional to administer a Brazilian wax, but upon meeting her, all my anxieties dissipated. She possesses an unparalleled mastery of her craft, and with over 12 years of waxing experience under my belt, I can unequivocally attest that she is truly exceptional! My skin is particularly sensitive, and I have often experienced lingering discomfort or sensitivity following waxing sessions elsewhere, but astonishingly, I departed her establishment sans any residual effects. Her technique was expeditious, proficient, and her expertise was evident throughout the entire process. Additionally, I opted to indulge in a facial, courtesy of her Yelp deal, and I must say, she demonstrated the same level of virtuosity in that domain as well. It is unnecessary for me to continue searching; I have found my go-to esthetician! Pertinent to mention, my GPS navigational system led me astray, directing me towards a field, so should your device yield similar results, simply retrace your steps, and you will find her shop situated conveniently within a strip mall on the left."

Brueggers, a local establishment renowned for its delectable morning pastries and confectionaries, was my preferred destination in the Washington D.C. metropolitan area for satisfying my cravings for a delicious breakfast treat or an indulgent mid-afternoon snack. Upon encountering this eatery at the Biltmore location, I couldn't help but exhibit manifestations of euphoria through a series of spontaneous bodily movements, as the culinary offerings at this particular venue were on par with those of the E Street branch, and the assortment of lunchtime sandwiches available was impressive, obviating the need to traverse the street to access other dining establishments. Additionally, I have recently had the pleasure of discovering that their tea selection is equally as delightful.

A time-honored watering hole that exudes a convivial ambiance, this establishment boasts an impressive array of delectable pub grub, with their mouthwatering chicken wings being a particular highlight. The attentive and friendly service staff further enhances the overall dining experience, although it is imperative to recognize that the culinary offerings are tailored towards satisfying the cravings of patrons seeking casual sustenance, rather than catering to those seeking haute cuisine. This venue serves as an ideal gathering place for socializing with acquaintances while engaging in recreational activities such as billiards or shuffleboard, all the while taking advantage of reasonably priced drinks during the extended happy hour period.

I have had the privilege of residing at this esteemed establishment for a duration of one year and six months, and I must say that I am utterly dumbfounded by the presence of any evaluations that fall short of exceptional, particularly those that proffer outlandish allegations. For the sake of this assessment, I shall concentrate on my experiences subsequent to my tenancy. The complex, as others have aptly pointed out, boasts an impressive array of amenities, including well-manicured lawns, multiple aquatic facilities, and a prime location. However, it is the staff that has truly left an indelible mark on my tenure here, and it is they who compelled me to leave a glowing endorsement. As a peripatetic renter, I have had the occasion to engage with a diverse array of property management teams, and I must say that the personnel at The Dakota are unparalleled in their dedication to excellence and unwavering commitment to customer satisfaction. I have relied heavily upon their expertise and, at times, have been rather exacting in my demands. Nevertheless, they have consistently risen to the challenge, displaying an unwavering sense of urgency and handling each request with aplomb and a warm demeanor. If you are currently seeking a new abode and wish to gain a deeper understanding of the property beyond the glossy brochures and polished websites, then I would strongly encourage you to place your trust in the capable hands of the team at The Dakota. Cheers!

"Upon perusing the plethora of favorable reviews on Yelp, we opted to visit Pizzeria Bianco, and we were not disillusioned. As an ardent devotee of thin crust pizzas, I can unequivocally assert that this establishment ranks among the finest. 

The eatery itself is somewhat diminutive in size, yet I was enamored by the ambiance and the captivating brick faÃ§ade of the building. Initially, we were hesitant to dine here due to concerns about an interminable and frivolous wait time; however, our trepidations were ultimately assuaged. Following the lunchtime surge at approximately 2 pm, we were seated within a span of ten minutes, which was a welcome surprise. 

The hospitality we received was exceptional, and the pizza was nothing short of sublime. We savored each bite in rapt silence, as the flavors were that exquisite. I must confess that I am experiencing a strong desire to return to this establishment merely for the purpose of indulging in their delectable pizzas once more. Every aspect of the pizza was meticulously crafted, earning it a perfect score of 10/10. We sampled both the Margherita and Wiseguy pizzas, and the freshness of the toppings was complemented by the smoky, charred essence imparted by the wood-fired oven. While we would have liked to sample all of the signature pizzas, we were content with our choices. Although the pizzas may seem slightly pricey relative to their size, we felt that the quality justified the cost."

We relished our brief sojourn at this esteemed lodging establishment during our recent excursion to Scottsdale, whereupon we partook in a single nocturnal repose prior to our attendance at an athletic contest featuring the Eagles at the adjacent Cardinal stadium. The accommodations proved to be commodious and well-appointed, and we particularly appreciated the delectable morning meal and the hospitable demeanor of the personnel. Notwithstanding, a minor quibble regarding the coffee arose, as it lacked sufficient strength and bore a faint resemblance to contaminated H2O.

Don't let the outside fool you. Inside is an awesome decor and atmosphere. Much more elegant than other sushi restaurants. Food is great and awesome. Had the all you can eat- great value. Staff very friendly, and kind. Service was moderately quick. Go there in the early hours of meal time to get the best service times.\nWARNING- don't order too much of the rolls- they have huge servings.
The drive thru staff is always so sweet and friendly.  This place makes a for a great start to my day.  To me, this dunkin is beautiful.  Best coffee in all the land.

"The culinary creations presented by Chef Jonny are not only delectable but also visually stunning, transcending the conventional concept of food presentation into an art form. The aesthetic appeal of each dish is such that merely beholding them satiates one's gastronomic yearning. The chef's proficiency in crafting these edible masterpieces is truly remarkable, particularly evident in the diverse array of sashimi options. The cucumber wrap featuring halibut, spring leaves wrapped with marinated tuna, micro French fries (Angel hair) enveloping yellow tail, surf and turf (blue crab paired with thin sliced NY steak), Ono (king crab meat encased in super white tuna), and salmon sashimi immersed in Truffle oil, constitute a non-exhaustive list of recommendations. This establishment is an indispensable destination for aficionados of sushi, and my husband's decision to bring me here has kindled a desire within me to revisit this culinary haven."

"Upon entering the salon for the initial visit, I was cordially received by the attendant, who invited me to await the arrival of my assigned stylist. Subsequently, Vanessa, my appointed stylist, demonstrated exemplary punctuality by arriving promptly at the designated time. My desire for a trim entailing a refined appearance, specifically pertaining to my layered hairstyle, was satisfactorily fulfilled. Following the completion of my haircut, I inquired about the possibility of scheduling an unplanned appointment immediately subsequent to mine, as my mother was interested in obtaining a haircut, having previously had her hair colored at an alternative salon on the same day and possessing limited availability in her schedule. Fortunately, Vanessa was able to accommodate my mother's request, thereby enabling us both to exit the salon with magnificent, newly styled haircuts, accomplished without any significant delay. We extend our sincere gratitude to Canyon Falls and Vanessa for their exceptional hospitality."

"The allure of Barriques on Monroe has perpetually captivated me as an ideal venue for remote work, boasting an array of amenities that cater to my productivity and comfort. The convenient and complimentary parking, situated merely a stone's throw away, has consistently accommodated my vehicle, while the abundance of outlets has ensured that my devices remain fully charged throughout my stay. Furthermore, the robust wireless network has facilitated seamless connectivity, allowing me to execute tasks with efficiency. The inviting ambiance, complemented by the delectable offerings of their Mediterranean Plate, has fostered an environment conducive to focused work. Now, with the unveiling of their revamped space, I am utterly enamored. The meticulous attention to detail in its renovation has transformed the establishment into a haven of refined sophistication, replete with an elegant bar area that beckons patrons to indulge in a libation of choice. Moreover, the strategic rearrangement of furniture has alleviated the previous sense of crowding, creating an atmosphere that exudes both serenity and accessibility."

"It is my conjecture that the Old Children's Bookshelf caters to an audience of reminiscent adults rather than juveniles, owing to its secluded location on Canongate and its assortment of meticulously maintained copies of children's literature, picture books, short tales, and annuals dating back to the 1950s. The books are presented in an aesthetically pleasing manner, which evoked feelings of wistfulness within me upon beholding original editions of The Moomins, Peter Pan, and Where The Wild Things Are, transporting me back to my own childhood. In addition to an array of captivating prints and comic books suitable for youngsters, the store offers illustrated versions of timeless classics such as Alice in Wonderland and Wizard of Oz, which not only possess an enchanting quality but also provide a delightful reading experience."

One of the very best restaurants in Vegas. A true hidden gem!

Why go to Le Circ or Bouchon and pay overinflated prices for a fine French meal, when you can go to Pamplemousse for half the price and have a true French experience?

It doesn't look like much from the street, but walk inside and you will be instantly transported to Paris.

The food is unrivaled IMHO. I highly recommend the Fettucine ala George, a marvelously tasty appetizer as is the lobster bisque. They handle fish selections wonderfully and the tournedos are incredible!

Anytime we are in Vegas we always dine here, don't miss it, it's wonderful, and easily half the price of any other French restaurant in Vegas you might consider.
Randomly stopped by while in Charlotte and had the best curry / hummus I have ever tasted. I wish they could ship their food to sf so I could eat it all day!

I have been contemplating the removal of my tattoo for an extensive period, and I have finally arrived at a resolute decision to pursue this course of action! Ideally, I should have initiated this process at an earlier juncture, thereby allowing myself to be liberated from the burden of the tattoo and the associated removal process in a timely manner. Following a meticulous search and a thorough examination of various options, both online and offline, I opted to utilize GROUPON, a popular online platform that facilitates the procurement of goods and services at discounted prices. Through this medium, I was able to locate and select "Erased Laser Tattoo Removal," a reputable establishment that offers exceptional rates at a significantly reduced cost. My initial skepticism was quickly assuaged by the professional demeanor and expertise demonstrated by the staff, which served to alleviate any apprehensions I may have harbored. Moreover, I was afforded the opportunity to partake in a complimentary consultation, which enabled me to embark upon the treatment itself on the very same day! The estimated duration of the process is four sessions, with three remaining, and I am delighted to report that visible improvements are already manifesting themselves, particularly in the form of cleared-up areas, mere hours after the commencement of the treatment. It is important to note, however, that individual results may vary, as each tattoo is inherently unique and may respond differently to the removal process. Nonetheless, I wholeheartedly endorse this establishment, as the ambiance is not only welcoming but also scrupulously clean, engendering a sense of security and confidence in the efficacy of the treatment. Furthermore, I must confess that I was pleasantly surprised by the reasonable cost of the service, which far surpassed my initial expectations. In conclusion, I am exceedingly gratified that I chose to visit this facility, and I enthusiastically encourage others to follow suit and take advantage of the exceptional services offered by "Erased Laser Tattoo Removal."

"Upon utilizing the 'nearby' functionality incorporated within the Yelp application, we serendipitously stumbled upon this quaint eatery and opted to sample its offerings. The menu, albeit diminutive in stature, boasts an array of diverse options, while the prices, ranging from $4.50 to $4.75, are undoubtedly reasonable. Furthermore, the culinary quality of the dishes we ordered was indeed impressive. I opted for the vegetarian breakfast sandwich (#33), comprising two poached eggs, feta cheese, parmesan cheese, and fresh spinach, while my companion chose the Nutella, peanut butter, banana, almond sandwich. We both consumed our meals with great relish and haste. The proprietor, Carol, and the youthful register attendant exhibited amiability and congeniality towards us, with Carol taking the time to engage in conversation and learn the names of each patron who entered. An interesting aspect of Zookz is the presence of a miniature sink situated at the beverage counter, facilitating the disposal of excess ice and fluids, as well as the rinsing of plastic containers prior to their placement in the adjacent recycling receptacle. Additionally, the establishment offers punch cards, with the tenth sandwich being complimentary. We shall most certainly revisit this charming venue in the future."

"Indubitably, the preeminent all-you-can-eat sushi experience within the locality, offering an unparalleled confluence of superior service, culinary excellence, and aesthetically pleasing ambiance that is unrivaled in its class, making it a veritable gem for gastronomic aficionados seeking an unforgettable dining escapade."

Reliable, trustworthy auto shop! 
Took my Dodge Ram 1500 in for an evaluation, which was free. Another shop stated I need to have my rack & pinon replaced, radiator was leaking, thermostat was stuck open, and the  temp sensor was bad. Wanted to charge a lot to repair all items, $1500.00.
I always get second and third opinions and I'm glad I did.  Yelped auto shops in Goodyear, called and was able to get in the next day. Phil was the one that looked over my truck and was very honest. Said that he wouldn't recommend the rack & pinon replacement because the leak was dried up, no wet dirt. Plus most rack & pinon do leak at first. He also said that the sensor was not bad and that the thermostat was the issue and that I did need a radiator since it was leaking.
In all, the write up was very reasonable and I went ahead with the work. Had it back by the end of the day.
I will definitely be having this shop perform ALL maintenance on my vehicles!
Thanks so much for your honestly Litchfield Auto Repair

My rating is for the Afternoon Tea.

We made reservations for Wednesday at 3pm so it was nice and quiet. 
First we chose the teas. We had the Lavender, Jasmin and Oolong tea. Mild and aromatic.

Then we chose our tea sandwiches which were pretty good but the scones with the devonshire cream and lemon curd were so delicious!  yummm!!! (Definitely a must try!) They also served some sweet mini deserts which were very good. 

Overall Service was great and attentive and everything tasted great.

"Individuals who relish the consumption of culinary delights may find themselves experiencing an intense yearning for a specific dish, such as a burger.  Those who have recently initiated a weight management program may discover that their options for satisfying their cravings are restricted.  It is indeed fortunate that certain establishments, such as In-n-Out, offer menu items that align with the dietary requirements of these individuals.  Specifically, their six-point hamburger, consisting solely of lettuce, tomato, onion, and ketchup, can effectively satiate one's desire for a burger without compromising their adherence to their weight management plan.  It is worth noting that In-n-Out has garnered a loyal customer base over the years, and their offerings, while perhaps not the healthiest, are relatively innocuous compared to those of other fast food chains.  Additionally, for those who are devoted to their weight management journey, it is important to be aware that the fries served at In-n-Out carry a point value of nine.  While they may be tempting, it is essential to exercise restraint and reserve them for future visits.  It is also worth mentioning that In-n-Out's cheeseburgers are a popular choice among younger patrons, making them an excellent option for families with selective eaters.  Furthermore, their animal-style burgers and fries are a favorite among some individuals, although this author does not share the same enthusiasm for them."

"Upon arriving at the airport late last evening, I contacted the front desk and was informed that the shuttle service would be dispatched promptly to transport me to the hotel. Upon retrieving my luggage, I observed several elderly individuals boarding the shuttle, and I must commend the driver for his exemplary demeanor and respect towards them, which aligns with the level of care and consideration that I would expect for my own grandparents. The check-in process was expeditious and seamless, and I appreciated the presence of a security guard vigilantly monitoring the courtyard area. My accommodations were characterized by a spotless environment, modern furnishings, and a comfortable sleeping surface. Additionally, I had access to an array of complimentary premium television channels, including Showtime, among others. \n

Due to hunger, I opted to partake in a meal at the adjacent 24-hour Denny's establishment. While the culinary offerings were not extraordinary, I acknowledge the convenience of having access to a 24-hour food option, particularly for an individual hailing from New York. This morning, I was pleasantly surprised by the continental breakfast, which featured an assortment of fresh fruit, yogurt, three varieties of cereal, waffles, muffins, toast, milk, orange juice, and other amenities. Consequently, I did not need to subject myself to another meal at Denny's. Furthermore, the WiFi connectivity was exceptional. \n

Considering the cost and location, I am departing with an elevated sense of satisfaction. Kudos to the staff for their excellent efforts."

Love, love, love this place!  The food is amazing, the presentation is so artsy, great variety, the service is great!   Note to self, never book a show after the dinner here because 1.  Will be on time constrain so cant fully enjoy everything they have, 2. Will be too stuffed to run to the show once we are late by spending too much time nibbling n the deliciousness.

I have consistently maintained the notion that canines possess an omnivorous inclination towards devouring any and all edible matter within their proximity. However, my perspective underwent a paradigm shift upon rescuing my two-year old German Shepherd, Bear, who demonstrated a discerning palate and finicky eating habits that were both vexing and stress-inducing, particularly when encounters with curious passersby would culminate in impertinent remarks such as, "Is your mother providing sustenance for you?!" (a gratuitous display of concern, I assure you). Seeking assistance, I visited 4 Paws Holistic and was pleasantly surprised by the extensive array of options available for Bear's nutritional needs. Accompanied by Bear, I was afforded the opportunity to observe her preferences firsthand, sampling an assortment of cuisine and treats. The customer service team graciously guided me through various alternatives, ranging from raw fare to kibble and combinations thereof, with the ultimate goal of enticing Bear's appetite and promoting healthy weight gain. My experiences at 4 Paws Holistic have been uniformly satisfactory, thereby establishing it as my preferred destination for procuring Bear's dog food, treats, and bully sticks.

"It is utterly remarkable, to say the least. My spouse and I, in the company of several acquaintances, had the pleasure of partaking in a delectable brunch at this esteemed establishment on a recent Veterans Day weekend. Following an unfortunate dining experience at Gordon Ramsay Steak the previous day, we were eager to indulge in a superior culinary adventure, which this venue graciously provided. Notwithstanding the absence of ornamental elements, the meal itself proved to be comprehensive and satisfying, featuring an array of lavish options such as succulent lobster, regal king crab (a notable upgrade from the customary snow crab typically offered at similar establishments), tender lamb chops, freshwater eel of exceptional quality, and, of course, an abundance of champagne. The entirety of our group was thoroughly delighted by the exceptional service and culinary prowess displayed by the restaurant's staff, ensuring that we shall unquestionably return in the future."

I heart me some DD.
Being from the East Coast, living in CA, I miss my Dunkin Donuts like crazy, but LV made me happy by having a Dunkin Donuts for my coffee pleasure.

We went through the drive thru (a DD with a drive thru!), ordered a few donuts, and a couple of cups of coffee before our drive back to CA.

He got my iced coffee order wrong, but happily replaced it with what I wanted.  Donuts were eaten very quickly in the backseat, as I sipped my coffee most of the way back to CA.

"No complaints whatsoever. Embarked upon a weekend excursion to Las Vegas in the company of two acquaintances. One of them brought up this establishment, prompting us to give it a try. I opted for the chorizo hash, which boasted an impressive array of flavorsâspicy, savory, and delightful. Additionally, I sampled their bloody mary, which was nothing short of exceptional. One member of our party chose the chicken and waffles, which were not only delectable but also visually stunning. Our final companion selected the artichoke hash, the least filling of the three dishes, yet still brimming with flavor. It's worth noting that each plate arrived heaping with an ample portion of culinary delights. Without question, I shall return."

Okay, you've blown the majority of your money on gambling. You're not hungry and it's not club time yet. What are you going to do? 

Madame Tussaud's!

As opposed to other wax museums, this one doesn't take itself seriously. It doesn't even call itself a museum which makes sense, since the entire point of coming here is to take ridiculous pictures of yourself and your friends with wax statues of Johnny Depp and Elvis Presley. They even have props-like bunny ears to wear when you pose with Hugh Hefner.

"On my inaugural visit to this establishment, I was utterly delighted to discover that they offered an extensive array of exceptionally nutritious edibles and treats, all crafted from superior quality constituents. 
  
The staff members I encountered were not only cordial but also possessed comprehensive expertise regarding the products they offered, which greatly facilitated my shopping experience. Additionally, the site's accessibility was a significant advantage, as it enabled me to conveniently acquire the items I required without encountering any difficulties. Although it has been some time since my last visit, I have fond memories of interacting with Brittnea and Kelly during my previous visits, whose warmth and hospitality significantly enhanced my overall impression of this store. Notwithstanding, my spouse and I tend to frequent the Tatum and Shea location, where we have consistently enjoyed an equally satisfying shopping experience. For further details regarding our encounters with Choice Pet Market in the Phoenix region, I invite you to peruse our assessment of their Tatum and Shea store."

"They possess an extensive assortment of frozen delights at this establishment, encompassing ice cream, sorbet, gelato, and an array of other delectable flavors. My personal preference for Cold Stone's signature cake batter flavor is readily available, and I must say that the cost and quality of service provided by this business are vastly superior to those offered by their competitors."

Beat the heat and head to Jump 'n' Jungle. Feeling stir crazy and want to release some pent up energy, go to Jump 'n' Jungle. On your way home from school and you want to interact with your friends and children, meet up at Jump 'n' Jungle. Two for Tuesdays are a budget friendly activity.\nNote: Pack clean socks for children and adults. Shoe-free environment and socks are required for everyone.

Old school in the best sense of the word!  Superior quality, great service, friendly team. Cash only means cost stays low.  My car hasn't been that clean in a long time ;). And I wasn't expecting them to detail it.  Great to know there are still businesses like this around!

"We had an exceptional experience last night at The Painters Lounge, which was thoroughly enjoyed by three couples who had been intrigued by the venue's unique concept of combining painting and wine-tasting classes on Fridays. Our expectations were not only met but exceeded by the warm hospitality extended by Dina and her assistant, whose attentive service ensured that our beverages were constantly replenished throughout the evening. The artistic endeavors pursued within the class itself were likewise impressive, as each participant was able to create a remarkable work of art that they could take pride in, thanks to Dina's expert guidance and encouragement. Her dedication to fostering a convivial atmosphere was particularly noteworthy, as she went above and beyond to ensure that every individual felt welcome and engaged throughout the duration of the event. Needless to say, we are eagerly anticipating our return to The Painters Lounge for another enjoyable and creative Friday night painting session."

"Manna CafÃ© serves as an exemplary eatery on Madison's North Side, boasting ample space, captivating dÃ©cor, and a warm, welcoming ambiance fostered by its family-operated nature and cordial staff. Patrons can indulge in delectable pastries, savor exceptional bread and rolls, and delight in the breakfast and lunch offerings, which showcase an impressive array of vegetarian options, conveniently denoted for those with dietary restrictions. The Earthly Delights sandwich is a personal favorite, eliciting wows from those who sample it, while both soups and salads prove equally satisfying. However, one minor drawback involves Manna's coffee, which occasionally manifests as somewhat watery and over-extracted, although this may not deter those without a discerning palate for high-quality espresso. To compensate, a mocha or flavor syrup can be ordered, yet even then, the resulting beverage fails to rival the rich, velvety texture found at nearby establishments on the city square. Despite this limitation, Manna CafÃ© remains a superior choice for coffee on the North Side."

"Wednesday's double flyer day elicits immense enthusiasm from me, as it provides an optimal opportunity to capitalize on concurrent validity of previous and current sales. Although I lament the cessation of my preferred dairy-free blintzes, a plethora of alternative gluten-free and dairy-free options remain, showcasing the store's commitment to accommodating diverse dietary requirements. The staff members exhibit a consistent display of cordiality and accessibility, rendering assistance when needed. Additionally, the store offers convenient parking, exceptional bulk product deals, and a minimal likelihood of sold-out sale items."

This was so spectacular that we went 4 times in 3 days. Everything tasted fresh; the menu was so extensive that it was hard to choose what to order, so we kept returning and sharing. The plates are also innovative, not salads, but genuine chef-created and intriguing dishes that are just delightful and inspiring.

"In the event that you are experiencing challenges pertaining to hair color, it is highly recommended that you visit this establishment and seek the expertise of Betsey, an accomplished professional with a remarkable 50-year tenure in the industry. This marks the third occasion over several years that I have sought her assistance in rectifying unsatisfactory coloring results, having previously encountered her at William Jon Salon, which has since closed. In addition to demonstrating exceptional proficiency in addressing hair color issues, Betsey exhibited impressive skill in cutting my hair, ensuring that I felt entirely comfortable throughout the process. Notably, she displays a unique ability to empathize with clients facing financial constraints, graciously accommodating their needs while offering valuable guidance on maintaining healthy, vibrant tresses. It is worth mentioning that her expertise extends to African American hair, earning her widespread acclaim within the community. Consider scheduling an appointment with Betsey, and allow her to enhance your hair's appearance, leaving you feeling confident and satisfied."

"Ambivalently, my expectations regarding dining at Hooters remain nebulous, thus, the equivocal appraisal of five stars. However, a minor drawback does perturb me, albeit not to the extent of diminishing their rating. The ambiance evokes a sense of nostalgia, reminiscent of the 1970s, replete with wooden paneling, a peculiar shade of orange, and an unapologetic touch of kitsch. My culinary experiences within these confines have been satisfactory, characterized by cordial servers, scrupulous cleanliness, and efficient service, exclusive of peak hours, weekends, or evening meals. Notwithstanding, a few instances of sluggish carry-out service have left me feeling inconsequential vis-Ã -vis in-house patrons, subsequent to prolonged waiting periods for both ordering and food procurement."

"An absolute requisite halt for any individual finding themselves within close proximity to Phoenix. A veritable haven for aficionados of delectable southern cuisine, this establishment serves up fare that is unparalleled in its excellence. The fried chicken, in particular, boasts a judicious application of seasoning, resulting in a delightful harmony of flavors that tantalizes the taste buds. Furthermore, the texture is pleasingly crunchy, sans the slightest hint of doughiness. Notably, even the breast exhibits an impressive degree of moisture. Complementing the chicken perfectly is the house-made hot sauce, whose piquant flavor enhances the culinary experience. Additionally, the biscuits and gravy are not to be overlooked, as the former are suitably soft and fluffy, while the latter exudes an authenticity that is nothing short of laudable. Lastly, the service at this venue is truly commendable, making one's visit all the more enjoyable."

"Excellent pricing for an exceptional array of delectable options, generous servings, and an unparalleled dining experience! I thoroughly enjoy visiting this establishment due to the mouthwatering cuisine that never fails to impress my palate. The assortment of sweet treats on display is undeniably captivating, making it challenging to resist their allure. Although I have visited during periods of relative tranquility, the ambiance remains conducive to an enjoyable meal. Unquestionably, a must-visit destination, particularly for those in close proximity!"

Warning: Awesome Place for a Date!!!


Honestly, if you have an adventurous pallet and don't want the normal fair one night then you HAVE to try Soul.  Anyone that gives this place less than 4 stars is downright out of their mind!  I am extremely picky about the freshness of food, ambiance, pleasantness of staff, and pricing of food.  Soul's staff is always a pleasure to speak with and of the 5-6x I have been there, each meal has been nothing short of excellent!  If you do not try Soul Gastrolounge then you are really missing out!

Best Nail Salon in Vegas! Affordable and great quality! I go to Le and she's so sweet and does an amazing job! My gel manicure lasts for three weeks! And I just go change it because I get bored with the color! No chipping or peeling like other places! Best price in town!

"Culinary excellence and competitive pricing are hallmarks of this esteemed establishment, where the sushi offerings are particularly exceptional and have never disappointed in terms of freshness or quality. Although ideal for families due to its welcoming ambiance and outdoor seating options that afford a picturesque lake view, the absence of child-friendly chopsticks remains a lamentable oversight."

"Courier Cafe, an eatery that exudes an unparalleled charm, boasts an array of delectable American culinary offerings that cater to diverse tastes. Their menu features classic soda fountain treats such as phosphates and malt shakes, which contribute to their distinctiveness, while the remainder of their fare is equally scrumptious. Freshly baked bread serves as the foundation for their sumptuous sandwiches, and their substantial burgers are cooked to perfection. A plethora of vegetarian options are available, with the pesto grilled Swiss on sourdough being a personal favorite, and the ham melt on a fresh croissant being another standout selection. For those with a sweet tooth, the headliner, a magnificent sundae engulfed in rich hot fudge, is an ideal choice for sharing. Although the quality of the cuisine may rival that of more esteemed establishments, the prices at Courier Cafe remain reasonable, making it a superlative value. While the pace of service may occasionally be leisurely, the overall experience at this venue is consistently enjoyable, particularly when seeking respite from the rigors of academic endeavors such as challenging examinations or laborious writing assignments."

This proved to be a pleasant surprise, and in my estimation, it qualifies as a hidden gem.
