My companion and I decided to visit this establishment on a whim due to her acquaintance's endorsement of their delectable fried pickles. I am incredibly grateful that we chose to stop by! The beverages offered here are particularly distinctive and provide a welcome change from the conventional options available on Freemont Street. The ambiance is noticeably more refined than the surrounding establishments, boasting friendly staff, delectable cuisine, and expertly crafted cocktails. While the pricing of drinks is comparable to neighboring bars, the quality served here is substantially superior. If you intend to spend $8 on a cocktail in the Freemont area, you would be wise to choose this establishment over the frozen drink kiosk located down the street. My companion and I partook in a few appetizers, a couple of artfully prepared cocktails, and engaged in enjoyable conversation with Chris, our attentive server. I wholeheartedly recommend paying a visit to this venue; I have every intention of returning on my next trip to Las Vegas.

"I will unequivocally be returning. The service was exceptional, and Marianne's proficiency and people skills were truly impressive. Her ability to create a welcoming ambiance and put me at ease, despite it being my maiden experience receiving such a procedure, was noteworthy. She executed her tasks expediently, interspersing brief periods of discomfort with engaging conversation, thereby precluding any possibility of mental distraction. I would unhesitatingly endorse Marianne's services, particularly for novices, as she possesses an unparalleled capacity to allay apprehensions and foster a sense of comfort."

I have been a patron of Dr. C's dental services for an extended period, and my experiences have been nothing short of satisfactory, owing to his proficiency in performing various dental procedures with utmost efficiency, coupled with his unwavering commitment to ensuring that patients feel at ease throughout the process. Notably, his expertise in cleaning has been particularly impressive, leaving my teeth feeling remarkably clean and refreshed. Furthermore, the staff at his practice has consistently displayed exceptional cordiality, making each visit a genuinely pleasant experience. Consequently, I would highly recommend Dr. C to anyone seeking a skilled, composed, and knowledgeable dentist who can provide top-notch care without causing undue stress or discomfort.

"These artisans skillfully restored my vintage money clip, a family heirloom passed down from my great-grandfather, to a state of robustness surpassing its original condition, and did so at a cost significantly lower than the estimate I received. I shall unhesitatingly return to this establishment for all future horological and jewelry repair necessities."
Best baseball/ softball park ever, I love the people that work there and play there everyone is like family. The beer is always good to have when your playing with friends great park.

Went into Brio the other night as SQ is close to home.  The restaurant was very nice looking and being as it was happy hour I took a seat at the bar.  The bar staff was very friendly and I was happy to find out they had some awesome deals for happy hour.  I tried their shrimp and eggplant appetizer and it was amazing.  I'm not usually a big veggie guy but between the shrimp and sauce this dish is delicious.  The bread was warm and fresh and I ended up using too much of it to sop up the sauce from the appetizer dish and made myself full.  Can't wait to come back and try more.

Thank you to Jessy for a tattoo I have had a ton of compliments on!

I made an appointment but they also take walk ins.

Artists that weren't tattooing were sketching, painting, or drawing.

I got custom work done, she drew it up on my arm to get the right fit and I am looking forward to working with her in the future on the rest of it! I can tell her mind is brewing something up for me.

Check out their website for all of the artist's portfolios...every artist is there on the website so you can check out their work before you go.
The pricing is extremely reasonable for the quality of the work.

We thoroughly enjoy this establishment!!
Principally due to the fact that we procured a season pass at the onset of the season, thereby rendering our visits significantly more economical!! With the aforementioned season pass, we were required to pay merely $10 in excess of the day pass price, and were also afforded complimentary parking for the entire duration of the season. 

Indubitably, the queues can be somewhat protracted and the culinary offerings are indeed rather costly, but such is life!! To optimize your experience, it is advisable to schedule your visit on a day that is less prone to attracting an abundance of patrons, and to linger until the closing hour, which falls on weekdays and Friday/Saturday. Fridays and Saturdays are preferable as the park remains open until 10 pm, thereby enabling one to avoid the lengthier queues. 
It is also judicious to bring a cooler and store it in your vehicle, thus alleviating the financial burden associated with purchasing sustenance. 

I must confess that I find the multitude of grievances to be somewhat perplexing. This is, after all, a sizable aquatic theme park, wherein the staff exerts considerable effort to accommodate each and every patron.

My first experience with The Bikini was after a shoot in PHX. The crew rattled on for an hour about The Bikini and we all finally went. I'm Glad. This is one of those places that I've heard alot about and couldn't wait to stop and have a brew. It did not disappoint either. It is the, umm, hipster, artfag, freaks and geeks place? If your clothes rarely match by accident or design, this is your place. A typical dive bar with some great local art adorning the walls, kickass jukebox and a pool table. Now that I've also finally been to First Friday, it seems the two go hand in hand. I love when I get to go there. It's not in my regular bar list, but only because I'm in TempE and hate to drive, let alone drink and drive.

"The $5 lunch deal constitutes an abundance of delectable sustenance, rendering it inconceivable for anyone to opt for the Subway adjacent, particularly during peak lunch hours when the eatery is bustling with patrons eager to partake in the culinary experience. Despite the potential prolonged waiting period, the staff maintains a warm and welcoming demeanor, ensuring a pleasant dining atmosphere. The diverse array of freshly prepared breads offers an assortment of flavors, each one showcasing its unique qualities and leaving customers spoiled for choice. Personal favorites among my colleagues and I, who frequent the establishment approximately once a week, include the Hell's Kitchen, Chicken Salad, Tuna Salad, and of course, the classic Turkey sandwiches, thereby warranting their unwavering recommendation."

I really like this place - second time coming good for mixed groups of vegetarians and meat eaters- second time coming and very good. I really like the soup (veg lemon grass) Plus it's bring your own wine!

I think I'm in love! If you happen to like shakes or are in need of some fuel post workout (LVAC Flamingo & 215) check this place out. There's something for everyone...fatty, guilty pleasure shakes & fantastic healthy shakes! I got the Incredible Hulk, which is kale, pineapple & banana (I added some protein powder) and it was sooooo good! The people are are incredibly friendly & they also donate to Three Square, which helps feed children in Southern Nevada. Good product, good people & a good cause...I will be back for sure!
Came in on a Monday afternoon,  no wait and almost empty restaurant.  Yesss. Good came out quickly and was sooo good. Great place to get down and dirty with your family.

After numerous laudatory endorsements, I finally indulged in a culinary excursion to Mon Ami Gabi, and it has ascended to the status of my most beloved eatery! The victuals served therein are utterly sublime, while the ambiance exudes an aura of elegance and refinement. My gastronomic adventure commenced with the hanger steak, augmented by a rich Merlot butter sauce that seemed to dissolve into my palate with consummate ease; meanwhile, my betrothed and our mutual acquaintance relished the salmon, which they deemed exceptional in both taste and presentation. Furthermore, my companion and I partook of the escargot, an unconventional delicacy that I highly recommend for its singular flavor profile. Suffice it to say that my dining experience at Mon Ami Gabi was nothing short of extraordinary, and mere mention of it instills within me an intense craving for a prompt return! Unhesitatingly, I assure you that a visit to this esteemed establishment will not disappoint.

So, had I gone on my own to DMV, I would have had to wait for who knows how many hours to be told that I needed certain information changed.  Then would have had to leave, change that information and then go back and wait for hours.  At least, I was able to walk right up, get it all figured out in 10 minutes and pay a few extra bucks now to waste my entire day.\n\nThanks Rob Young Insurance for the recommendation!  Insurance and registration in the same place!  Makes total sense to me!
Absolutely fabulous!  Why do so many people fixate on the location?  The food was super delicious, Mexican + seafood, where could things go wrong.

Delicious!! :) got seats within five minutes of arriving. Service was top-notch and atmosphere was great!  Portions are huge, can definitely get one order for two people.\n\nNot an ideal place for kids but perfect for dates, family gatherings, or any special occasion :)

Amazing pancakes!  We had a few samples brought out for our group this morning and they were perfect. We had the server pick the spread and it would not have been my first choice, glad we let him. They were perfect! !

"Eric demonstrated exceptional proficiency in his role as a sommelier during our wine pairing experience with MyVegas.com, providing comprehensive explanations of our carefully curated pairings and exhibiting a willingness to acquire information on our behalf when confronted with inquiries. His dedication to ensuring an optimal dining experience was complemented by the delectable culinary offerings, specifically the linguine with clam sauce and brick chicken."

"This salon boasts an unparalleled level of excellence, rendering it a veritable haven for those seeking aesthetic enhancements. My personal experience with Lexi, a relatively novice yet exceptionally skilled stylist, serves as a testament to the salon's commitment to providing top-notch services at reasonable prices. Her proficiency in deciphering my imprecise and inarticulate descriptions and transforming them into visually stunning hairstyles is nothing short of remarkable. As an individual with lengthy, unkempt dirty blonde tresses, I have witnessed a metamorphosis from lackluster to utterly captivating, reminiscent of the iconic Taylor Swift. Moreover, Lexi's dedication to educating me on various styling techniques has significantly augmented my overall appearance, bestowing upon me an added layer of confidence and poise."

"Extremely delectable culinary experiences are always ardently sought after by epicureans like myself, and upon discovering this establishment, my unrelenting quest for exquisite Indian cuisine was gratified. My inaugural visit transpired to be an unmitigated success, as I relished in the flavorsome Chicken Tikka Masala, accompanied by exceptional naan that rivaled the finest specimens of its kind that I have had the pleasure of savoring. It is unequivocal that this eatery will transform into a regular haunt for me, as I eagerly anticipate partaking in their gastronomical offerings time and again."

"Oh what an exceptional dining establishment this happens to be!  Upon my second visit (for myself) I had the pleasure of being accompanied by Robyn N., and I strongly recommend that you, dear patron, follow my lead and sample their delectable Carne Asada Torta Norte\u00f1a, which comes complete with a side salad, on your maiden visit.  (It is advisable to forgo the complimentary tortilla chips and instead opt for a supplementary side dish of their mouthwatering ceviche for a mere 99 cents, should you desire a modicum of additional sustenance.) \n\nYou shall receive nothing short of exemplary culinary offerings at this eatery!  Boasting a spotless ambiance, comfortable seating, hospitable and attentive service, copious portion sizes, and eminently reasonable pricing, this restaurant guarantees that you depart satiated and thoroughly impressed by the gastronomic mastery you have just indulged in.  Utterly delectable!  Indeed, the piÃ¨ce de rÃ©sistance is the Carne Asada Torta Norte\u00f1a, available for the unbelievably affordable sum of $7.49."

"The novel venue possesses expansive proportions, which has been the recipient of my canine companions' patronage for a considerable duration, courtesy of the friendly and attentive personnel who exhibit proficiency in their duties, thereby ensuring prompt and seamless experiences for all patrons."

Wicked Spoon, my unwavering preference for an opulent buffet experience, transcends the conventional notion of a sumptuous spread, offering an unparalleled display of gastronomic mastery that rivals even the most esteemed fine dining establishments. The ambiance exudes refinement, elegance, and expansiveness, while the courteous and attentive staff, particularly the waiters, contribute significantly to the exceptional service. The experience is nothing short of luxurious, as the staff promptly removes plates upon completion, ensuring an unencumbered indulgence in the vast array of delectable offerings.

The beverage selection boasts an impressive array of freshly squeezed juices and premium teas, elevating the buffet experience to new heights. At Wicked Spoon, the emphasis on quality extends beyond the culinary realm, as the prices remain remarkably reasonable, making it an accessible luxury. The chefs demonstrate remarkable versatility, accommodating individual preferences and presenting each dish with meticulous attention to detail, resulting in a visual feast that rivals the taste.

The piÃ¨ce de rÃ©sistance, however, lies in the dessert bar, showcasing an assortment of sweet treats that includes gelato, apple pie, and bread pudding, all crafted with precision and devotion. For those who share an ardent passion for buffets, a visit to Wicked Spoon becomes an imperative, as it promises to redefine one's expectations from a buffet experience, setting a new standard that will leave a lasting impression.

"Prefacing my remarks by emphasizing that my culinary critiques are founded upon the quality of the fare served, rather than peripheral factors such as portion size, waiting period, or the extent to which I am made to feel esteemed, I am delighted to share my thoughts regarding The Parlor Pizzeria. As a seasoned gastronomic expert with a decade of experience in fine dining establishments and six years specializing in premium wine distribution, I possess a profound understanding of the intricacies involved in creating exquisite cuisine. My extensive familiarity with The Parlor's offerings has led me to confidently assert that their culinary prowess is unparalleled, as I have yet to encounter a subpar dish within their repertoire. While it is not uncommon for even the most accomplished restaurants to experience occasional lapses in consistency, my experiences at The Parlor have been nothing short of exceptional. My gastronomic inclinations lean towards innovative dishes, but when I encounter a traditional preparation executed with precision, I find myself returning to it time and time again. In this regard, The Parlor's Caesar Salad stands out as a shining example of culinary mastery, with its simplicity artfully balanced by the harmonious union of chopped romaine hearts, creamy parmesan and anchovy emulsion, freshly toasted croutons, and a sprinkling of shaved Parmigiano Reggiano. To all other Phoenix restaurants, I implore you to take note: a true Caesar Salad requires adherence to this precise formula, eschewing unnecessary embellishments that compromise the integrity of the dish. My sincere appreciation extends to The Parlor Pizzeria for their dedication to upholding the authenticity of this timeless classic."

I have been in this restaurant for 2 times and tried their Lamb Sandwich, Baba Ganouj and Shawarma Chicken. They are all very delicious. Next time I will try Sleek which has kale inside. It looks really tasty and servings are large. Waitstaff is nice and helpful. Decor is cozy. I can't wait to go there again and try other dishes.
The sales team worked with me to trade a car that needed work and put me into the car I always wanted for a price I could afford.  Talk to Jeff and Dom they are Awesome!

"A profound astonishment ensued for both myself and my colleague, as we were indulging in an opulent culinary experience at this esteemed eatery. The clientele present within the establishment exuded an air of nonchalance and sophistication, which harmoniously complemented the fastidious attention to detail displayed by the staff. Furthermore, the gastronomical offerings served subsequent to our arrival perpetuated the positive impression we had formed since our initial encounter with the venue, rendering it an optimal destination for those seeking a symbiotic blend of epicurean delight and ambiance."

I became a member of Truliant several years ago, primarily with the intention of procuring an automobile loan, and I must say that the entire process was remarkably straightforward and efficient.  Despite my credit score being less than desirable at the time, they still extended me the loan, not only once, but twice, thereby significantly contributing to the enhancement of my creditworthiness.  It is abundantly evident that the staff here are exceptionally pleasant, cognizant of the fact that the members themselves are the proprietors of the credit union, in contrast to a traditional financial institution where external investors hold ownership.  The physical location of this establishment is decidedly convenient, situated directly off of 77 at Tyvola, making it easily accessible.  Of late, they have instituted a most impressive innovation, abolishing the necessity for deposit and withdrawal slips when conducting transactions within the branch, thereby streamlining the process for members.  Moreover, they facilitate deposits for other regional credit unions, a service that undoubtedly proves advantageous.  Upon the rare occasions that I am compelled to engage in telephonic communication with a representative, I have the distinct pleasure of conversing with an individual possessing a charming southern drawl, rather than struggling to comprehend some distant, foreign accent.  As Truliant operates out of Winston-Salem, North Carolina, it is indeed gratifying to have their presence in the Queen City.  My sole, albeit trivial, grievance lies in their lack of a coin-counting machine, a feature that many credit unions typically possess.
What a wonderful experience! I have been jumping from dentist to dentist for the last 5 years. I am happy to say I have found a place to stay!

I have had the privilege of availing myself of this establishment's automotive maintenance and repair services on three separate occasions, and I must say that the level of customer service I have received has been nothing short of exceptional. The staff has consistently demonstrated a commendable commitment to honesty and transparency in their dealings with me, refraining from attempting to persuade me to purchase unnecessary services or products. In fact, they have proven themselves to be trustworthy and reliable, providing me with prompt and efficient service that has consistently met, if not exceeded, my expectations. It is indeed a rare occurrence to come across a business that prioritizes integrity and ethical conduct over profit margins, and I feel compelled to express my sincere gratitude to the management and employees of Big O Tires on Rainbow for their exceptional work. Their dedication to providing top-notch service has earned them an A+ rating in my book, and I would unhesitatingly recommend them to anyone seeking a dependable and reputable auto repair shop. Kudos to Big O Tires on Rainbow for their outstanding performance, and keep up the fantastic work!
Only theater in town i'd go to.  Comfortable seats and easy parking.  Always reserve your seats online before going, makes things alot easier.

"The culinary experience at this esteemed eatery is truly sublime, with the service being exceptionally refined and the victuals possessing an intense depth of flavor that nevertheless avoids becoming overly rich or heavy-handed in its application of lubricants. Upon my most recent visit to this vibrant city, I had the pleasure of partaking in a delectable luncheon at this establishment, which featured a delightful soup that harmonized beautifully with the smoked mackerel, and a poutine that, while perhaps slightly overpowering in its abundance of flavors, still managed to showcase a remarkable balance between the savory elements of scallions and turkey confit. Overall, my dining experience at this restaurant was truly exceptional, warranting a rating of 4.5, rounded upwards for sheer excellence."

Upon my arrival at the quaint and quirky establishment this morning, I was delightfully startled to discover that I did not have to endure the lengthy queue of vehicles in the drive-thru lane. The affable gentleman stationed at the window exhibited remarkable patience and cordiality, offering the recommendation of the Vanilla/Honey Latte Iced beverage, which, given my maiden visit to this venue, I greatly appreciated. The flavorsome concoction proved to be utterly captivating, with an emphasis on the term "FANTASTIC" being employed to articulate my unwavering satisfaction. Furthermore, I opted to sample their delectable breakfast burrito, which not only boasted an impressive taste but also refrained from weighing down my stomach, thereby allowing me to partake in its consumption without experiencing the customary sensation of lethargy and craving for prolonged slumber. The expedient manner in which my order was attended to, coupled with the warm amiability displayed by the young woman who delivered my repast to my vehicle, served to further enhance my overall gratification. Additionally, the prices charged for these exceptional offerings were eminently fair and reasonable. In contrast to the lengthy lines, hurried service, minuscule portions, and exorbitant pricing characteristic of certain renowned coffee chains, this charming locale offered a truly unique and pleasurable experience. Moreover, they feature an extensive array of expertly crafted brews and vintages, as well as a welcoming and canine-friendly patio area. My future visits to this enchanting spot are not only probable but indeed inevitable, and I wholeheartedly encourage others to partake in the same indulgence. By supporting local establishments such as this one, we can all revel in the richness and diversity they bring to our communities.

"Exclamatory utterance expressing profound astonishment and admiration, Tater! A consummate artisan in the realm of mixology, unwavering dedication to the craft, unparalleled expertise, and an unrivaled ability to conjure up potent elixirs that captivate the palate and satiate the senses. In the heart of downtown, a veritable mecca for epicureans and aficionados, your esteemed establishment reigns supreme, an oasis of culinary excellence amidst a desert of mediocrity. An unwavering commitment to providing an unforgettable experience for patrons, the ambiance, comestibles, and hospitality are all carefully curated to create a symphony of sensory delights. A steadfast pledge to leave no stone unturned in the pursuit of gastronomical perfection, your unwavering passion and fastidious attention to detail serve as a beacon of hope for those seeking a truly transcendent dining experience."

"What an exhilarating escapade! Today, we ventured into the picturesque Cave Creek recreational area and embarked on an equestrian excursion with the assistance of the knowledgeable Cowboys. This unquestionably ranks as one of the most memorable equine experiences I've had the pleasure of indulging in. The steeds were vigorous and healthy, the trails were awe-inspiring, and the staff demonstrated remarkable efficiency in their operations. 

The horseback riding endeavor is skillfully managed during the 'winter' season by Jeff and Debbie, who have perfected the process to a science. They possess an array of accoutrements, including footwear, headgear, and other accessories suitable for all ages. Additionally, they generously provide a bottle of water upon request. 

There are several aspects that I particularly appreciate: 

* Divide the participants into smaller clusters of approximately 4 to 8 individuals per group. 
* Offer saddlebags for conveniently carrying cameras, water bottles, and miscellaneous items. 
* Present a warm and welcoming demeanor, sans any artificiality. 
* Furnish chapeaux for protection from the sun's rays - a thoughtful touch indeed! 
* The trails are intriguing and successfully convey the impression of being outside the city limits. 
* Maintain a spotless and well-organized operation. 
* Bestow a discount coupon worth $5.00 for each member of our gathering, redeemable for future visits - a shrewd move, indeed! 

If you have family visiting and are seeking a quintessential Arizona experience, consider embarking on this adventure while taking advantage of the opportunity to explore Cave Creek further once your excursion concludes. However, act with haste, as the winter season draws to a close on May 1st."

"Excellent retail establishment.  I am unable to comprehend as to why certain individuals would express dissatisfaction with regard to the rapidity of assistance.  It is my belief that a slower pace is preferable when undertaking modifications, as it enables a more thorough and meticulous approach, thus ensuring an optimal outcome.  This most certainly does not resemble a hasty oil change facility."

This establishment is utterly remarkable, boasting an ambiance that is utterly captivating and a culinary experience that is nothing short of exceptional. The gastronomical offerings are truly delectable, and the nocturnal revelry on Saturdays, characterized by the reverberation of salsa rhythms, is positively effervescent. Indeed, this venue ranks among the top five in its class, without a doubt.

"Darlene, the proprietor and preeminent champion of the tailoring realm, has unequivocally mastered the art of alterations, as evidenced by her exceptional reputation and my unwavering patronage. My interactions with her have consistently been characterized by her warmth, commitment, and extraordinary proficiency. 
  I was initially hesitant to venture to her establishment due to its geographical distance from my location; however, subsequent to my maiden visit, I became cognizant of the fact that her expertise and top-notch services were well worth the journey. Moreover, the quality of her work has been so exceptional that I continue to entrust her with my garments, even from afar, and have never experienced any difficulties or disappointments. 
  It is noteworthy that Darlene's dedication to her craft has led to her expansion from a modest storefront into a larger, more prominent location, which serves as a testament to her exceptional abilities and the high level of satisfaction among her clientele. Thus, I wholeheartedly endorse and recommend her services to anyone seeking superior tailoring and alteration work."

We had the privilege of visiting the vicinity, and through a stroke of good fortune, we were able to secure a last-minute appointment on a Sunday, which proved to be a serendipitous occurrence. Our canine companion was accorded regal treatment, with the grooming process being executed with exceptional proficiency. However, what truly distinguished this establishment from others was the demeanor of the staff, who exhibited an unwavering commitment to ensuring the well-being and comfort of both our furry friend and ourselves. Their warmth and hospitality made us feel as though we had been transported to a bygone era, where the prioritization of interpersonal relationships and genuine camaraderie reigned supreme.

The ambiance, gastronomy, and beverages offered at this establishment exude an unwavering affirmation, inducing a state of euphoria that can only be described as "yes" in its purest form. The hospitable demeanor of the staff further enhances the overall experience, fostering a welcoming environment that caters to the needs of adults and children alike. We relish the prospect of revisiting this venue, as it embodies the quintessential setting that we seek in our pursuit of culinary indulgence and conviviality.

"Tacos El Gordo offers an unparalleled culinary experience, boasting an extensive array of delectable meats expertly prepared and presented in a bustling, vibrant atmosphere that exudes an unmistakable aroma of mouthwatering flavors. Strategically positioned at the terminus of the renowned Las Vegas Strip, this gastronomic gem is nestled adjacent to Treasure Island, catering to patrons well into the nocturnal hours. Upon entering the establishment, one cannot help but be captivated by the diverse medley of savory scents emanating from the various carne stations, each showcasing its unique cooking technique and tantalizing aroma. Patrons are invited to sample the vast selection of meats, including the Adobada, a spicy pork variety that has earned widespread acclaim for its juicy, flavorful texture and unwavering popularity among visitors. The Suadero, a beef shoulder dish characterized by its melt-in-your-mouth tenderness and rich, savory flavor, is yet another standout option among the extensive menu offerings. Enthusiasts of authentic Mexican cuisine would be remiss not to include Tacos El Gordo in their culinary itinerary, as the restaurant's commitment to quality and authenticity is certain to leave a lasting impression on even the most discerning palates."

You are cognizant of a restaurant's exceptional quality when you venture elsewhere and find yourself ruminating, "Gee, so-and-so's culinary offerings are vastly superior to this..." Dragon Wok is, indeed, that establishment, the benchmark against which all others are assessed... the one that stimulates your gustatory sensibilities and leaves you yearning for further indulgence.

This eatery has secured a treasured position among our familial preferences. I am unable to provide recommendations for specific orders, as the diverse array of options renders it challenging to sample each item on the menu. Nonetheless, I can confidently attest that every dish I have had the pleasure of consuming at this venue has been delectable. Particularly noteworthy are the Orange Chicken, Combination Lo Mein, Sweet and Sour Chicken, Gourmet Beef, and their tantalizing War Wonton Soup (yum!).

Dragon Wok is a veritable gem of an establishment: The generous family-sized portions of food are consistently flavorful (with the staff happily accommodating customized requests), the ambiance is pleasant and distinctive, andâmost crucial aspectâthe premises are meticulously maintained, ensuring spotlessness in every aspect, including the floors, tables, kitchen, and even the restrooms.

In conclusion, if you are deliberating over paying Dragon Wok a visit, permit me to unequivocally affirm that doing so would be a judicious decision. This esteemed establishment offers not only delectable cuisine but also excellent service and a welcoming atmosphere, thereby rendering each dining experience thoroughly enjoyable.

"Indubitably exceptional coffee beverages, proffering an unparalleled culinary experience for the discerning palate. Moreover, they meticulously roast an array of their own beans, thereby ensuring that the quality of their product remains unsurpassed, and thus, rendering it an ideal choice for brewing delectable coffee in the comfort of one's domicile. We have become ardent devotees of this establishment, owing to the unwavering excellence of their offerings."

"Thus, it appears that our culinary inclinations have shifted towards the rich and diverse cuisine of the Mediterranean region. Following a thorough exploration of local establishments, we chanced upon an unpretentious eatery that not only met but exceeded our expectations with regard to the quality and authenticity of its offerings. The palate-pleasing attributes of the fare served at this venue were undoubtedly attributable to the judicious employment of fresh, locally sourced ingredients, which imbued each dish with a vitality and depth of flavor that left us suitably impressed. Consequently, we shall endeavor to revisit this gastronomic haven in the near future, eager to sample further examples of their culinary mastery and explore the breadth of their menu."

We went to Kickstand the other night for the first time to try out their burgers.  We were first impressed by the cleanliness and nice atmosphere of the restaurant.  We were seated in a booth that had its own flat-screen TV.  It was off and the hostess offered to turn it on.  While we appreciated how it would be good for sports fanatics, we opted for a non-TV dinner.  

I love that the burger choices at Kickstand are unique.  They offer interesting flavor combinations.  My partner ordered the Cycle Zydeco Burger (Zydeco spread, Mardi Gras slaw, and Root Beer glaze).  It wasn't too spicy for him, and he's not a big fan of too much heat.   I, on the other hand, love spicy stuff, but went with the Greek Burger as a change of pace.  It had kalamata olive spread, tzatziki sauce, and feta, three of my favorite things to eat.  The sauce really made the burger.  The burgers themselves were juicy and flavorful, too.   

There were also a lot of sides to pick from.  We both opted for the combo tater tots/sweet tater tots side item.  The regular tater tots were good, and the sweet (potato) tater tots came with a butter/brown sugar syrup for dipping.  It was literally like dessert.  What a great offering.  

With the food, atmosphere, and service being great, what wasn't to enjoy?  We'll be revisiting Kickstand the next time we're in the mood for a really good burger.

"I am utterly delighted with the exceptional service I received from this esteemed organization. Following my telephonic communication with Jerry, he promptly arrived at my domicile on the same day, furnishing me with a meticulous estimate that was remarkably reasonable. The subsequent scheduling of my arboreal pruning for the succeeding day exemplified their commitment to expediency. Alex, a consummate professional, presented himself with utmost courtesy and ensured that our understanding was thoroughly synchronized. His team executed their duties with remarkable proficiency, leaving the area in a state of unparalleled tidiness. I would enthusiastically endorse their services to any individual seeking similar assistance, and I intend to engage their expertise in the future."

"Culinary excellence abounds at this establishment, where delectable victuals tantalize the taste buds and leave patrons utterly satiated. A team of competent and affable servers attend to guests' needs with alacrity, ensuring that each dining experience is nothing short of exceptional. Generous helpings of expertly prepared fare, presented at an unbeatable price point, guarantee that hunger will be vanquished, leaving room for delightful excess. This veritable treasure trove of gastronomic delights is sure to impress even the most discerning palates, compelling repeat visits from those who partake in its bounty. Unhesitatingly, one would enthusiastically endorse this venue to acquaintances, eager to share the pleasure of such a find."

"My odyssey of dental encounters has been checkered, to say the least, but my recent visit to Modern Dental Care marked a paradigm shift in my perception of optimal oral healthcare. The staff exuded an unparalleled level of cordiality and expertise, guiding me through each stage of the process with alacrity and unwavering attention to detail. Dr. Mark Edington's craftsmanship was nothing short of exceptional, his dexterity and precision eliciting a sense of confidence and reassurance that left me feeling utterly delighted and satiated. The ambiance of the clinic itself was inviting and comforting, fostering an atmosphere of serenity that served to alleviate any apprehensions or anxieties I may have harbored. In light of this transformative experience, I would unequivocally endorse Modern Dental Care to anyone seeking top-tier dental services, whether it be for an acute emergency, routine maintenance, or simply a meticulous cleaning. Your decision to entrust them with your oral wellbeing will undoubtedly be met with unbridled satisfaction and contentment."

"On yet another occasion, my expectations were not left unfulfilled at Saint Sushi, as the culinary offerings and hospitality of the staff persistently upheld their tradition of excellence, thereby eliciting my unwavering satisfaction and loyalty; I shall eagerly anticipate and relish the prospect of my subsequent visit, during which I shall undoubtedly partake in the delectable delights that this esteemed establishment has become renowned for, and graciously acknowledge the warm reception accorded to me by the affable personnel, whose unwavering commitment to providing an exceptional dining experience has earned my utmost appreciation and commendation; until such time, I remain, Your Caribbean Majesty."

"Fantastic bagels, indeed! Such an assertion can be unequivocally substantiated by my personal experience, having sampled a variety of bagels from multiple establishments within New York City, including seven distinct bakeries. My unwavering dedication to consuming at least one bagel per week since its inception serves as a testament to the unparalleled quality of this particular bakery's offerings. It is worth mentioning that the bagel sandwiches served here harmoniously complement the inherent flavors of the bagel itself, with a notable example being a jalapeÃ±o bacon bagel paired with an assortment of ingredients such as eggs, pepperjack cheese, sausage, bell peppers, onions, tomatoes, and jalapeÃ±os. While the assortment of pastries available is undoubtedly delectable, the chocolate croissant stands out as a truly exceptional item, so much so that it compels one to forgo any semblance of self-control and indulge in repeated orders, despite the caloric consequences."

"Reasonable prices for exceptional service, culminating in an aggregate cost of $26, which encompasses the entire experience, are offered by this establishment. The personnel within this salon are proficient in their craft and efficient in their work, ensuring that clients do not experience prolonged waiting periods. Engaging in conversation is an option, with topics such as sports and women being popular choices, or alternatively, one may opt to observe the televisions positioned at each chair. The climax of every haircut is marked by a precise, straight-edge shave, accompanied by either a hot or cold towel, and supplemented by a brief machine massage. The individuals who work at this establishment are kind and personable, making it a worthwhile investment to allocate a few additional dollars above the cost of visiting establishments such as Cost Cutters, et al."

"Wow, never have I thought that pub grub could be this delectable. Cornish Pasty Co. is, by definition, a hole in the wall well worth driving to from any location in the valley if you seek simple, affordable, and, quite frankly, mouthwatering cuisine. 

The menu boasts an impressive array of options, ranging from traditional, premium to signature pasties. My taste buds were left in a state of euphoria after indulging in the lamb vindaloo, the spiciness of which left me utterly besotted. 

Upon entering the establishment, it becomes apparent that there is no host or hostess present at the entrance. As such, one has the option to take a seat at the bar or, quite conveniently, hang their purse from underneath the counter. 

The service, characterized by warmth, friendliness, and efficiency, adds to the overall pleasant dining experience. A dinner for two, excluding beverages, amounts to a mere $25, making it an exceptional bargain, in my opinion."

"Upon entering the establishment for the first time, I was immediately struck by the welcoming ambiance and attentive service. As I took a seat, the server promptly approached me and inquired about my beverage preferences and whether I had already decided on my culinary selection. It became apparent that this eatery caters to a devoted clientele who frequent the premises for a rapid, delectable meal, which speaks volumes about the quality of the food and the efficiency of the staff. My order, the special of the day, was nothing short of exceptional, boasting an inventive combination of flavors and textures that left a lasting impression on my palate. The fries accompanying my dish were cooked to a golden crisp, further enhancing the overall dining experience. Needless to say, I am eager to become a regular patron of this restaurant, given its proximity to my workplace and the consistently high standards of cuisine and customer service."

"Females possess an inherent saccharinity, while tariffs are rational and unpretentious. The vertical sleeping platform is perceived as warm, thus it is imperative to synchronize your schedule accordingly, taking into account the possibility of my Caucasian complexion being a contributing factor to this perception."

Justin did a fantastic job in cleaning my carpets at Benchmark printing. Our carpets take a beating with paper dust and ink. He came in and within 2 hours they were looking brand new again. I would definately recommend Elite Floor & Furniture Cleaning.

"This accommodation ranks among the most luxurious and aesthetically pleasing lodgings I have had the pleasure of occupying in recent memory, boasting an array of amenities and appointments that exude elegance and refinement. The sleeping quarters, in particular, proved to be a veritable oasis of comfort, with a bed so sumptuous and inviting that I found myself repeatedly indulging in the temptation of the snooze function, thereby extending my period of repose well beyond the conventional bounds of a typical morning routine. While this may be construed as either a positive or negative development, depending on one's perspective, I would venture to argue that such indulgence served to enhance my overall sense of well-being and relaxation."

"There are only a select few establishments that I can expend an appreciable amount of time within, and there are certain stores that I prefer not to bring my spouse along with me. Harbor Freight Tools falls under the category of the former, eliciting a sense of excitement and anticipation akin to that of a child receiving the Toys R Us catalog. Upon perusing their mailers and compiling a mental inventory of desired items, I adopt a strategic approach to maximize my shopping experience at Harbor Freight Tools. 

Catering to the needs of both seasoned professionals and DIY enthusiasts, this store offers an array of tools suitable for various projects and applications. However, it's essential to assess the quality and longevity of each tool, taking into account the frequency of usage and the cost-effectiveness of the investment. While some specialized tools may prove valuable, others may not justify their cost, as exemplified by a previous purchase of a subpar cordless power drill. 

To optimize your shopping experience at Harbor Freight Tools, it's crucial to strike a balance between acquiring high-quality tools and being mindful of their potential usage and affordability. By doing so, you'll be able to uncover exceptional bargains and savor the pleasure of exploring this unique retail establishment. I wholeheartedly endorse paying a visit to Harbor Freight Tools and relishing the opportunity to discover the assortment of tools and resources available."

Went her yesterday nd got some English Bangers and some English Bacon.  YUMMO, they have a great aray of meat there, Will be going back there again, to get some Lamb next time.  Prices are very reasonable.

Second trip to Downtown Tattoo - Buddy hooked us up and fixed our tats. Super guy who stands by his shop and the people he has working there. \n\nHappy to say the next time we're back in Vegas, this is the only place we will get our tattoos!

We shared a stone crab appetizer; never had these before, they were okay.  We were told that these were frozen from last season, since the season starts in October.  We just didn't see the big deal with them.  \nThe highlight of my meal was the 2 lb. lobster, which they cracked for me.  It was the best ever, and my wife loved her halibut dish.  The spinach was terrific, also.  All in all, a very rewarding and pleasant experience.

This establishment is utterly remarkable, boasting an array of delectable Italian delights that are certain to satiate even the most discerning palate, complemented by a refreshing glass of homemade limoncello that serves as the perfect accompaniment to such culinary masterpieces; thus, it is my unequivocal recommendation that you partake in the experience offered by this venue, as it is truly a singular and unparalleled delight that transcends any attempt at humor or levity.

During our most recent sojourn to Las Vegas in December, we were afforded the opportunity to partake in an evening repast at Mon Ami Gabi, situated within the Paris hotel complex. Upon being seated alfresco, we were presented with an unobstructed panorama of the majestic Bellagio fountain display, performed at fifteen-minute intervals directly opposite our vantage point. Needless to say, this dining experience boasted one of the most breathtaking views we have had the pleasure of enjoying from a culinary establishment. Moving on to the gastronomical offerings, my spouse opted for the sea scallop entrÃ©e, accompanied by a side of cafÃ© au lait, while I selected the grilled salmon, both of which proved to be tantalizingly delectable. Our palates satiated, we expressed a desire to return to this eatery in the future.

After reading the reviews I called DC to see if they had anything Open for me to get my expedition windows tinted  today ( Just the front two windows) Joe mentioned that he was working on a car but he didn't have to finish it until tomorrow and if I come right away he will fit me in. Wow! Made it there in less than 10 minutes he pulled the vehicle out that he was working on And pulled mine in.  He called Me back in about an hour and a half after working on my car and it looks great. Customer service, dependability And quality of work Joe is your man.... Highly recommend.

We indulged in an unforgettable dining experience at this establishment on the eve of the new year in 2010, accompanied by my better half. The ambiance and hospitality we encountered were truly exceptional, as the staff members were attired in traditional Japanese garb and demonstrated a genuine enthusiasm for engaging with patrons. The culinary offerings were indeed impressive, with my selection of fried oysters being delivered in their shells, numbering five or six on my plate, and boasting remarkable size and flavor. Freshness and crispy frying techniques were evident in each bite, leaving me thoroughly impressed. My spouse opted for the sashimi variety platter, which both captivated our visual senses and tantalized our taste buds with its presentation and delectability. It is challenging to articulate any criticisms of this venue, as our bill, approximating sixty dollars, encompassed two main courses, two appetizers, two soups, and salads, thereby rendering the experience not only pleasurable but also economical. This dining excursion transpired to be a charming and memorable escapade for us.

We had an A/C unit go out at 11pm and I called and asked for a tech early the next morning.  Robert showed up promptly at 8am and took care of the repair quickly. The price was reasonable.  Two days later our other unit went out and I called in the afternoon.  They said they were booked up and I let them know we really were hoping to get somebody out that night.  The receptionist called me back after talking to the owner and he said he would personally show up as long as I didn't mind it being a little later.  He showed up right at 9pm and took care of the issue.  Everything has been great!

"Esteemed establishment offering superior quality espresso beverages, crafted with proficiency by a team of skilled baristas, inclusive of an amiable redheaded individual sporting spectacles, who exhibits exceptional customer service skills, a trait not always prevalent in every coffeehouse, particularly during the 1990s, and demonstrates remarkable adeptness in the art of creating delectable beverages. Although the ambiance is aesthetically pleasing, my personal inclination leans towards science fiction themes. Notwithstanding, I would unquestionably revisit this establishment, provided that exceptional personnel, such as the aforementioned barista, continue to be associated with it."

"The culinary offerings and the hospitality experience at this establishment are of unparalleled excellence, rendering it a veritable haven for gastronomic aficionados and connoisseurs of fine dining. The attentive and courteous demeanor of the waiting staff, coupled with the tantalizing flavors and presentation of the cuisine, create a truly unforgettable epicurean adventure that is certain to leave an indelible mark on even the most discerning palate. Moreover, the musical ambiance, which resonates with the rhythms and melodies that have accompanied me throughout my existence, serves as the proverbial icing on the cake, elevating the overall experience to a realm of unadulterated bliss. In short, this restaurant is a veritable gem, one that I shall return to with great frequency and enthusiasm."

"I recently returned from this establishment and thoroughly enjoyed my experience. The location, situated near Silverado Ranch and Bermuda, offers ample parking and proximity to numerous other businesses in a desirable area of town. Upon entering, I was struck by the charming ambiance, which was further enhanced by the tasteful decor and strategic use of subdued lighting. The extensive menu presented a challenge in selecting a dish, as there were numerous options that piqued my interest; however, I was pleased to note that they also catered to vegetarian dietary restrictions. The generous portions and exceptional quality of the cuisine were complemented by the server's attentive and hospitable demeanor, who demonstrated a keen awareness of our needs and preferences. Notably, the Thai dishes were imbued with a more potent degree of spiciness than what I have encountered at other establishments, so it is advisable to exercise caution when specifying the desired level of heat. Despite my companion's struggle with their Pad Thai, our server exhibited commendable initiative in offering to prepare a new dish, which ultimately proved unnecessary due to their considerate gesture. Such acts of kindness serve as a testament to the high caliber of service one can expect to receive at this restaurant, and I eagerly anticipate my next visit."

Valerie epitomized proficiency and exhibited an unwavering dedication to ensuring a seamless customer experience, providing invaluable assistance with a technical issue pertaining to a SIM card, all while refraining from imposing any unwarranted charges, thereby fostering an atmosphere of trust and loyalty that culminated in the procurement of a high-quality charging device at a remarkably reasonable price, thus solidifying the likelihood of future patronage and enthusiastic recommendations to acquaintances and loved ones.

"I procure my automobile to be cleansed at this establishment and genuinely appreciate the amenities and particularly the proficient demeanor of the secondary supervisor, Michael Jorgensen.  His politeness, fluency, and evident aspiration to advance in his career are traits that I find remarkably impressive, and I derive pleasure from our fleeting conversations."

"Ideal for ardent BBQ connoisseurs, this establishment offers an extensive array of products catering to the discerning tastes of enthusiasts seeking to elevate their grilling experiences. With a seemingly endless inventory, the store boasts an impressive collection of items, ensuring that patrons can procure precisely what they require. Should an item be unavailable, staff members are more than happy to accommodate requests and promptly obtain the desired product. Given the vast selection, it is advisable to arrive with a spacious vehicle to facilitate transportation of purchases, as the temptation to acquire an extensive assortment of goods is virtually impossible to resist. As an illustration, a substantial 2 cubic foot bag of 1/2 cut logs can be obtained for a mere $18.00, with options including almond, peach, and hickory varieties. In essence, this venue represents the pinnacle of BBQ supply shopping in Las Vegas, making it an absolute must-visit destination for anyone remotely interested in the art of grilling."

Great location! Beautiful facility, all renovated, gym, pool, great meeting rooms, wonderful bistro, and quiet hallways. I was extremely pleased! I went for an event and they did a great job of coordinating the activities and giving \"great room\" area for meet and greets. The bistro is a great place to hang out and have a light meal or coffee and meet others too. The staff was super super nice and seemed to love their jobs, even the cleaning crew was super cheerful and nice.

"Based on the favorable reviews I had perused on Yelp, I opted to secure New Year's Eve reservations at this establishment, and my girlfriend and I both departed impressed. Although we arrived somewhat tardy for our reservations, we encountered no obstacles in being seated forthwith, as the restaurant's occupancy was merely half its capacity. Our server, Christy, displayed remarkable attentiveness throughout the evening, and her assistance in selecting beverages for my companion was particularly commendable. Following the placement of our drink orders, we initiated our culinary exploration with an appetizer comprising a trio of artisanal cheeses - a creamy brie, a sharp cheddar, and an intriguingly-named Red Dragon variety, which I found particularly enjoyable. Accompanying the cheese selection were candied pecans and a honey-based spread, both of which harmonized effectively with the assorted cheeses. The portion size of the cheese plate was satisfying without being excessive, making it an ideal introduction to our meal. For our principal courses, my companion chose the apple and brie salad complemented by grilled fowl, while I opted for the substantial plate of sea scallops. Both dishes demonstrated exceptional culinary prowess, as my companion's poultry and my marine delicacies were cooked to perfection. The sweet potato hash and celery slaw accompanying my scallops were equally delectable. We concluded our repast feeling gratified yet not uncomfortably satiated, which was greatly appreciated. The entire experience at Table 274 constituted a superb initiation to our nocturnal festivities and warrants our future patronage without hesitation."

"This culinary establishment exudes an ambiance of refined elegance, evoking a sense of sophistication that belies its unassuming exterior. The fare served within its walls is truly exceptional, with each dish showcasing a masterful blend of flavors and textures that tantalize the palate. The slow-roasted short ribs, in particular, are a revelation - tender, juicy, and suffused with a rich, savory essence that lingers long after the last bite has been savored. The ahi sashimi salad, too, is a veritable feast for the senses, its generous portion size and expertly balanced flavors making it a satisfying meal in its own right. The prices, considering the quality of the cuisine, are eminently reasonable, and the staff's polished demeanor and attentive service only serve to enhance the overall dining experience. For those who prefer their seafood with a smoky, BBQ-inspired twist, the bbq salmon is an excellent choice, its velvety texture and deep, smoky flavor imbuing each bite with a sumptuous, indulgent quality. Despite its unpretentious appearance, this restaurant is a true gem, offering a first-class dining experience at a fraction of the cost of its high-end counterparts. Even the filet mignon, a dish often associated with haute cuisine, is executed to perfection here, its tender, pink center and subtle seasoning eliciting rave reviews from even the most discerning gourmands. In short, this establishment is a veritable culinary treasure, one that promises to delight and satisfy even the most discriminating of palates."

"Each time I venture to this establishment, it continues to improve. Firstly, their assortment persistently expands. Being an aficionado of both Gibson and Orange, I experience a state of euphoria upon entering this store, as their inventory encompasses a diverse array of products that cater to my musical inclinations. Although I was dismayed by the absence of the Ibanez lawsuit Les Paul replica during my most recent visit, I derive solace from the likelihood that it has found a new home. The ambiance of this store is, by far, the most appealing of any music retailer in the city. Its interior design exudes a sophisticated and refined aura, replete with plush couches, chairs, and tasteful wooden accents. The welcoming demeanor of the staff members further enhances the overall experience, as they display an unwavering enthusiasm for engaging with customers and fostering an environment conducive to leisurely exploration. Each time I have entered the store, the employees have displayed an unwavering eagerness to accommodate my desires, inquiring whether I wish to sample any of the instruments on display. The staff, comprising a diverse trio of individuals with distinct physical characteristics, has consistently demonstrated an unpretentious and hospitable nature. Their approachability and willingness to converse about various aspects of music and instrumentation serve as a testament to the exceptional quality of customer service offered by this establishment. In conclusion, I harbor a fervent desire for this business to flourish and endure, and I am committed to supporting their endeavors by patronizing their store and advocating its merits to my associates."

"Our encounter with Dr. Soltero was utterly satisfactory, as we were somewhat apprehensive about bringing our canine companion, a 12-year-old Belgian Malinois of considerable size, to a veterinary clinic, given that her previous veterinary care had been administered by a now-retired practitioner who conducted house calls. Following a thorough examination of online reviews, we opted to schedule an appointment at Saguaro Veterinary Clinic, situated within our city limits, due to its exceptional reputation and proximity. Upon arrival, we were impressed by the meticulous attention to cleanliness evident throughout the facility, and the majority of the staff members we interacted with displayed a welcoming demeanor. Our wait time was minimal before we were received by Dr. Soltero, whose gentle spoken manner and compassionate approach towards our pet immediately put us at ease. His associate, too, demonstrated exceptional proficiency in interacting with our dog and engaging with us in a cordial manner. A comprehensive diagnostic evaluation was conducted, during which various potential causes of our dog's locomotive difficulties and their corresponding therapeutic options were deliberated upon. The associated costs were clearly articulated by Dr. Soltero, enabling us to ponder our choices judiciously. Ultimately, we decided upon a conservative treatment approach, involving the administration of an anti-inflammatory medication, and observed a marked improvement in our dog's condition in a relatively short span of time. Subsequent to this, our pet has undergone a follow-up visit, which was similarly brief, and Dr. Soltero took the time to communicate the results of blood work via a telephone call, demonstrating his personal investment in our pet's wellbeing. All things considered, our experience at Saguaro Veterinary Clinic was truly delightful, and we shall unquestionably seek their services again whenever our pets require medical attention."

I broke my iphone 5S screen last week end and these guys fixed my phone in just 20mins. They have the lowest price in town. Great job wireless phone doctors! Im referring you to every one i know that has a broken phone. :)

"Upon culmination of September, I facilitated the rescue of a pup and subsequently initiated my patronage of this establishment subsequent to a recommendation proffered by an acquaintance. Upon entry, I remarked that the ambiance lacked the unpleasant olfactory quality that I had associated with my previous veterinary facility, which I deemed a welcome attribute. The staff manifested exceptional cordiality and concern towards both myself and my companion animals, as exemplified by their endeavor to ascertain my satisfaction via a telephonic communication following my maiden visit. Additionally, my sibling and I opted to avail ourselves of their services for our feline companion Hula, whom they assisted in recovering from a state of diminished corpulence and excessive shedding, determining that a thyroid issue was the root cause, and providing aid in regulating his medication. Furthermore, I found their pricing to be eminently reasonable. It is my conviction that you should seriously consider bringing your pets to the attention of Dr. White, as he has demonstrated proficiency in his vocation."

Stopped I for a pedicure randomly, Really fast and friendly, the guy who did my pedi was very nice even had a pleasant conversation... He told me I had healthy feet haha. No one was pushy, honestly one of my best pedicure experiences

"An exceptional ambiance and personnel complemented by proficient expertise in their merchandise, characterize Carl and Natalie's establishment. Their 'Breakfast in Bed' weekly special, reminiscent of a sweet vanilla or maple dessert flavor, epitomizes their commitment to quality. Notably, they afford customers the opportunity to select their preferred VG/PG ratio, a feature uncommon among competitors. For those in close proximity, a visit to this vape shop is certainly worthwhile."
New place but experienced owner. Amazing blue cheese burger with a side of wing hot sauce. Also have tried all the specialty drinks and you can't go wrong with any of them!

Came at 8pm on a Friday. Still had to wait an hour. It was totally totally worth it. We tried most of the tacos. The ones that blew me away were the chicken and the pork! Oh wow. Like an explosion in your mouth. Love the Mexican and BBQ fusion. It's like they were made to be together. Great ambiance, good service and BYOB! Can't ask for anything more.

"A plethora of pulchritudinous osseous structures accompanies each chocolate container during the festive period of Hawlowene, eliciting a cacophony of gleeful exclamations from the sugary treat's enthusiasts; hypothetically, if these delectable delights were endowed with the faculty of speech, they might exclaim in unison, 'Buauahahaha! Spooky, indeed!'".

They attempted to assassinate my person, and I harbor immense gratitude towards them for their endeavors. When an organization publicizes a wing challenge, often employing terms such as fiery, insane, suicidal, or mortal wings, I am compelled to partake in the experience. The majority of establishments within the valley that utilize these phrases are deceitful in their claims. In the case of a chain restaurant, suicide wings equate to a penguin's dangly bits.

As an individual who frequently engages in online forums, websites, and other platforms where my legally obtained high can be discussed or pursued alongside others who share my affliction, I accepted their proposal of a $15 challenge to consume 10 wings within a 10-minute time frame, with the promise of a prize consisting of two hours of speaking in tongues and humming a Johnny Cash tune. The wings are generously coated in a habanero reduction that is more a measurement of heat consumed rather than an extreme sensation of burning intensity. It is highly recommended that you attempt this challenge. It is an enjoyable way to spend 20-30 minutes.

Fortunately, they offer a more affordable, livable alternative known as Zombie wings for those occasions when you possess an adequate number of T-shirts in your wardrobe but still crave that particular sensation. Their Hellzapoppin burger is quite impressive as well. I have visited the establishment multiple times, and my experiences have consistently involved prompt, hot, accurate, and delicious food. The staff members are friendly, and their service is of high quality. Based solely on the level of heat, I would rate them 5/5. Considering the quality of the food, I would give them 4/5. Taking into account the exceptional value for the price, I would also award them 5/5 stars. Therefore, their overall rating would be 4.7 stars, which rounds up to 5 stars.

came here with my bestie for a massage cz we got very bored in our hotel. oh man.. this place really can work it!!! it was very relaxing and i actually didnt feel like kicking someone in the face while they touched my toes LOL coming back here everytime i visit arizona ^_^

Revamped menu, outstanding service and great atmosphere - not much has changed.  Our server Adrienne was outstanding and attentive and gracious.  The busboys and other guys were great as well.  We had the filet, the ribeye, the Dover sole special, garlic green breans with chili flakes, sauteed mushrooms, caesar salad and nice bottle of Cab.  Definitely will keep coming back.
I just completed a trade in for a new watch. I couldn't have asked for better service or better value. if you're looking for a new watch, this is the place.
Fair price, privately owned with friendly service and they actually know what they are doing. This is a really good alternative to the chains.

"Personnel who exude amusement and camaraderie, in conjunction with an array of delectable beverages, specifically the caramel mocha frost, create a hospitable ambiance that is unfortunately tainted by the presence of patrons who engage in the noxious habit of smoking outside, thereby compromising both the visual appeal and clean air quality of the establishment, yet despite these drawbacks, my affection for this particular site remains unwavering due to its proximity to a premier organic grocery store."
Food is awesome and atmosphere is great! \nHad the staple Mac and Cheese it was creamy and delicious! 1000 island burger is incredible! Will definitely be back again and again!

The modified text is: Went here the other night for a client holiday party.  There was approximately ten individuals seated at our table.  The restaurant's ambiance was pleasant, exhibiting a well-maintained and comfortable atmosphere.  Patrons adorned business casual attire.  It appeared to be an ideal setting for a romantic escapade or a professional luncheon/dinner engagement.  However, upon observation, it became apparent that the tablecloths were cloaked with paper covers, which momentarily took me aback; nonetheless, it is worth acknowledging that Italian cuisine can be somewhat messy.  

Our server possessed extensive knowledge regarding the menu, specifically pertaining to pasta and wine, and offered insightful recommendations that garnered my sincere appreciation.  

My culinary selection for the evening was eggplant parmesan.  Other guests opted for scampi, fresh fish, and pork medallions.  Each dish arrived artfully presented, boasting generous proportions, and the freshness of the ingredients was undeniable.  Every individual raved about their respective meals.  

The eggplant parmesan, enveloped in a blanket of melted cheese and accompanied by a homemade marinara sauce, proved to be an absolute delight.  Its flavors were exquisite, and I yearned to savor each bite, yet the portion size was so substantial that it could have easily satisfied the hunger of four individuals.  

When the time arrived for dessert, I found myself thoroughly satiated, unable to consume another morsel.  Nonetheless, the collective group of ten decided to share a single tiramisu.  Its texture was reminiscent of a rich, velvety pudding, offering a sublime experience for the taste buds.  

In conclusion, this establishment merits high praise and warrants a future visit from us.
Just wanted to update the review by saying that I have been in with multiple people frequently.   The quality and consistency of service and product has been on point every time. Keep It up!

There is very little need for a review of this restaurant. Come early and be ready to wait in line. The lines form quickly and if its cold or raining outside, dress warm and bring an umbrella. Believe me, it's worth the wait. Great staff and they do accept US currency, just not US debit or credit cards. \n\nAs for as the food, there's not much I can say except look at all the pictures everyone posted. They taste as fantastic as they look.

I have had the pleasure of frequenting Lims for an extended period of time, specifically seven years, and I must say that their culinary offerings are truly delectable. The establishment boasts an array of mouthwatering dishes, including but not limited to, exceptional French fries, succulent orange chicken, flavorsome rice, savory crab puffs, and delectable chicken wings, all of which are unparalleled in taste and quality within the locality. Furthermore, the prices at Lims are extremely reasonable and affordable, making it an ideal destination for a family outing or gathering. The service at the restaurant is also top-notch, with friendly and attentive waitstaff who are always eager to provide excellent customer service. Based on my personal experience and satisfaction, I highly recommend Lims to anyone seeking a delightful dining experience.

Can I give this place six stars? Seriously, I think this place is great. I always pretend to be healthy and get a salad as a side but then end up getting their chicado burger or wings. But honestly? Totally worth it. The staff is friendly, the ample amount of TVs is great, the food is tasty, and the atmosphere rocks. I should lie and say the opposite because I'm worried it will be too busy this football season but I can't! I just have to spread the word.

"This recreational area dedicated to the sport of baseball is truly remarkable, boasting exceptional seating arrangements, breathtaking panoramas, delectable culinary offerings, and an ambiance that exudes unadulterated joviality. The enthusiasts who comprise the fanbase of the resident team, the Pirates, display unwavering support and create an electric atmosphere that permeates the stadium. It is with great conviction that I avow that a visit to this venue during the time of year when the sport is in season will leave one feeling utterly satisfied and gratified, particularly if the home team emerges victorious, as was the case during our nocturnal excursion."
I love this place.  When I am hungry and want to grub out I love coming here and getting different dishes.

"I am thoroughly enamored with this establishment, as it serves some of the most delectable sushi I have had the pleasure of consuming. The fare is meticulously prepared and unwaveringly fresh, ensuring that each dish is an culinary masterpiece. The sushi, in particular, is sublime, with the scallops being a notable highlight. The menu boasts an array of innovative and intriguing rolls, which are skillfully crafted by the chefs. The service is exceptional, as the staff exudes warmth and hospitality, making each patron feel welcome and valued. The intimate setting of the restaurant only adds to its charm, creating an atmosphere that is both cozy and authentic. Upon entering and departing, the chefs graciously acknowledge customers, further enhancing the overall experience."

The food here is amazing. You can tell the owners really love to cook.  I haven't had a bad meal here.  Quiet most days for lunch and dinner.  It can be crazy on Sundays for brunch with the after church crowd, so try to avoid it then.  Monte Cristo sandwich is insanely good, but they have lots of lighter food available too.  I also like the simple breakfast if you just want eggs and bacon.  Also the chicken and brie sandwich is pretty good too.  The men in my family like Hash of the Dog.

"Terry Fator's showcase in Las Vegas reigns supreme as an unparalleled spectacle, eclipsing all other performances in its wake. His innate giftedness surpasses the aggregated talents of numerous artists, while his captivating stage presence and endearing humility collectively form an unforgettable experience. My spouse and mother-in-law accompanied me to the show, and our trio remained enthralled throughout the production, relishing every moment with unabashed glee. Unhesitatingly, I proffer my most ardent endorsement to any individual seeking an exhilarating diversion."

The epitome of culinary indulgence, sans gluten, can be found at this establishment, whereupon the discerning patron may savor delectable fried delights, including, but not limited to, fish and chips, as well as onion rings, all at a price point that is eminently reasonable and accessible to the masses. Strategically situated at the intersection of Rainbow Boulevard and 215, this edible oasis enjoys a most convenient location, making it an ideal destination for gastronomes seeking a veritable cornucopia of flavors. Moreover, the staff boasts an unparalleled level of cordiality and hospitality, rendering each visit a truly memorable experience. Thus, it is highly recommended that one incorporate this hidden gem into their gustatory itinerary, posthaste.

I absolutely love this shop. Both women who attend the shop, one being the owner I believe are absolutely friendly. However, honest enough when asked what do you think, they give you an opinion that actually counts instead of the normal shop garbage of everything looks great. 

I found so much at this shop I loved. Some sexy high pumps, a couture dress and several pieces of jewelry fitting a hard to please friend's taste. 
The prices are reasonable, and if its been there for awhile she'll work with you a bit. 
A truly great gem amongst the resale shops.
It really depends on the item if its expensive or not. Its very worth it going in.

I am utterly astounded by the exceptional quality of service that Copperline Plumbing, particularly Gabe, has delivered. His demeanor was remarkably courteous, affable, and his work ethic was unparalleled in expeditiously addressing and resolving the issue at hand. Additionally, I was pleasantly surprised by the reasonable cost of services rendered, which served as an immense relief amidst the customary exorbitance associated with plumbing repairs. Consequently, I shall unhesitatingly seek out Copperline Plumbing's expertise in the event of any forthcoming plumbing predicaments.

"My culinary experiences at this establishment have been nothing short of exceptional, primarily due to the manager's warm greeting and relentless dedication to ensuring an optimal dining experience during my initial visit. Although my recollection of his name is somewhat vague, I distinctly recall his affable demeanor and willingness to accommodate our needs. Subsequent visits to this location in Gilbert have consistently demonstrated a high level of customer service, which has encouraged me to enthusiastically recommend this venue to my associates and repeatedly return for the delectable pizza and refreshing brews. Unfortunately, weekend excursions to this establishment often necessitate a brief waiting period, unless one is fortunate enough to secure a seat at the bar. In contrast, my experiences at the Chandler branch have been characterized by agreeable staff members, while interactions with employees at the Scottsdale location have been somewhat inconsistent, with certain individuals displaying a reluctance to assist customers beyond their specifically designated roles."

Great sushi, first place i goto when i get into town, all you can eat is awesome. The staff make you feel wecome and also give some great suggestions if you cannot make up your mind from the vast selections of roll's

I have an immense fondness for the Art Theatre, as it offers a diverse array of international and independent cinematic productions, which cater to my sophisticated tastes. Moreover, the theatre's concession stand boasts an impressive selection of alcoholic beverages and gourmet fare, surpassing the quality of the typical movie multiplex. Additionally, the establishment's maintenance crew ensures that the premises are spotless, while the state-of-the-art sound system creates an immersive auditory experience for viewers. Furthermore, the employees are knowledgeable and enthusiastic about engaging in intellectual discussions regarding the featured films or other related topics.

Amazing cupcakes & Great Service! The ordering process was simple and easy.  Free Delivery to my hotel on the Las Vegas Strip. Ordered days before and they were able to accommodate my request.  Needed one nonalcoholic cupcake and it was no problem!  Overall great experience with Sin City Cupcakes and I would recommend to anyone staying on the Strip from out of town who doesn't have a car while on vacation. Not to mention, they were very tasty!!!

First class!!!! I can say that this is the ONLY place in Charlotte I will get my nails done.  From the moment you walk in the door until the last nail dries you are pampered, spoiled and adored!  The nail professional are top notch, well trained experts at their craft.  Lina is part of our family, she has cared for me for the past four years and now her newest customer is my four year old daughter, Katherine!  I could go on forever with wonderful stories about all of the amazing staff!\n\nDon't miss an opportunities to visit this gem of south park Charlotte!

This culinary establishment ranks among the uppermost preferences of my paramour, owing to his unwavering fondness for aquatic delicacies; incidentally, my own gastronomical inclinations lean towards the indulgence in such victuals as well. While I do confess an affinity for more customary, non-southern seafood fare, my appreciation for this eatery's offerings remains limited to a select few items. Specifically, the fried oysters prove satisfying, and the hush puppies, by virtue of their inherent nature, qualify as a de rigueur accompaniment. My companion, however, harbors no reservations whatsoever regarding the menu's diversity, as he eagerly partakes of an array of dishes, with a marked predilection for the poboys. Ultimately, this venue earns plaudits as a superior dining destination, warranting our repeated patronage.
